lineup: Concentration, Organza Ray, Klett Wandel
information:
90mil welcomes the notorious Concentration trio for their first show in Berlin in far too long. Hailed variously as “a glorious explosion of sex, noise and neuroses”, “horribly fascinating”, and “the worlds worst best band”, they are known across the realm for their wildly unpredictable and physical live performances, and have vowed to sacrifice themselves entirely for your entertainment during their show on the 10th of October. 

They are joined on the bill by Organza Ray and Klett Wandel.

Organza Ray is Eleni Poulou and Hilary Jeffery. Poulou has recorded and toured worldwide with many groups including The Fall and Shizuo. In 2022 in Berlin she formed Organza Ray together with Hilary Jeffery, who as well as composing, plays trumpet, trombone, tuba, piano and electronics. 

Klett Wandel is a kind of surreal, delusional demigod figure with a monthly show on 90mil radio. Through song, noise, story and movement he welcomes you into his warm embrace. 

---- 

90mil is a temporary DIY space near Jannowitzbrücke. It is non-profit, community led and volunteer run. Entrance is via suggested donation at the door only. You must be a member to enter. You can become a member by purchasing a membership card at the door for €5. This card is valid for a year.

silent green presents

Ludwig Wandinger's album Is Peace Wild? is a collection of calm, almost beatless nocturnes that focus on harmony and clarity. It features contributions from Yves B. Golden and Evita Manji. Berlin-based musician ronja explores themes of emptiness and silence in her EP For Annette and her latest release something about us. lineup: VictorDiscos (Affenauten Radio)
information:
Peruvian selector VictorDiscos (Affenauten Radio & Pauxi Pauxi Collective) has been based in Berlin since 2019 and has reactivated his sonic journey in the city's vibrant musical landscape over the past year. His eclectic curations span Fusion Jazz, Synth Wave, Krautrock, NDW, Disco, Latin, and Global Rare Groove. 

With an exceptional ability to read both the room and the mood, his sets effortlessly adapt to the present environment, guiding listeners through unexpected musical territories. His selections create a space that feels both warm and familiar, inviting you to embrace the moment and "feel free to feel free."

lineup: Ayzon
information:
Im Rahmen des ersten Langen Abends und als Teil des öffentlichen Programms zur Ausstellung DAS GLÜCK IST NICHT IMMER LUSTIG von Rirkrit Tiravanija legt Ayzon auf Tiravanijas demo station im Lichthof des Gropius Bau auf.

Die demo station von Rirkrit Tiravanija ist eine bühnenähnliche Skulptur und lädt Menschen dazu ein, etwas zu „demonstrieren“. Tiravanija versteht den Begriff dabei im doppelten Sinn – als politischen Protest oder als Vorführung von etwas, das jemand besonders gut kann oder gerne mag. Über die Laufzeit der Ausstellung bietet die demo station täglich Raum für öffentliche Auftritte.

Als Teil des öffentlichen Programms zur Ausstellung DAS GLÜCK IST NICHT IMMER LUSTIG von Rirkrit Tiravanija lädt der Gropius Bau zu einer monatlichen Serie Langer Abende ein. Neben dem DJ-Set finden am gleichen Abend eine Buchvorstellung mit Josephine Apraku, Eric Otieno Sumba, Sharonda Quainoo und Nadine Nzambisa Ngolo, eine Filmvorführung von Rirkrit Tiravanija sowie eine Performance von Petra Hermanova und eine Kochshow von Luiza Prado De O. Martins statt.

Der Produzent und Künstler Ayzon kombiniert in seinen Sets seine eigenen Produktionen mit Songs, die ihn inspirieren. Sein Vater, ein angolanischer DJ, machte ihn mit Kizomba, Jazz, Reggae und Zouk vertraut, während sein älterer Bruder ihm mit seiner Liebe zu R&B und Hip-Hop eine neue Welt eröffnete. Ayzons Sound spiegelt diese Prägung wider, indem er warme, fließende Akkorde mit sanften, groovigen Basslines und ansteckenden Drum-Patterns mischt und so einen Stil kreiert, der sich sowohl vertraut als auch erfrischend anders anfühlt. Anfang dieses Jahres veröffentlichte er sein neuestes Projekt Part Of The Story mit einer vielfältigen Auswahl internationaler und in Berlin ansässiger Vokalisten, das von namhaften Plattformen wie COLORS, NTS und BBC Radio aufgegriffen wurde.

Bei der Veranstaltung werden ggfs. Foto- und Videoaufnahmen entstehen, auf denen Sie zu erkennen sein könnten. Mit Ihrem Besuch willigen Sie ein, dass diese Aufnahmen zur Kommunikation der Veranstaltung bzw. Ausstellung verwendet werden.

lineup: Acierate , AYLIN IDAH , Cami Vásquez, Carla Schmitt , Claire Morgan, Clouds  , DLV b2b KTK (DE) , Echoes Of October b2b Valerie Ace , Epikur , Frazi.er , Herton , hybral , In Verruf , Kim She , Lifka live, Marcus L , MZA, Nur Jaber , Onleash, Philipp Drube , Raël , San Regret , Valentina Spirito, Viscerale , Wallis
information:
TICKETS ||

WILL BE AVAILABLE AT THE BOX OFFICE [25€/10€ re-entrance//5€ re-entrance from Sunday]

- Limited pre-sale on RA [25€ incl. RA Ticket Fee], more tickets at the door [25€]. 
- We have added strictly limited community tickets for all early decision makers, available subject limitation and latest till our full line drops. The reduced price is 15€
- You can enter and exit as you please, with a maximum limit of thirty minutes included. Enter SYNOID and stay as long as you want. 
- Our re-entrance is 10€ till Sunday, later we reduce to 5€.  

It is our commitment to support marginalized individuals & communities closely aligned with the values of our community and our music culture. If you would like to request further assistance upfront the event you can contact us via info@synoid.de  

ONLINE PRESALE ||

Please note that a presale ticket does not guarantee entry. The club reserves the right to deny entry. Tickets will be automatically refunded in that case. Due to increased security checks at the entrance, there may be an increased waiting time even with a ticket. We ask you to please take this into account and respect it. Thank you.   

TIMEATABLE ||  

Announcements starting soon.

ABOUT ||

Techno stands for equality, for gender and ethnic equality. We believe that one of the most important fundamental ideas of our Berlin techno subculture scene is the representation of a certain value system. Especially movements of social justice have a direct impact on our parallel society, where historically from freshly emerged scenes the revolutionary thought is living out freedoms that are often not yet set. All those who recognize, respect and uphold the communal, social values of our fragile parallel society are welcome.   

AWARENESS ||

The RSO awareness team is present at the club every weekend. Please do not hesitate to contact them if you feel uncomfortable for any reason. If you are unable to locate the awareness team, the other staff can call them for you.

event_name: para//e/ pres.: DREAM DJ TEAM - Klopf Klopf Albumtour 2024
lineup: Dream DJ Team [Anna Ullrich x Bitschu Batschu], Dallaniel , SACID
information:
PARA//E präsentiert: DREAM DJ TEAM auf Klopf Klopf Albumtour 2024

Das DJ-Duo Dream DJ Team, bestehend aus Anna Ullrich und Bitschu Batschu, hat sich einen festen Platz in der Dance-Szene Österreichs und Deutschlands erobert und bringt eine frische romantische Brise in die elektronische Musikszene. Mit ihren hypnotischen Melodien und energiegeladenen Sets versprechen sie ein unvergleichliches Erlebnis für alle Dance-Liebhaber.

Das neue DREAM DJ TEAM-Album "Klopf Klopf" ist ein bunter Mix aus verschiedenen Einflüssen und eine faszinierende Reflexion der Wiener Nachtlebenskultur. Die Musik transportiert die Energie und Vielfalt dieser Szene und ist in eine künstlerische Darstellung von verschiedenen Fiktionen, darunter Figuren wie Kirby, eingebettet. Diese Vielseitigkeit erstreckt sich über musikalische Genres und erzeugt eine einzigartige Klanglandschaft, die das lebendige und kreative Ambiente des Wiener Nachtlebens einfängt.

Seid dabei, wenn das Dream DJ Team auf Tour geht!

event_name: 3 YEARS ANNIVERSARY! ATR PARTY - Cumbia + Reggaetón at Lido
lineup: @maticprod, @dj.nolas , @tionacho, @akaromea
information:
DE UNTEN

3 AÑOS DE ATR EN BERLIN!!!!

No podemos estar mas felices de llegar a los 3 años y todo gracias nuestrxs turrxs!!

Es por eso que vamos a estar regalando cosas, invitadxs especiales y mucho mas para agradecerles a ustedes que cada mes nos acompañan y llenan el club mas lindo de Berlin y nos hacen la fiesta latina mas masiva de la ciudad.

Cumbia, Reggaeton y algunos hits de hace más de 20 años van a sonar, aparte de toda la música actual.

¿Sorpresas? Como siempre en la ATR.

¡No te pierdas esta edición y síguenos en las redes para no perderte los sorteos, regalos y novedades para este fechón!


3 JAHRE ATR AUF BERLIN!!!!

Wir könnten nicht glücklicher sein, 3 Jahre alt zu werden und das verdanken wir unseren Turrxs!

Deshalb bedanken wir uns mit Freikarten, Special Guests und vielem mehr bei euch, die jeden Monat mit uns den schönsten Club Berlins füllen und uns zur größten Latin-Party der Stadt machen.

Neben der aktuellen Musik werden auch Cumbia, Reggaeton und einige Hits von vor über 20 Jahren gespielt.

Gibt es Überraschungen? Wie immer in der ATR.

Verpassen Sie diese Ausgabe nicht und folgen Sie uns in den Netzwerken, damit Sie die Verlosungen, Geschenke und Neuigkeiten zu diesem tollen Datum nicht verpassen!

event_name: 5 Years Crave Tapes w/ Sex Kino, The Violent Youth, etc
lineup: Sex Kino *live, The Violent Youth *live, Alpha Sect *live, keikee , Desolate Discotheque (hybrid-set), Xpresso Martina , Unhealed
information:
After seven tape releases, two digital releases, over thirty podcast episodes and numerous label nights in all over Europe, we are happy to celebrate the label's fifth anniversary!
The event will take place on 11th October in Urban Spree in Berlin. To mark the occasion, we have invited a bunch of artists and bands from all over Europe and printed new label shirts.

Coming from Stockholm is the synthwave band Sex Kino, who should be familiar to some of you. Their debut album „Scream In The City", which was released on HEARrec in 2020, sold out pretty quickly and became an insider tip among connoisseurs.

Also on the lineup we welcome back to Berlin the Augsburg based, belarusian band The Violent Youth. Known for their recognizable and typical eastern european postpunk sound, the band released their latest album “Na Igle” last winter on Atroffact Records on beautiful clear vinyl. Their last Mexico tour the past summer with the band Ploho will also be remembered by the locals for a long time to come.

As a special treat, the exceptional artist Alpha Sect from France, who has already released on labels such as SOIL, Oraculo and Crave Tapes itself, will play a live set. The lineup will be rounded off by Feines Tier's Keikee from Cologne, as well as the entire Crave Tapes label gang Desolate Discotheque, Unhealed and Xpresso Martina.

The new shirts and last tapes as well as band merchandise will be available at the merchandise stand at the entrance.
Ticket presale on Resident Advisor and tickets at the door.
See you on the dark side!

Born from an unrenovated apartment building in Friedrichshain, across the river from Treptower Park, Renate has three main dance floors and many smaller rooms to explore. Every shade and subgenre of electronic music has its place here, from fast, groovy techno to uplifting house music, from chugging EBM to frenetic breakbeat stompers.

event_name: Whipped Cream - A Kinky and Colorful Experience
lineup: mystery kid , My Secret Playground , Florian Loveshack
information:
"If it´s a dream, don´t wake me up!"

Tonight we are pleasure seekers, restless, fabulous and excited!

We welcome you to the third „Whipped Cream" of the year, in a new incredible location in the heart of Berlin! Our Cream Team awaits to tempt you and ensures the proper diversity and excitement among the party people.

Yesterday we wore black – now, we strive to be colorful, bright and extravagant! Become one with your alter ego and project yourself into a bizarre, exuberant world. Here, time stands still, and we celebrate the power of free expression, sexual energy and the vibrant atmosphere of the neon era.

MUSIC:
Dark Disco, Italo Disco, Modern 80s, Indie Dance

BEHIND THE DECKS:
Mystery Kid (FR), My Secret Playground (Melopee, Sincopat, Jeahmon!), Resident Florian Loveshack

SPECIALS:
Outstanding Soundsystem
Large cosy hang out area
BDSM Toys and Furnitures
Shibari to try out and participate with @berlinroughrope
Get your Neon Futuristic Make Up by natacha_colours
Creamy organic welcome shots and other sweet surprises
Couple Area

RULES:
Treat others like you would like to be treated. You should be familiar with consent! Assaults, whether intentional or not, will in no way be tolerated and lead to immediate exclusion from our world. 
No photos! Let’s enjoy the evening without cell phones 

Stay healthy! Condoms on all floors.
Our cream team is also a care team. If you need help in any way or are having a bad feeling, don’t hesitate to talk to them. We are always there for you!

DRESSCODE:
Shrill, extravagant, kinky, glamorous, glitter, 60s, 70s and 80s, lacquer, leather, plastic, rubber, burlesque, uniform, fetishes of all kinds, human pets, sissy, drag, costumes, colorful, cosplay, cross-dress, futuristic , Sci-Fi, … inspire us and others! Small colored accents make a difference.

No! Street clothes, jeans, normal suits, everyday clothes of all kinds.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact me by email: whippedcreamberlin@gmail.com

ATTENTION! Purchasing a ticket does not automatically entitle you to enter the party. Please note our information on dress code and “rules”. Complaints will only be accepted up to 24 hours BEFORE the event.

More details to find the entrance check the website!

Box office: 26€

lineup: MXGN (UK indepedant), XTS (UK) (UK indepedant), Kopflos (SHØCC), DJ Leo (unfort. Leo wont come - Emma (8) will take over), DJLolo , Brizze (Dionys), PASSA (Gulli Gang Records), DJ Spätzle, DJ_S.A.I.D (M-BIA)
information:
Get ready for an unforgettable night as SHØCC Berlin returns to M-BIA Club on 11th October. We celebrate musical diversity by delivering an electrifying experience that resonates with every beat lover. From the frenetic rhythms of Hardtechno to the captivating melodies of Hard Trance and Hard Dance, every style finds its rightful place at SHØCC.

Join us in the ARENA (Main Floor) for relentless Hardtechno that will keep you moving all night long. Meanwhile, the BUNKER (Second Floor) offers an intense mix of Hard Dance and Hard Trance, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

Headliners who have already made waves across the British Isles are now set to conquer Berlin, with a special appearance by Max Goodman, whose last event with ACIDUS was just the beginning. Now, he’s here in person to take the energy to the next level.

We stand firmly against any form of discrimination, racism, or hate. SHØCC is a space for unity and mutual care. Let’s take care of ourselves and each other as we embrace the music.

Location: M-BIA Club, Berlin
Date: 11th October

Prepare for a night that will shock your senses and elevate your soul. See you on the dance floor!

address: 70 Am Wriezener Bahnhof; Friedrichshain; 10243 Berlin; Germany
lineup: Panorama Bar:, Dee Diggs, Honey Dijon
information:
Honey Dijon, Dance-Historikerin, Fashion-Ikone, Sammlerin kultureller Artefakte, Grammy-Preisträgerin und natürlich fabelhafte DJ in Personalunion, spielt eine Woche vor der Veröffentlichung ihrer DJ Kicks Mix-Compilation ein extralanges Set auf ihrer Jack Your Body Party in der Panorama Bar. Zeit genug, um ihren transatlantischen, epochenübergreifenden House-Sound in all seinen Facetten auszuformulieren und dabei Vergangenheit, Gegenwart und Zukunft zu transzendieren. Das Warm-up spielt die New Yorker DJ, Sängerin und Produzentin Dee Diggs, die wie auch Honey in ihren Sets den queeren und Schwarzen Ursprüngen von Disco, Ballroom, House und Techno huldigt.

Honey Dijon, dance historian, fashion icon, collector of cultural artefacts, Grammy award winner and, of course, fabulous DJ in one, is playing an extended set at her Jack Your Body party in Panorama Bar, one week prior to the release of her DJ Kicks mix compilation. Enough time to express her transatlantic, epoch-spanning house sound in all its facets, transcending past, present and future. Warming up will be New York DJ, singer and producer Dee Diggs, who, like Honey, pays homage to the queer and Black origins of disco, ballroom, house and techno in her sets.

lineup: Artefakt [Live], illousion , Am Nil [Live], serenus
information:
Let's lowpass! Back in our favourite location with a custom made soundsystem, designed by Subessenz d-.-b

For this edition we have invited personal favourites and Dutch deep techno reference Artefakt for a liveset. Known for their intricate and organic textures, the duo will take us on a dreamy yet driving journey through polyrhythmic, acid infused sonic territories. 

Lowpass resident Am Nil will open the night with his modular liveset (the precision of which has been compared to that of a "Japanese city" recently), so come early to get a taste of his modular delicacies. We've also invited Illousion for a closing set that will push the energy to a peak in the morning hours. Lowpass co-founder Serenus will transition between the livesets with his dense and driving take on techno.

Ticket holders will receive the exact address the day of the event.

* This is a safe space. We want all our ravers to have a good night and connect with each other regardless of gender, sexual orientation, religion, race etc. and we invite everyone to express themselves. If you experience any kind of discrimination we are here to support you. *

event_name: Darin Epsilon presents Perspectives Digital: On the Road to ADE 2024
lineup: Lineup A-Z, , Darin Epsilon , OIBAF (previously OIBAF&WALLEN), Rafa Silva , VONDA7
information:
Get ready for an unforgettable night as Perspectives Digital returns to Berlin for a special label showcase at the iconic Klunkerkranich rooftop! Join us on October 11th for an evening filled with cutting-edge electronic music, breathtaking views, and an atmosphere like no other.

Prepare to be immersed in a unique musical experience as some of the label’s finest artists take over the decks. Don’t miss out on this incredible night of music and celebration. See you on the dancefloor!


PERSPECTIVES DIGITAL SHOWCASE
On the Road to ADE 2024
Hinter Den Alpen Club @ Klunkerkranich
Friday, October 11 • 20:00 to 03:00


LINEUP (in alphabetical order):

Darin Epsilon (United States)
Perspectives Digital / Ritter Butzke / Katermukke

OIBAF (Spain)
Simulate Recordings / Size Records / Sony Music B1

Rafa Silva (Chile)
Perspectives Digital / Ritter Butzke / Balance Music

VONDA7 (Poland)
Perspectives Digital / Anjunadeep / Last Night on Earth


About Perspectives Digital:

Perspectives Digital is a record label based out of Berlin and Los Angeles. It was started in 2010 by internationally acclaimed DJ and producer Darin Epsilon.

Darin’s mission of continuously releasing high-quality electronic music has attributed to the unwavering success of the label and is reflected through the long list of top-notch producers, some of which include (in alphabetical order) Armen Miran, Betoko, Cid Inc, D-Formation, D-Nox & Beckers, DAVI, Einmusik, Funkagenda, Hernan Cattaneo & Soundexile, Jerome Isma-Ae, John Graham aka Quivver, KIKO, Lexer, Marc DePulse, Martin Roth, Miss Monique, Nick Muir, Petar Dundov, Rafael Cerato, Robert Babicz, Sasha Carassi, Space Motion, Sydney Blu, VONDA7, Wally Lopez, and many more.

"One of North America’s leading labels" - Beatport

Nominated for "Breakthrough Label" in DJ Mag's "Best of North America Awards" (2017)

information:
Dear friends and guest of Mystic Rose...

To all my friends, companions, Dj's, artists, Kirsten and Thaur, to all the employees of the Kit Kat Club and to all my guests with whom I celebrated 30 years...the living and the dead...those for me always are still there and come by every now and then...

I say THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU  for all the GOOD cooperation with everyone involved...

NAMITO, der WÜRFLER, SCOTTY and LOKOMOTIV are the “longest serving” DJs...they have been there since 1994...
The others joined shortly after 2000

It wasn't easy to get these artists all together and I had to distribute some of them to the parties in September and November...

Spread the word and come together
See you on the dance floor...

Make Party, not war



Liebe Freunde und Gäste der Mystic Rose...

Ich habe lange überlegt, was ich hier Schreiben soll anlässlich dieses historischen Ereignis...(30 Jahre)..

Ich sage einfach nur DANKE DANKE DANKE...
An alle meinen Freunde, Weggefährten, Dj's, Künstler, Kirsten und Thaur, an alle Angestellten des Kit Kat Clubs und an alle meine Gäste, mit denen ich 30 Jahre gefeiert habe...die Lebendigen und die Toten...die für mich immer noch da sind und ab und zu vorbeikommen...

Ich bedanke mich für all die GUTE Zusammenarbeit mit allen Beteiligten...
NAMITO, der WÜRFLER, SCOTTY und LOKOMOTIV sind die "Dienstältesten" Dj's...sie sind seit 1994 mit dabei...
Die anderen sind kurz nach 2000 dazugestossen.

Es war nicht leicht, diese Künstler alle zusammen unter einen Hut zu bringen, und einige musste ich auf die Parties im September und November verteilen....

Spread the word and come together...
See you on the dance floors...

Make pARTy, not War...

---------------------------------------------------------

No Dresscode...
Just be yourself..
But be sexy...

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Es gibt KEINEN Vorverkauf von Tickets.
Eintrittstickets NUR an der Tür...!

There is NO presale of tickets.
Tickets ONLY at the door...!

event_name: Dirty Thirty (Eszter & Sarah's Bday) with Zombie Cats, Benzon, Datalog
lineup: Zombie Cats, Benzon, Datalog, Upzet, Dirty Plates, Unknown, Nini, H.U.K, Dark Anomaly
information:
>> DIRTY THIRTY <<

Join us, Eszter & Sarah, for our 30th birthday bash at VOID Hall on the 11th of October! 

We'll officially hit the big 3-0, and to celebrate, we're throwing the ultimate all-nighter with an insane lineup of some of our favorite DJ friends. Expect a journey through genres—from old-school liquid to deep rollers, rave, and neuro. It’s like time travel, but with bass drops! We’ll be dancing the night (and our youth) away with you! <3

Lineup:

ZOMBIE CATS
BENZON (Hungary)
DATALOG (Hungary)
UPZET
DIRTY PLATES b2b H.U.K
NINI b2b UNKNOWN
DARK ANOMALY


Playing order (23:00 - end):

Benzon, Hungary | Oldschool liquid vibes on Vinyl to get you moving.
Dirty Plates B2B H.U.K | Liquid → deep → rave. Trust us, it works.
Upzet | The deep dive continues, straight into neuro.
Zombie Cats | A wild neuro set covering the past, present, and future.
Datalog | Neuro lovers, this one's for you.
Dark Anomaly | Taking neuro to the harder edge.
Nini B2B Unknown | Keeping the energy going till sunrise.

Entry:

€5 for friends (with love + donation option)
€10 before midnight
€11 presale
€13 after midnight
€20 Combi-ticket (+ Techno & Psy @ VOID Club)

We can't wait to see all your beautiful faces and dance with you till we drop! Big thanks to Upzet for making this possible.

We wait for you from 11pm

Love,
Eszter & Sarah

P.S. Slide into our DMs to get on the friend’s list!

lineup: Luca Olivotto , Kedi Bounce: , Jean-Jez & Mesmer (Kang) as Soul! Brother
information:
★ Kat Nip Volume 9 ★

For our 9th Volume we would like to introduce none other than Luca Olivotto, founder of label Small Great Things and party series Small Great House! His infectious and groovy disco and house is infectious to any dancefloor. 

Luca's productions and sets span a wide range of genres, including House, Deep House, and Disco, while consistently showcasing his passion for experimentation—a key aspect of his artistic vision. His sound is distinctive, marked by a unique blend of melody, harmony, and composition that shines through in all his major works.

Returning again are Soul! Brother. Jean-Jez and Mesmers soulful and funky duo! Prepare to hear everything from Latin, Disco, Gospel and funk. 

Put on your dancing shoes cause this night will keep you grooving all night!

And remember to
Hiss Less. Purr More.

information:
>> tickets at the door only <<

with autumn just around the corner, it’s time to get cosy again. and where better to do it than at home?

that‘s why we’re excited to announce bouncy will return to our beloved monarch on the 11th of october to celebrate a homecoming. we don’t know about you, but the sweaty view of the kotti gives us special feelings every time!

you can once again look forward to an extra hot line-up. we invited some vinyl wizards: karete bu & chet rubbs, along with our family members and residents dj volley and dj sonallee. a.c.e.stageandlight will take care of the lighting again with a varied setup to make the discs sparkle even more. so come early and get ready for some hot spins and glowing turntables!

event_name: The Lappetites / İpek Odabaşı & Ignaz Schick
lineup: The Lappetites, Antye Greie-Ripatti/AGF – vocals, electronics, Kaffe Matthews – electronics , Ryoko Akama – electronics, , İpek Odabaşı & Ignaz Schick, İpek Odabaşı – cdjs, electronics, Ignaz Schick – turntables, Sampler, electronics
information:
The Lappetites work in the formation of founder Kaffe Matthews, Antye Greie-Ripatti/AGF and Ryoko Akama. The name is a contraction of laptop and appetite. The laptop, for a long time the fetish creation instrument of the musicians and performers who are part of this collective born in 2002. The appetite for exploration, improvisation, the stage, the appetite to work together. Their work includes a collaboration with the French composer Eliane Radigue on her composition Elemental II (2002). In 2014 a residency at EMS Stockholm resulted in an audiovisual performance project titled: Borderless. Since, multiple transcending musical concepts have been developed and furthered with each of the resulting performances. Sonic concepts of text based speculative fiction, translated biological evolution into sine wave growing, noise improvisation are part of the trio’s output. Kaffe Matthews’ decade long experience of spacial live sound, Ryoko Akama’s sonic sensitivity with synthesizer and AGF’s digital and vocal execution bring a dynamic spectrum in sound without borders.
The sound artist and composer Ignaz Schick has made an international name for himself as a busy collaborator in the field of experimental music. Noise artist and DJ İpek Odabaşı works with intense sounds and hard, distorted beats. Both have known each other from the Berlin improvisation and experimental music scene for many years. For biegungen im ausland, the newly formed duo will combine İpek Odabaşıs electronic beat abstractions with the haptic, electro-acoustic turntablism of Ignaz Schick. Two seemingly incompatible worlds merge into a dense and energetic musical landscape full of playful details and surprising twists and turns.

lineup: @Bad request , @Reebone
information:
Welcome to the Hottest Kinky Throwback party in Berlin!

Join us for a party where we're turning back time to the glorious 90's-00's era.
It's a night of pure nostalgia, freedom, and self-expression!
Get ready to dance like no one is watching because we're bringing you not one, but TWO dance floors of non-stop beats!

Main Dance Floor: Spice up your life!
Get ready to move and groove to the unforgettable Hip hop & pop hits, Euro trash, pulse-pounding beats that defined an era. This dance floor is where the magic happens, and we want to see you own it!

Second Dance Floor: Rock Your Body right!
For those who crave the raw energy of rock, metal, grunge, and indie vibes, our second dance floor is where you'll want to be. Let loose, head bang and embrace the rebellious spirit of the 90's and 00's.

Be Yourself - All Genders & Orientations are Welcome
No matter who you are or who you love, you're welcome here!

Consent is Sexy - No Means No!
Respect is our golden rule. Remember, consent is not just essential; it's downright sexy!
No means no! and we're here to ensure everyone feels safe and respected. If you're looking to take things up a notch on the dance floor or beyond, just remember to ask first. Seeking consent is the key to keeping the party vibe consensual and the night unforgettable!

Unicorn Awareness Team
Our Unicorn Awareness Team is here for you! If you need assistance, have questions, or just want to chat with someone, look for our friendly Unicorn team members - they have LED horns.

Welcome Shots, Candies, Play Areas & Whirlpool
Start the night with greetings & welcome shots at the entrance (between 22:00-00:00), enjoy the candies, explore playful areas designed for grown-up fun, and take a fun dip in the whirlpool.

Dress to Impress: Colorful, Icons, Kinky, Sexy, Neon
Do your most daring and dazzling outfits inspired by the vibrant 90s-00s era. Think colorful, channel your favorite icons, embrace the kinky and the sexy or shine bright in neon! Let your wardrobe be as bold as your dance moves.

Capture the Moment!
If you'd like to capture memories from this night, our photographer will be there for that, you can ask them to take a photo of you. The photographer will only capture photos after you have given your consent; no photos will be taken without consent.

Get ready for a night of liberation, self-expression and pure unadulterated fun.
Flashback Friday is the place to be! we can't wait to celebrate with you!

information:
Step into “Die porösen Grenzen,” a tango series of 4 unique milongas that bring together dancers and artists to expand the boundaries of tango.
Explore a kaleidoscope of contemporary tango practices through dance, music, theatre, and visual arts at Haus der Sinne. 

We transform both floors into a playground for improvisation and experimentation, welcoming everyone from seasoned dancers to curious beginners and artists from various disciplines for an immersive experience.

A porous border is an environment that invites fluidity and connection, breaking down traditional barriers. Explore. Submit. Sense. Together. Let’s transform tango’s landscape to create a space where everyone can express themselves and connect through movement and art.

Part 2: October 11th: Sehnsucht

lineup: Move-O-Phonics
information:
Move-O-Phonics is the new act of Cosmic Barbarella and DJ OMG Luc, two veteran DJs with roots in soul, latin-jazz, blues and garage rock. They hail from Portugal/Switzerland and Berlin with hundreds of gigs under their belts, having spun at parties, concerts and private events in Germany, Switzerland, Portugal, Italy and the US for 15+ years. Now combining forces in the radio studio and live at selected venues, they work the turntables with their own soulful vinyl ping-pong-style DJ sets, on a steady mission to get everyone moving—from the sleepiest corner of the dancefloor to the far end of the bar.

Photo by Luc Berger

event_name: DENIM x DENIM - DIY craft fest by Zalando
lineup: Live performance by Baby B3ns., Sponsored by Levi's., , Spaces are limited, so don’t miss out—sign up now to claim your spot!
information:
Welcome to DENIM x DENIM—a one-day DIY craft fest hosted by Zalando and your favorite denim brands Levi’s, Lee, Pepe Jeans, Replay, Tommy Jeans, Weekday, Wrangler. Step into a world of denim where customization knows no bounds.
Dive into creative workshops that guide you in crafting unique, personalized denim pieces.

CUSTOMISATION WORKSHOPS
Craft your own unique denim pieces. Limited spots available — sign up for one workshop when you arrive at the event. It’s free, and all materials are provided.

Paint Job with Levi’s
Create a statement piece with a technique inspired by workwear merged with fashion. With screen painting ink and a paint roller you'll make a one of a kind piece that’ll turn heads. 

Stencil Painting with Lee
Take denim to the next level with this street-style inspired technique. You’ll use materials like metal chains, rope, and grates as stencils for bold designs.

Chrome Denim with Replay
Use chrome foil on denim for a bold iron-on upgrade. A simple process with results that pack a punch. 

Laser Printing with Tommy Jeans
Create a unique piece with a laser technique. Pick one of the designs and a placement. 

Fringes with Wrangler
Give your denim a twist with Wrangler’s fringe kits. Follow your fringe vision and customise like only you can.

TUTORIALS 
Limited spots available — sign up for your favourite tutorial when you arrive at the event. It’s free, and all materials are provided.

Styling Sessions & Giveaways 
Refresh your wardrobe by getting a complete Levi’s look curated with the help of a stylist. You will also get a chance to win giveaways from Weekday and Pepe Jeans. Sign up to enter each raffle at the event. 

Denim Bracelet DIY
Turn denim scraps into unique statement jewelry. Cut, design, and choose your closure—button, tie-knot, zipper… If you can dream it, you can do it. 

Makeup Tutorial
Make the most out of your outfit with the makeup magic of Olivia Nwachukwu. Learn how to create vibrant, on-trend looks that perfectly match your denim. 

WALKIN ACTIVITIES
No sign-up required

Hair styling
Bring your style to the next level. From razor tattoos to airbrushing - Taiga will give you a hairdo as unique as you. 

Nail art
Choose artistic press-ons by Camilla Inge Volbert to finish your look in no time at all. 

Bullriding 
Hop on a themed bull ride, and challenge your balance and endurance. 

By registering for this event, you confirm your acceptance of the terms and conditions, which can be found at denimxdenim-zalando.com.

lineup: ābnamā | Deepneue| I. JORDAN | Jenny Cara | Juliana Huxtable | DJ KILLING | DJ MELL G | Norman Nodge | Rakans | Stella Zekri
information:
| DOOR POLICY | 
Respect our door policy. We aim to create a safer space especially for the queer community. Having a ticket doesn't guarantee entrance and the host has the final word.  

| DRESS CODE | 
As in every PRNCPTL event, the dresscode is an important element of our nights. Be creative, embrace your kinkiness or be ready to undress! Dress code includes: Club Kids/Post-Drag, Creative Artsy Outfits and Fetish Wear (Lace, Leather, PVC, Latex, Lingerie; Naked/Half-Naked).  

| SAFER SPACES | 
Please, respect our guidelines for creating a safer and welcoming environment, ensuring consent at all times. Respect is the ultimate rule. Furthermore, there is no space for any form of discrimination in our events.  

| NO PHOTOS/VIDEOS |

lineup: Kid Simius , Tereza
information:
12.10.2024
Berlin /// Watergate
Einlass: 19:00 /// Beginn: 20:00
 
Präsentiert von: Rausgegangen /// DIFFUS
 
 Nach sechs Jahren erscheint endlich wieder ein neues Album "José" auf dem Kult-UK-Label Shall Not Fade. Mit dem Album geht KID SIMIUS auf große Europa-Tour und beschreibt sie voller Vorfreude als "die wichtigste Tour seines Lebens".
 
Der aus Granada stammende und in Berlin lebende Künstler durchbricht Genregrenzen und verbindet eine Vielzahl von Stilen wie elektronische Musik, Italo, House, Balearic und Disco. Bekannt für seine energetischen Live-Auftritte und seine Fähigkeit, auf dem Dance Floor eine tiefe menschliche Verbindung zu schaffen, hat er auf Labels wie Permanent Vacation, Running Back und seinem eigenen Label Jirafa Records zahlreiche erfolgreiche Tracks veröffentlicht.
 
Seine Top-10-Spotify-Tracks (u.a. mit Paul Kalkbrenner, Bonaparte & Hinds) haben über 30 Millionen Streams, und mit Auftritten auf legendären Festivals wie Melt!, Dockville, FEEL (IT), Maifeld Derby und Fusion hat er sich einen Namen gemacht. Im Herbst verspricht KID SIMIUS unvergessliche Abende voller Energie und Überraschungen.

event_name: Cuddles Vol.5: Bliss Inc., DJ AYA, ketia, Marie Malarie, Aaron Blau
lineup: ⇾ Bliss Inc. , ⇾ DJ AYA , ⇾ ketia , ⇾ Marie Malarie  , ⇾ Aaron Blau
information:
Are you ready for the biggest, longest and wildest Cuddles edition of the year? 

We are so excited to announce that for the next Cuddles in October, we will move to Aeden. 
We can host more of you, a bigger dancefloor, a covered outside area, a dimly lit play space and 12 hours of maddness and delusion.

On the main floor, we are joined by your Cuddles daddy Aaron Blau. His carefully selected sets can go from dark tribal rhythm and tech-house to uplifting ecstatic progressive vocal house.

He is joined by ketia, a keen ear for new and exciting music, alongside a curious, invested approach to community-building within the lisbon club scene; insisting on mixing as many genres as possible with a promise of bangers only.

Flying in from London Maria Malarie, a spearheading a new generation for whom genre is as fluid as gender. A resident of HOMODROP, ADONIS, and a founder of queer parties including HYSTERIA. Their sound encompasses the vintage and modern, blending everything with a seamless sonic dancefloor logic.

Bliss Inc. is the manifestation of a sonic ritual intent on guiding us through the internal journey towards self- discovery. Releases on Magicwire & Radiant Records have been heard in clubs and mixes across the world finding its way into the hearts of music lovers who longed for the art of progression back in its purest form.

And we're closing off with the absolute legend and a lesbian icon from Berlin that some of you might remember from the second cuddles edition DJ AYA. We don't need to add much more here, fuck it up, girlie. 

Doors ⇾  23:00 - 11am
Early bird ⇾  12€
Early entry ⇾  14€
Boxoffice ⇾ 18€
BIPOC list ⇾  10€
 
More info:

⇾ BIPOC and TINA folks will be able to get reduced entry, reach out to us at team@cuddlesberlin.com and we'll sort it out
⇾ Tickets will be available through RA and reduced amount at the door
⇾ Cuddles is a queer, free and inclusive space
⇾ We don't tolerate any form of harassment, homophobia, transphobia, racism, sexism or shaming, you will be asked to leave
⇾ If you see anyone breaking any of these rules, or feel bad or unsafe, please reach out to the staff, we'll try our best to help you!


We can’t wait to cuddle and dance with you!
be cute, be cunt, clothes off, come cuddle,


The Poodles!

lineup: Franco Falsini, Cáit , Cromby , DJ TEETH , Inner Zone , Maara , TPR DJ
information:
As the sun sets on another summer season, it’s time to step into the night. Hypersoft resumes its regular programming on October 12 at OXI, with the legendary Franco Falsini, co-founder of influential and boundary-pushing label Interactive Test. He’s joined on the X Floor by UK prog ambassadors Inner Zone, and Hypersoft residents TPR & DJ TEETH. 

On the O Floor, you’ll find trouble always comes in threes, with Cáit, Maara, and Cromby – three DJs who know a thing or two about moving a dancefloor on the faster end of the spectrum – with their modern takes on house, prog, acid, bass and techno. Together, the two floors represent past, present and future sounds spanning eras, style, pace and kinetics: aka, just good music. This is going to be a night to remember.

€1 from every ticket goes to LesMigraS, the anti-discrimination and anti-violence section of Lesbian Counselling Centre Berlin e.V.

lineup: Volcov
information:
Intro:
Welcome to Endless Groove Sessions; our series of Loft inspired, non-profit parties where we eat, share and dance together. Each intimate gathering is preceded by a lunch, followed by a dancing session soundtracked through an extended set by one of our favourite selectors.

Launched in 2022 in Stockholm, this marks our first Berlin edition, a collab with our dear friends at Manchester based Building:Bridges, who work tirelessly to organise ‘Dances for good’,

All profits made from this edition will benefit two great organisations:  - Berlin Legal Fund, & Berliner Obdachlosenhilfe. A small allocation of solidarity tickets will be available at half price. Please contact us directly on instagram.

===

Guest:
Our special guest is Volcov: the Italian DJ, producer and record label founder is one of the most renowded selectors, an indiviual who has spent his entire life pushing quality music either in clubs & festivals, through his 'From the Archive' radio show, as well as through multiple releases on his label ', showcasing his music as we as the work of fellow seminal artists such as Dego, Kirk Degiorgio, Domu, Lars Bartkuhn, Fred P, Patrice Scott, Skymark, The Abstract Eye, Patrick Gibin & Kaidi Tatham. 

===

Lunch:
Sold separately at the venue, it will consist of a delicious vegan meal consisting of a hearty coconut chickpea curry, salad and rice. Leftovers will be packaged and donated to Berliner Obdachlosenhilfe. We’ll also host a fruit bar which everyone is welcome to enjoy for free.

===

Times:
- 1400: Doors open.
- 1400 to 1530: Group lunch. 
- 1530 to 1600: Talk w/ Berlin Legal Fund & Berliner Obdachlosenhilfe.   
- 1600 to 2300: Grooving w/ Volcov.

===

Rules:
  ***Don't be an asshole***
If you or anyone experiences any form of harassment or discrimination please inform us and our awareness team will do our very best to ensure everyone's safety.

event_name: Milky Way Closing with Miss Madeline, Demisanté fka Demi Yo'ko, Meg10 and Euvn
lineup: Miss Madeline, Demisanté fka Demi Yo'ko, Meg10 , Euvn
information:
For the closing night of MILKY WAY, we are excited to host Miss Madeline (live), Demisanté [FKA Demi Yo'Ko] (live), Meg10 and Euvn.

Embracing themes of nostalgia and youth, Esben Weile Kjær’s installation will be paired with musical performances that each offer their own distinctive take on pop culture, art, satire and indie revival. Starting with a soundscape composed by frequent collaborator Europa, the first performance starts at midnight with shapeshifting artist Demisanté [FKA Demi Yo’Ko], followed by a DJ set by club pop producer Euvn. The night will culminate in a live set of lyrical and choreographic prowess by NYC royalty Miss Madeline, finally closing with a DJ set by Hoe_mies ringleader Meg10.

Doors at 22:00

About the exhibition:

TRAUMA is pleased to present Milky Way, a solo exhibition by Danish artist Esben Weile Kjær. Kjær’s multidisciplinary work across sculpture and performance clashes the visual vocabularies of entertainment, fashion, and contemporary art in a critical investigation of youth-cultural rituals past and present.

In TRAUMA’s theatre space, Kjær has erected a large, navigable concrete structure that recalls two iconic, if melancholic, architectural typologies from the recent past: Soviet playgrounds and the quintessential WW2 bunkers along the West European coastline (known officially as the Atlantic Wall). The severe brutalist design of the artist’s construction is contrasted by a child-like playfulness, inviting audiences to climb the structure via its stairs or to try its built-in slide. The bunker’s exterior is embellished by several neon works on the building’s exterior and several stained-glass windows. While the neon works display fluorescent plants with diamond-crusted flowers crawling up the building’s exterior, the windows’ illuminated motifs are inspired by NASA imagery of new galaxies forming in the Milky Way. In this clash of spatial and visual iconographies, Kjær explores the status of bygone utopian visions under the sign of the perpetual new: how dreams are made material as aesthetics, how they inevitably fade, and how they might reawaken and remind us (of something) anew.

The show is part of Berlin Art Week 2024 Featured Section

----------------------------------------------------

If your personal situation doesn’t allow you to afford a full-priced ticket, please contact us directly no later than 1 day before the event: reduced (at) traumabarundkino.de

information:
"Ich mache Lärm und organisiere ihn manchmal in halbwegs erkennbaren Mustern", sagt Moe Espinoza alias Drumcell über seine Musik. Er wurde im San Gabriel Valley von Los Angeles geboren, einer kulturell vielfältigen Gegend, die seine Musik bis heute prägt. Zusammen mit den RaÌz-Brüdern gründete er Anfang der 2000er Jahre Droid Behavior, das unter anderem durch die Interface Warehouse Partys und das Label Droid Recordings bekannt wurde. Drumcell verbindet analoge und digitale Musikästhetiken und entwickelt einen hypnotischen, herausfordernden Techno-Stil. Seit Anfang der nuller Jahre arbeitet er immer wieder eng mit David Flores alias Audio Injection zusammen, der ebenfalls in Los Angeles aufgewachsen ist und in seiner Jugend anfing, auf Underground Warehouse Raves und Wüstenpartys aufzulegen. 2011 gründete Flores sein Techno-Alias Truncate und verlieh seiner Musik eine rohe, minimalistische Funkyness, die seine Tracks bis heute in die Sets der Techno-Größen spült. Zur heutigen Klubnacht spielen die beiden nach über vier Jahren wieder einmal zusammen in Berghain. Zum 25. Soundstream-Jubiläum spielt unter anderem Romy Pope alias Snow in der Panorama Bar, die nach einer typischen Hamburg-Sozialisierung mit Ladomat-Volontariat, Pudel-Club-Residency und Dial-Connection inzwischen in Berlin lebend auch hier ihre Partyreihe Saturnite veranstaltet.

“I make noise and sometimes organize it in semi recognizable patterns”, says Moe Espinoza aka Drumcell about his music. He was born in the San Gabriel Valley of Los Angeles, a culturally diverse area that still influences his music today. In the early 00s, he and the Raíz brothers founded Droid Behavior, a group that gained notoriety for its Interface warehouse parties and the Droid Recordings label. Drumcell combines analogue and digital music aesthetics, developing a hypnotic, challenging techno style. Since the early 00s, he has been working regularly with David Flores aka Audio Injection, who also grew up in Los Angeles and started off DJing at underground warehouse and desert raves. In 2011, Flores launched his techno alias Truncate, giving his music a raw, minimalist funk that continues to be heard in the sets of techno giants to this day. For this weekend's Klubnacht, they will be joining forces once again on the Berghain floor after more than four years. For Soundstream's 25th anniversary he will also be joined by Romy Pope aka Snow made the rounds in Hamburg with practical training at Ladomat, a residency at Golden Pudel Club and a connection to Dial, meanwhile living in Berlin, where she puts on her Saturnite party series.

Hedomanie isn’t about dressing up – it’s about reinventing yourself. Show your true enchanted self and discover the magic within you! Let yourself be swept away by driving beats into a world full of sensuality!

We are excited to have a talented body painter, Klee, with us who will be adorning guests with her stunning art. Let Klee transform you into a living masterpiece, perfectly complementing your dark, mystical, or kinky persona for the night. (IG teufelsfae/)

Performance: Let yourself be surprised by Kama Duo:
The Doll’s dominion:

Under a moonlit stage, the towering Pan creature moved, manipulating his porcelain doll. Suddenly, her eyes flickered open, and she slipped from his grasp, dancing with eerie grace. With each step, she wove a spell, binding the Pan to her will. With a final, cruel smile, she set him ablaze, the flames licking upward as he powerless,  bent to her command.

event_name: Cosmic Pineta @Lighthouse Plötzensee with Budino, Luca Carluccio & More
lineup: 🪩 MUSIC , Budino, Luca Carluccio , Ansonica , Eclectic Elektra , Marco Ohboy , , 🔮 ARTS , Cristal, Kuroneko, Kunstlerina
information:
The Stars Align Under the Pine Trees! 

Cosmic Circuit and Pineta are joining forces for an  all-day celebration at The Lighthouse in Plötzensee, one of our favorite spots in Berlin. 
What makes Plötzensee so special to us? It’s not just the breathtaking beauty, but the way this place connects us to nature and each other. Surrounded by the vibrant colors of autumn, we'll be dancing lakeside with stunning views and rising energies from noon till midnight.

The iconic Budino will be gracing the Lighthouse booth this Saturday. Known to be an impeccable selector, weaving together cosmic soundscapes and entrancing rhythms, her set will be the perfect soundtrack for this endless, idyllic day by the lake.

We are also very excited to welcome our dear friend and admired artist Luca Carluccio, who will bring his fresh, boundary-defying sound and take you on a journey through a spectrum of styles and tempos.

Your beloved party hosts, Marco Ohboy, Eclectic Elektra and Ansonica, will be playing a triple b2b together for the first time to warm up the floor and set the tone for what's to come, so come early to witness this special debut.


Besides music, we will be hosting a range of creative activities during the afternoon, such as tarot card reading, collage and face painting.

Invite your friends and let’s make memories and take this one for the books!!

information:
We are thrilled to announce that AL.FESTIVAL 2024 is just around the corner! This annual music festival in Berlin is a vibrant celebration of contemporary pop and alternative music from the South West Asian and North African (SWANA) regions. Now in its fifth edition, the festival is deeply rooted in Berlin's diverse and dynamic SWANA diaspora, uniting artists, activists, and music lovers who share a passion for culture, art, and anti-fascist values.


Join us at AL.FESTIVAL 2024 to experience an inspiring exchange of social ideas, sensibilities, and cultural experiences. Be part of this exciting event and help shape a progressive future for Europe and the SWANA region!

lineup: Manta [Visionskollektiv], NoSpice [Visionskollektiv], Qualia Trax [Visionskollektiv, Nest]
information:
It’s a cuddly muddly house party!
Come join us on the 12th of October at Crack Bellmer for a cozy session, from 3 to 10PM. We provide a yumyum buffet, ping pong and an interactive programme.
We will start with an entry level vinyl workshop, explaining how a vinyl player is set up, how to cue your records and how to get your first transitions done. RSVP through the link further down.
Afterwards we invite you to join our sweet karaoke session with an open queue and lots of room for performances. Avril Lavigne, ABBA or Wir sind Helden? You name it, you sing it. Don’t be shy, rock the mic, you are the star!
Finally we close the evening with some VK residents DJ sets going b2b2b, providing some juicy grooves to either make you dance or run around the ping pong table (we see you lol).
Entry is 10€ suggested donation - feel free to pay as much as you want and can.
There is no place for any form of discrimination, unconsentual behaviour or harassment. If you feel unwell please contact the bar, door, or organizers of the evening.

Timetable:
15 - 17: vinyl workshop
17 - 18: karaoke
18 - 22: dj sets

lineup: Rina Katen b2b justcallmesergio , Loves_kills b2b Slow PSTL , Maksym Tkach
information:
Vechornytsi: 

"Ukrainian traditional parties with music, songs, jokes and rituals. Vechornytsi began in the late September after the seasonal agricultural works were over. Young people from Ukrainian villages gathered in the evenings and had parties.These were everyday and festive Vechornytsi." 

Vechornytsi is inviting the community to a groovy gathering at Crack Bellmer, to showcase Music and Art by the beautiful Ukrainian artists currently in Berlin. 

The goal of this Vechornytsi is to raise awareness of russia’s terrorist invasion of Ukraine, while raising money to provide direct support to various efforts taking place today Ukraine. 

This Vechir will also include a tattoo booth which will be operated by our very talented friends. 

Donation box will be at the door! 

*All proceeds and donations will go to supporting Ukraine* 

Please remember: Crack Bellmer is a cozy and intimate venue - let's look out for each other and make sure everyone is welcome and safe. All humans are welcome if they enter the space with the necessary level of respect, care and consent for everyone in the building. If anyone violates this basic rule, please approach any of us, the door staff, the bar staff, or anyone else working at Crack Bellmer. We will make sure that any uncomfortable situation is handled immediately. 

Come. Be Kind. Dance. Get a Tattoo. Donate. Enjoy <3

the event is a testament to sonic extremity—a raw, abrasive journey through the outer edges of electronic music.

Visually striking and sonically unforgiving, HARSH VOICES pushes boundaries, tearing through conventional soundscapes with a brutal and unapologetic edge. Every act adds another layer of intensity, crafting an atmosphere where the air itself vibrates with noise and harshness.

This is a night where music becomes a weapon, an unrelenting force that challenges, provokes, and obliterates. It’s harsh, it’s filthy, and it’s loud as hell—a true baptism in sound for the initiated.

Join us at t.me/+pcjQumr2OYI0ZTQ6

Der magische Ort, an dem alles zusammenkommt, als hätte das Universum einen Glücksknopf gedrückt.

Samstags lädt Beate ein, dich familiär und wohlig, dennoch fetzig und heiter, zu feinstem House und Disco glücklich zu tanzen.

Sweetspot (n) /ˈswiːt ˌspɒt/:

 A magical zone where everything comes together as if the universe clicked the happiness button. 

On Saturdays, Beate invites you to dance joyously to the best house and disco music in a comfortable, yet funky and lively atmosphere. 

Come together or alone, and let the music unite you.

Just be you, your BU.

Uferkind

△ All are welcome at Beate Uwe and every person should feel safe and comfortable! That means: We have absolutely zero tolerance for racism, sexism, antisemitism, queer-phobia, ableism, or any other form of discrimination.

△ Have you lost or forgotten something? Just come to the entry during our events and ask or send an e-mail to lostandfound@beate-uwe.de.

lineup: Lindred
information:
Live electronic music meets burlesque in this genre-bending cabaret, set onboard the spaceship of a mysterious coven of pleasure-worshiping witches. Drawing on industrial, fetish, and occult influences, Techno Sex Witches in Space features public ritual, striptease, live music, and performances by a multidisciplinary all-star cast.
The show paints a lavish picture of the pain, pleasure, and catharsis of healing. After a century of war, the Witches of the Body are finally returning to their home planet, where they must perform a ritual to ensure the survival of their kind. Before they arrive, they must heal themselves through whatever magic they can muster after the tragedies of war. Will they succeed?
Only the Balance can decide.

event_name: Stine Janvin & Morten Joh pres Death Songs
lineup: Stine Janvin & Morten Joh
information:
silent green presents: Death Songs is a new project by Stine Janvin (voice and electronics) and Morten Joh (synths and percussion), drawing inspiration from death-related music. They focus on the "Liksong" tradition from their native south-western Norway, known for its slow, eerie funeral procession songs. Analyzing archive recordings, they rediscover the use of neutral intervals, recreating them in a voice-driven, microtonal electronic music. Morten Joh has been influential in various musical constellations, while Stine Janvin is known for her conceptual vocal works and interdisciplinary art, presented internationally.

Saturday, 12. October
silent green Kuppelhalle
Doors: 7 pm / Start: 8 pm

information: SOLAR Sky-Bar is situated close to Potsdamer Platz, right in the heart of Berlin, located on the 16th and 17th floor of an appartment building. Enjoy our fantastic 270-degree view on comfortable couches and swings or lounge-beds in our separate smoking area. Local heroes and international acts accompany our living room atmosphere with their freshest and favorite tunes from House, Electronica, Downbeat, Jazz, Soul, Hiphop and Chillout.

lineup: Mondfinsternis
Mr. Cigarette Butt, Hunky Dory
information:
Under the Wires with DJs Mr. Cigarette Butt and Hunky Dory, a killer combo that will make you dance until your shoes and pelvic bones wear out. 

Mr Cigarette Butt:
Years spent listening to old cassettes, then old vinyls that sounded devastated but pure at the same time. Growing up with a voracious passion and addiction like a drug to music, especially from the underground scene, moving from the wildest rock and roll to the most synthetic sounds of the 80s, all well and truly stuffed with unhealthy lives. Dark punk with roots as deep as the blues. After many vicissitudes from Italy he ended up in Berlin among the city's wreckage. DJ, musician, promoter and much more.

Dj Hunky Dory: 
Since 2004, from the darkest cellars to the most underground venues in Berlin for all kinds of Wave/Post-Punk. In recent years active with the duo no tears for the creature if the night, taking their sound around the city.

lineup: Ron Trent - presents WARM (DJ Set), Marco Shuttle, Marylou, Sarah Wreath - Frequency Meditation (Live), Nathalia, Mitotili - Percussion Sound Bath (Live) & Cacao Ceremony , Venecia Runningwolf - Indigenous Sound Journey (Live)
information:
Nou:shh returns for its second edition, transforming a very special venue into a sanctuary of sound and holistic practices. Join us for an immersive sonic journey as we blend music and rituals to welcome the arrival of autumn and prepare for the seasonal shift.

Our lineup features seasoned veterans of organic, deep, and psychedelic soundscapes, offering you a sonic experience on one of the most advanced sound systems, the Martion Audio HiFi Horn.

In two distinct spaces, we’ve carefully curated a program designed to guide you through this transition with care. On the ‘Home’ floor, you'll experience an eclectic DJ set by the visionary Marylou, a percussive Sound Bath and Cacao Ceremony by Mitotili.

Our special guest, Ron Trent from Chicago, just back from his debut WARM EU live tour, will immerse us in resonant WARM sonics, capturing the essence of rhythm, harmony, and soulful vibrations. Additionally, Venecia Runningwolf will lead an Indigenous Sound Journey, offering live performances on the Guzheng and Flute.

Continue your journey of discovery in the ‘Sound Bar’, where Sarah Wreath presents a live set, designed for deep listening to specific frequencies as a sound meditation in conjunction with the horn speaker. This will be accompanied by ambient and experimental DJ sets from our favourite storytellers, Nathalia and Marco Shuttle.

Each element invites deep listening and introspection, creating a harmonious atmosphere for your journey. As the event unfolds, you can unwind in our sauna or enjoy a massage, letting the soothing music and tranquil atmosphere support your inner and collective experiences.

Nurture your mind, body, and soul as we gather in harmony with the changing season.

Food // Massages // Sauna Ritual // Tea // Conscious Practices

~

Date: Sunday 13th October
Time: 3pm - 10pm
Doors and Sauna open at 2pm

Ticket price 
Presale €22 (ex.service fee)
Door price €26 
~

Please note: OSD is no cash, card-only payments
For holistic practices, payments be made in cash or via PayPal.

lineup: Lars Hemmerling, Viktor Kampf, Tinco, Trig Crew
information: Trig is a new collective focused on building memorable experiences with the people they love. The collective was born out of community, from a desire to share emotions arising from the most fitting and pure sounds rooted in techno, house and electronic music, by creating rhythms characterised by percussive, hypnotic and visceral grooves that translate on the dance floor into a collective trance state. Trig’s vision is to entertain and connect people from different backgrounds, promoting freedom of expression, both individually and collectively. Aiming to become not just a party but in a carefree and safe communal environment. Trig is a Berlin-based collective.

The main floor is located in an old railway building made of steel and concrete. You won't just find Dracula and Dr Frankenstein in the darkroom.

information:
△ △ △ English below! △ △ △


Intimität braucht Raum und Zeit zum Teilen – wenn wir Sonntags unsere Teppiche im Beate Uwe ausbreiten, dann kreieren wir den Raum und die Zeit, zusammen das Erlebte noch einmal in Zärtlichkeit auszutauschen. Die schnelllebige Nacht birgt viele Erinnerungen – auf weichen Füßen wollen wir diese noch einmal in unsere Mitte bringen.

Beate Barfuß: Ruheraum.

Line Up:

Habikat

Joanna Lenta

Mikal Aton

WIEK

---------------------------------

△ Nur Abendkasse.

△ Das Beate Uwe ist Barrierefrei und ein Nichtraucherlokal.

△ Jeder Mensch ist bei Beate Uwe willkommen und soll sich wohl und sicher fühlen! Das heißt: jegliche Art von Rassismus, Sexissmus, Antisemitismus, Queer-phobie, Ableismus oder sonstige Formen von Diskriminierung werden absolut nicht toleriert.

△ Du hast etwas verloren oder vergessen? Komm Fr-So zu einer unserer Veranstaltungen vorbei und frag an der Kasse oder schicke uns eine Mail an lostandfound@beate-uwe.de.




△ △ △ ENGLISH △ △ △

Intimacy needs space and time to share – when we spread out our carpets at Beate Uwe on Sundays, we create the space and time to gently exchange our experiences together once again. The fast-paced night holds many memories – on soft feet, we want to bring them back into our midst once more.

Beate Barefoot: room to relax.
---------------------------------

Line-Up:

Habikat

Joanna Lenta

Mikal Aton

WIEK

---------------------------------

△ Tickets at the door only.

△ Beate Uwe is accessible for people with disabilities and is a non-smoking club.

△ All are welcome at Beate Uwe and every person should feel safe and comfortable! That means: We have absolutely zero tolerance for racism, sexism, antisemitism, queer-phobia, ableism, or any other form of discrimination.

△ Have you lost or forgotten something? Just come to the entry during our events and ask or send an e-mail to lostandfound@beate-uwe.de.

lineup: Edoardo Micheli , AIEL, KC
information:
Album presentation

HYPERKLASSIꓘ V.1 is the distillation of five years of work in dismembering and deconstructing the rotting remains of an hegemonic culture: the Western musical tradition. The shreds reassembled into fluorescent orchids, rain-flooded forests, dreamed cities, and deep waters where humans swim who understand the language of fish, corals, and constellations in the sky above. But it is also a very personal sound diary, the manifesto of a liberating, playful and quite ignorant electronic music practice, and a chaotic declaration of love.

The album presentation will be followed by a live set by AIEL, who also contributed to the album with a track, and a DJ-set by KC. 
Visuals by Cẩm-Anh Lương

information: Solidarity Time - der heissgeliebte Hybrid der blank´schen Gartenparties meldet sich zurück. Sogar Arturs Teestübchen gibt sich die Ehre, denn es geht um Maja und Hanna, um Aufmerksamkeit und auch um Geld. Gemeinsam mit Antifaschistinnen und Freundinnen der beiden Inhaftierten, fährt Elliver alles auf, was die hedonistisch orientierte Feiergemeinschaft zu bieten hat: Schnapsrad, Dosenbier, Lesung, K.G.N.N.S., Karaoke, zu viele DJs und als Kern der Veranstaltung einen Infotisch. Hier der Call to Action: pack deine Freund*innen ein und komm am Sonntag 13. Oktober ins Gartenparadies ans Ostkreuz. Solidarität ist wunderbar! Um 13:12 Uhr geht es los. Vergünstigter Eintritt bis 14:00 Uhr.

lineup: Mollono.Bass, Dole & Kom, Leah Marie, LEENI & Danilo Kupfernagel, Lockige Ostsee
information:
Ahoi ihr Lieben …
die Tage werden wieder kürzer, die Klamotten wieder länger. In unseren Köpfen kreisen warme Erinnerungen an den sommerlichen Wald, den See und wahr gewordene Freiluft-Utopien im Licht der heißen Sonne... Aber in der frischen Morgenluft spüren wir, dass die kalte Jahreszeit näher kommt. Es ist der perfekte Moment, um mit einer 3000Grad Sonntags Sause den Übergang von der Festival- zur Club-Saison zu feiern. Wir beginnen bei schönem Wetter um 14 Uhr draußen, mit Kaffee und Kuchen, mit zackigen Beats und fetten Bässen. Später geht es drinnen im Luftschloss weiter – die Speisen und Getränke ändern sich dort womöglich, der Sound bleibt treibend, melodiös und organisch.

lineup: The Headhunters (Ropeadope Records/US) *live*, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
The Headhunters: Stilprägendes Jazz-Funk-Ensemble auf Europa Tournee

The Headhunters, das legendäre Jazz-Funk-Ensemble unter der Leitung des Schlagzeugers Bill Summers und des Perkussionisten Mike Clark sowie Donald Harrison am Altsaxophon, feierte 2023 sein 50-jähriges Bestehen. Jetzt sind sie auf einer ausgedehnten Europa Tournee und kommen bei uns im Gretchen vorbei.

Nur wenige Bands können auf eine so wechselvolle Geschichte zurückblicken. Jedes einzelne Mitglied der 1973 von Herbie Hancock um die Aufnahmen der klassischen Alben “Head Hunters“ und “Thrust“ herum gegründeten Band, hat Geschichte geschrieben. Zusammen führten sie Fusion und Funk zusammen, definierten das Genre des Funk-Jazz und machten den Synthesizer im Jazz endgültig salonfähig. Was dabei herauskam, ist bis heute sensationell. In den Melodien klingen Curtis Mayfield, James Brown und Sly Stone durch, die Rhythmen sind in Funk, Soul und R’n’B verwurzelt, doch die Sensibilität und die Freiheit kommen aus dem Jazz. Ein geerdeter und tanzbarer Sound, der den Jazz einem breiteren Publikum zugänglich gemacht hat und so manchen Genre Puristen der damaligen Zeit nachhaltig verstörte.

1975 löste sich die Verbindung zu Herbie Hancock. Seitdem sind acht weitere Alben ohne Hancocks Beteiligung entstanden, angefangen mit Survival of the Fittest (1975) und Straight from the Gate (1977) sowie zuletzt Speakers In the House (2022) und Live From Brooklyn Bowl (2023). Dabei ist nichts von der spirituellen Energie und Innovationsfreude der Anfangstage verloren gegangen. Ihre Mischung aus Jazz, Funk und Fusion inspirierte über Jahrzehnte hinweg Musiker*innen aller Genres und wurde in den 80er und 90er Jahren von unzähligen Hip-Hop Künstler*innen gesampelt.

Die aktuelle Band besteht aus einem Quintett mit Clark, Summers und Harrison sowie dem Bassisten Chris Severin und dem Pianisten Kyle Roussel.

Photo: Rick Swig

________________________________________


Few bands can boast a history as fortuitous and storied as The Headhunters. That history began back in 1973 when iconic musician Herbie Hancock formed the Headhunters - saxophonist/clarinetist Bennie Maupin, bassist Paul Jackson Jr., drummer Harvey Mason, and percussionist Bill Summers. What each member of the Headhunters brought to the table helped forge a timeless legacy and history that most bands can only dream of. Their blend of jazz with funk and rock reached millions of fans of jazz, rock, funk, and R&B alike. With over a million albums sold, the band’s legacy would inspire musicians of every genre for years to come, be sampled by various rap artists throughout the '80s and '90s, and influence countless musicians' styles of playing today.


The Headhunters’ impact remains a global phenomenon, and their time with Hancock proved to be a life changing experience. The band has released 6 more full length albums including "Thrust" in 1974 with the addition of drummer Mike Clark, struck out on their own in 1975, without Hancock's involvement, on "Survival of the Fittest” and on "Straight from the Gate” in 1977.


After a twenty year hiatus they reunited in 1998 with Hancock for the Verve album "Return of the Headhunters" with Clark, Jackson, and Summers performing as the Headhunters actively touring until the March 2021 passing of Jackson. In addition to original members Clark and Summers, the line up of the band consists of Chris Severin on bass, Donald Harrison on saxophone and Kyle Roussel on piano.

 

“The Headhunters’ spirit music spans generations, genres and the cosmos itself.”
- Jazziz Magazine

“This record serves as '“Actual Proof” that the sources behind jazz fusion’s fount still have a lot to say.”
- Downbeat Magazine

“The pronounced Cubano-Latin swing and sway is positively infectious in its breezy air and may well compel not only repeated playings of the disc in very quick succession but perhaps also even some inclusions on more than a few Best of the Year lists.”
- All About Jazz

Photo: Rick Swig

lineup: Impérieux
information:
The night kicks off with a special screening of E.1027 – Eileen Gray and the House by the Sea. This captivating film, directed by Beatrice Minger and co-directed by Christoph Schaub, tells the story of the pioneering Irish architect Eileen Gray and her struggle over the ownership and legacy of her iconic modernist house. E.1027 is more than just a story about architecture but a testimony of a woman’s fight for her own space.*
After diving deep into the world of architecture and creativity, you’ll have the chance to engage into an interactive discussion with the directors in our Q+A session! Afterwards, we invite you to stay a little longer, grab a drink and enjoy wonderful music by Impérieux.

lineup: Milan Ring
information:
Sydney-based Milan Ring is one of the most exciting modern R&B artists in the world. She is not only a fantastic singer, but also a songwriter, guitarist, producer, mixer and musical director for various productions. The list of artists she has worked with so far reads like pure name dropping: Questlove, DRAM, Chance The Rapper's Band, The Social Experiment, Intellexual, Che Lingo, Jean Deaux, TA-KU, BARKAA, Winston Surfshirt and Sampa The Great - to name just a few.

But Milan Ring's own music is even more exciting: she released her debut album "I'm Feeling Hopeful" in 2021 and was celebrated by NME, The Guardian and Crack Magazine. Her second album "Mangos" was recently released: ten fantastic, smooth, perfectly produced songs between R&B, electronica and modern pop. The songs "Photograph" and "High As The Moon" are particularly hard to get out of your head once you've heard them. Milan Ring said in an interview that she aims to use her songs "to cultivate love for others, but also to build a romantic relationship with myself, with life and with nature". Her guiding principle: "Keep your heart open and stay vulnerable, allow the rest to unfold as it should." A sentence that also sums up the vibe of her engaging live shows quite well.

lineup: Open Decks for Vinyl DJs
information:
VINYL ONLY! 

Jeden Dienstag ab 18:00 Uhr. Seit inzwischen mehr als 10 Jahren ist der Dienstag mit "Open Decks & Tischtennis" im Humboldthain Club eine feste Instanz für Nordberliner Bewegungsjunkies. 

Ob die Platten zum Auflegen, die Kellen fürs Tischtennis oder die Ballerinas für den Floor – jeden Dienstag könnt ihr euer Spielzeug mitbringen und vom Wochenende entschlacken. 
Ob Techno, Drum and Bass, Disco oder Mamas Schlagersammlung – jeder Stil ist willkommen und wird vom Publikum abgefeiert. 

Daher bietet der "Open Decks Abend" vielen jungen DJs eine nach wie vor einzigartige Plattform zur Darbietung ihrer Künste und zum Austausch untereinander. 

Zwei Tischtennisplatten, genug Kellen für alle, ein Kickertisch, satter Sound aus den Boxen und nicht zuletzt leckeres Bier vom Fass, tragen dazu bei, dass eine stetig wachsende Zahl an gut gelaunten Menschen den Dienstag im Humboldthain Club zu ihrer Homebase erklärt hat. 

FAQ Frage: Wie läuft das mit dem Auflegen? 
Antwort: Zu Beginn jeder Veranstaltung liegt an der Mainbar eine Liste mit den DJ-Slots für den Abend aus. 

Jeder Slot geht eine halbe Stunde und jeder DJ darf nur einen (seinen) Namen in die Liste eintragen. 
Pro Abend gibt es 20 Slots! 
Es empfiehlt sich also, nicht all zu spät zu kommen, sonst ist die Liste voll.

lineup: TECHNO MITTWOCH: TUNNEL/TURBINE , Behrooz Moosavi, Leonard de Leonard, Basstronauten, SPEEDFREAK, Martin K, Samuelyc , ....
information:
Get ready for another intense midweek session for Berlin's most dangerous day of the week to rave - WEDNESDAY Lose yourself at AVA Club in the heart of Berlin - underneath the Train Tracks of Warschauer Str S-Bahn Station. This is where your weekend starts or ends on Wednesday! Join us for Mittwoch every week to feel the rolling bass lines and deep kick drums of techno, hard techno, and trance punching through the speakers all night. And since there’s no drama at the door, everyone can experience our best and most sensual night without compromise. Just close your eyes, forget your name, forget the world: It’s Mittwoch. WARNING: Partying on a Wednesday may be hazardous to your health, studies or work...but fuck it,  

Come in your best techno outfit or whatever you feel most comfortable. The most important thing is that you are ready to experience the night and surrender to the music. Techno Wednesday is a celebration of TECHNO culture that pushes the boundaries of what is possible. It is an invitation to immerse yourself in a world where time stands still and music reigns. Get your tickets now and be part of this electrifying night! Leave everyday life behind you and immerse yourself in the world of techno. See you on the dance floor! 


YOLO! DON'T FORGET: ARRIVE BEFORE MIDNIGHT, EACH TICKET HOLDER IS ELIGIBLE TO BRING ONE FREE GUEST!

lineup: Grinderteeth, Domi, Synthtati , Cvntmom , Krohm
information:
ABOV is the newborn FLINTA* collective led by Domi (aka Follakzoid).

ABOV is a safe space created by FLINTA* for FLINTA*, for all the beauties that have ever been harassed, discriminated against or worse just for being themselves.

FLINTA* is an umbrella term representing female, lesbian, inter*, non-binary/enby, trans*, and agender people.

After the first successful party in NYC, ABOV is now being deployed in Berlin for the first time with a line up of the most hidden and polished gems of the coral sea of diversity.

To open the night we will have the honor to host grinderteeth, a renown musician and artist that has just recently led the new Lab.oratory FLINTA* party SLIT in Berghain among her many other performances and musical sets.

To continue the night, we’ll have Cvntmom, the vanguardist post erotic performer, club owner and head of Berlin’s most underground and quality hotpot party: diskota forte take us into really wet and steamy frequencies.

As we go deep into the night the majestic touch of Synthtati will be paired with Domi in a b2b that will make the eyes wide shut melody seem like a child’s lullaby.

To close the ceremony Krohm will glitch whatever is left in our souls in order to leave us all like empty vessels ready to be possessed by the energy of the queen of the night herself.

The whole night will be hosted by one of the strongest and most beautiful beings in Berlin, The one and only Frau Dark.

If you attend our events, and you are not FLINTA* remember where you are at all times and that this is a space created for us that you may enjoy and support respectfully.

There will be no tolerance for any sort of harassment or inappropriate behavior.


KEEP IT CUTIE!
