event_name: URSULA RUCKER & TIM MOTZER - Begin Anew Tour'24 *live
promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: Ursula Rucker (!K7, Noizeboy /US) & Tim Motzer (1Krecordings/US) *live, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Mit der Poetin, Aktivistin und Spoken Word-Künstlerin Ursula Rucker und dem Gitarristen Tim Motzer kommen zwei Künstler*innen zu uns, die seit vielen Jahren in unterschiedlichen Konstellationen gemeinsam arbeiten. Für sich genommen sind beide schon episch, zusammen sind sie eine Naturgewalt. Auf ihrer Begin Anew Tour '24 bringen sie einen elektrisierenden Soundmix mit, in dem alle Genres miteinander kollidieren. House, Hip-Hop, Electronica und Jazz (to name a few...) verbinden sich mit der Poesie Ursula Ruckers und ihrer reichen, akzentuierten Stimme, die wohl zu den größten und schönsten lebendigen Instrumenten der Welt gehört. Das Tourprogramm umfasst neue Werke, klassische Tracks von Ursulas Platten sowie Songs aus den zahlreichen Kollaborationen mit Künstler*innen wie 4Hero, The Roots, King Britt, Hannes Bieger, Charles Webster und vielen anderen.

Seit fast drei Jahrzehnten begeistert Rucker das Publikum auf der ganzen Welt mit ihrer mitreißenden Bildsprache. Aufgewachsen in einem Vorort von Philadelphia, begann sie in ihren Zwanzigern bei Open Mice Sessions aufzutreten. 1994 gelang ihr der internationale Durchbruch, als sie die Lead-Stimme für den Klassiker „Supernatural“ von King Britt und seinem Projekt Firefly sang. Ihr Debütalbum "Supa Sista" (2021) erreichte ein breites Publikum und strotzt wie alle ihre Soloalben vor Kraft und musikalischer Vielfalt. Mit ihrem Stil, der Poesie und Politik mit Philly-Soul, Jazz, Hip-Hop und Electronica verbindet, verpackt sie komplexe Zusammenhänge in zugängliche Bilder, ohne je belehrend zu wirken. Über allem schweben ihre Texte, die Musik verleiht den Worten Flügel und die klare Schönheit ihrer Stimme transportiert die Botschaft in unsere Herzen.

Tim Motzer ist ein Gitarrist, der die Vielfalt liebt, ein Pionier des Sounds - bekannt für seine unverwechselbare akustisch-elektronische Gitarrenstimme, bei der er Live-Looping, Bogenspiel, Elektronik und präparierte Techniken einsetzt. Seine Arbeit als Leader und Sideman kreuzt viele musikalische Welten, darunter Jazz, Fusion, Prog, Hip-Hop, Soul, Electronica und Avantgarde. Er hat mit Größen wie David Sylvian, Burnt Friedman, Jaki Liebezeit, King Britt, Jamaaladeen Tacuma, Vernon Reid, David Torn, Pat Mastelotto und Percy Jones zusammengearbeitet. Auf seinem eigenen Label 1k Recordings sind über 65 Veröffentlichungen seiner Solo- und Gemeinschaftsarbeiten erschienen.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

Photo: Tim Motzer

______________________________________-


Legendary Philly Poet Ursula Rucker continues the stories with longtime collaborator and world renowned guitarist Tim Motzer for their Begin Anew Tour and return to Europe in 2024.

Ursula Rucker and Tim Motzer have been working together for a long time, since 1998— from Sylk 130 days in Philadelphia, and then starting a duet relationship in 2000 that went on to become a long-term friendship and co-artist-ship of...recording, touring all over the world together starting in 2001 that brought them to legendary festivals and countless renowned music/art/theatre venues doing their experiential LIVE concerts for 20+ years....collaborating with wonderful musicians/artists/people...across many genres, practices and places.

With the Begin Anew Tour Europe ’24, Ursula Rucker and Tim Motzer bring an electrifying sonic gumbo, a collision of all genres, including new works, house music, hip hop, electronic, plus classic tracks from Ursula’s records as well songs from the many collaborations over the years with artists such as such as 4Hero, The Roots, King Britt, and most recently Hannes Bieger, Charles Webster, amongst others.

Mother, Poet, Singer, recording artist, activist, teacher Ursula Rucker is a certified veteran of the global music and poetry scene. A skilled writer and dynamic performer, Rucker’s rich and textured voice is one of the world’s great, living instruments. Born and raised in Philadelphia, Rucker began to share her poetic gifts in her 20s, performing at open mics in the city before two standout recorded performances announced to the world that Rucker was an emerging force to be reckoned with.

Tim Motzer is a technicolor multi-layered guitarist, a sonic pioneer—widely known for his distinct textural acoustic-electro guitar voice utilizing live looping, bowing, electronics, and prepared techniques. He has collaborated with numerous musical luminaries including David Sylvian, Burnt Friedman, Jaki Liebezeit (CAN), poet Ursula Rucker, King Britt, Jamaaladeen Tacuma, Vernon Reid, David Torn, Pat Mastelotto (King Crimson), and Percy Jones (Brand X, Eno), among others. Tim is multi-instrumentalist, producer, recording engineer, composer for dance and film, improviser, visual artist, and runs his own label: 1k Recordings—with over 65 releases of his solo and collaborative work.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

event_name: Pharmakon + Kollaps + Lana del Rabies // Berlin
lineup: Pharmakon LIVE, Kollaps LIVE, Lana del Rabies LIVE
information:
"Pharmakon is the solo experimental music project of Margaret Chardiet based out of New York City and formed in 2007. Pharmakon's live musical act has been described as confrontational and concise, attempting to "cross the boundary between performer and audience". Her songs are completely prearranged both live and in recordings, more focused on perfecting a sound rather than generating randomness in noise.
Swamp Booking presents iconic noise/industrial artist Pharmakon for an 4 date exclusive tour in Europe/UK for March 2023. Having released some of noise and power electronics most revered records on the legendary label Sacred Bones, Pharmakon continues to be an unmatched force in underground music."
"Equally as revered as they are an anathema to audiences worldwide, the oppressive noise wall crafted by Kollaps has cemented the band in the history pages of industrial music. Kollaps' live shows are known for their vehement and visceral nature where their destructivist ideology manifests into self-mutilation, vitriolic, and violent live performances."
"Lana Del Rabies is a captivating force in underground dark electronic and fringe heavy music. Her distinct blend of industrial, gothic noise, and experimental metal delves into the esoteric brutality of human existence in a world overshadowed by the threat of apocalypse. Renowned for her intense and immersive live performances, Lana Del Rabies masterfully holds audiences in captive catharsis."

UNITY is a vibrant kinky community of free spirits who seek to connect with their souls and bodies in a respectful, sexy, and playful manner. information:
Die in diesem Frühjahr gestartete Party 10-5 steht für ein siebenstündiges DJ-Set, das einen ganzen Donnerstagabend umfasst. Diese Ausgabe begrüßt das Duo Force Reaction: Gianluca Caiati alias Kaiser und Mario Campos alias Kwartz, Teil des spanischen Techno-Labels und der Plattform PoleGroup. Eine sich langsam entfaltende, aber immer treibende Mischung aus mentalen und muskulösen Sounds ist zu erwarten.

Launched this spring, 10-5 means a seven-hour DJ set spanning an entire Thursday night. This edition welcomes duo Force Reaction: Gianluca Caiati aka Kaiser and Mario Campos aka Kwartz, part of the Spanish techno label and platform PoleGroup. Expect a slowly unfolding, but always driving mix of mental and muscular sounds.

event_name: Dial Radio Autumn Boogie with effgee, Arnaud Denzler, Sofia, de la Phone, RAYNE
lineup: effgee B2B Arnaud Denzler - 22.0, Sofia B2B de la Phone - 00.00, RAYNE - 02.00, Der Opium Queen - 03.30
information:
Come through to Dial Radio’s Autumn Boogie, dance to some tunes by the radio regulars, and contribute your own songs!

The idea is to step aside from highly-curated and very personalized radio shows; anyone who’s up for providing an extended playlist of songs can pick a sonic background for a moment in the day.

Each day features four moments: morning, afternoon, evening and night. Rather than live broadcasting, anyone can suggest a playlist of songs for one of those moments, lasting between 1 and 6 hours. These songs can come from a commercial provider (e.g. Youtube, Soundcloud, Spotify), or be a bunch of files sent by email.

If you like the idea and would like to participate, you can contribute some playlists.

event_name: Concrete Husband + Portable pres. African Ambient + Rahina
lineup: Concrete Husband + Portable pres. African Ambient + Rahina
information:
silent green presents:

Concrete Husband
Brooklyn-based DJ and music producer Concrete Husband crafts dynamic songs informed by his background as a classically trained flutist and composer. Performing live electronic music with flutes and vocals he creates dreamy, experimental soundscapes adorned with virtuosic flute technique, microtones and complex electronic sound design.

Portable
Artist Alan Abrahams aka Portable is set to launch a music project that bridges continents and cultures. Titled African Ambient, this innovative project is the brainchild of Portable, a South African native who, after 25 years in Europe, has woven the essence of his diverse experiences into a captivating musical tapestry, sound sculpting and transforming the source material into ambient form. Visually, Portable expands his performance with visual art created especially for this show.

Rahina
Music selector and radio host Rahina will be opening the night with an ethereal / ambient selection of music.

 

Thursday, October 17
Kuppelhalle
Doors 7 pm / Start 7 pm

promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: Baloji (BE/CD) *live*
information:
Baloji, geboren in Lubumbashi, Kongo (CD), ist ein Multitalent: Rapper, Songwriter, Regisseur, Dichter, Stylist und Schauspieler. Er wuchs im belgischen Lüttich auf und begann in den 90er Jahren mit dem Rappen im Trio Malfrats Linguistiques, aus dem später die weltbekannte Hip-Hop-Gruppe Starflam hervorging.

Musikalisch bewegt sich Baloji zwischen afrikanischer Musik, Rap, französicher SingerSongwriter Tradition, afro-amerikanischem Soul, Funk und Jazz. Den Weg dazu hat er über HipHop und die Technik des Samplens gefunden. Inspiriert hat ihn aber auch elektronische Musik. Balojis Ausdauer und Widerstandsfähigkeit steht im Zentrum seiner Arbeit. So schafft er es, all diese verschiedenen Einflüsse miteinander in Einklang zu bringen und damit seine kreativen Projekte anzureichern.

2008 veröffentlichte er sein erstes, sehr persönliches Soloalbum “Hôtel Impala“, das mit Gold und zwei Octaves de la Musique ausgezeichnet wurde.  2010 folgte das Album “Kinshasa Succursale“ und 2015 die EP “64 Bits and Malachite“. 

Nach seinem dritten Album “137 Avenue Kaniama“ von 2018 ist er nun mit einem monumentalen Projekt zurück: „Augure/Omen“ (2023) ist sein erster Spielfilm als Regisseur und erzählt die Geschichte eines Mannes, der aus Belgien in sein kongolesisches Heimatdorf zurückkehrt. Der Film wird von einem gewaltigen Soundtrack begleitet, der aus 4 EPs besteht, die jeweils die Perspektive eines der vier Hauptprotagonisten des Films einnehmen.

Der Soundtrack steckt voller Kollaborationen: Sampa The Great, Dj Lag, Jose James, IDPIzzle, Jamilia Woods, Natalie Bergman und viele andere erschaffen gemeinsam mit Baloji musikalische Welten der Extraklasse. Das Ergebnis ist eine fesselnde Mischung aus Hip-Hop, Afrobeats, Electronica, traditionellem Gesang, kongolesischer Rumba und vielen anderen Stilen.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

Photo: Kristin Lee Moolman

_____________________________________


Baloji, born in Lubumbashi, Congo (DC), is a rapper, songwriter, director, poet, stylist and actor. He grew up in Liège, Belgium. In the 90s, Baloji began rapping with the trio Malfrats Linguistiques, which went on to become the world-renowned hip-hop group: Starflam.

In 2008, he released his highly personal first solo album: Hôtel Impala, certified gold and won two Octaves de la Musique awards. In 2010, a second solo album, Kinshasa Succursale.

In 2015, a solo EP, 64 Bits and Malachite.  In 2018, he released his third solo album, 137 Avenue Kaniama, awarded the Octave musiques du monde. In 2023, Baloji's début full-length feature film Augure/Omen received the Prix de la Première Voix in the Un Certain Regard selection at the Cannes Film Festival, and the Prix de la Mise en Scène at the Angoulême Film Festival.

The film inspired 4 12-track EPs. Each EP takes the point of view of one of the film's four protagonists. Hip-hop, Afrobeats, electro, traditional songs, Congolese rumba, etc. The project takes on multiple incarnations and artistic inspirations. A captivating, deep and powerful aesthetic.

A fascinating variation on the story of the eponymous feature film. The album includes featuring artists with singular universes such as: Sampa The Great, Dj Lag, Jose James, IDPIzzle, Jamilia Woods, Natalie Bergman, Metronomy, Wharola, and many more.

lineup: Vendex , Cloudy , DTEXX , SIKXTO
information:
EUPHORIK brings Valkhør to Berlin!

Hard techno's most infamous antihero, Vendex, is the mastermind behind Valkhør, a multi-channel concept, brand and creative realm encompassing a record label and worldwide audio-visual shows.

With a dark, pounding signature soundscape ranging from hard techno to EBM and industrial, Valkhør embodies the musical and creative vision of the masked techno sorcerer Vendex, who has built a devoted following since he burst onto the scene in 2018. 

VALKHØR is a fictional world with mythical lore divided into four visually different themed settings characterized by fire, ice, sand and a cyberpunk-inspired environment influenced by futuristic, historical and fantasy elements.

The narrative was created by Vendex himself and brings the label and event concept to life.
Valkhør is where the dark vision of Vendex, the creative force our own world could not contain, finds its full expression.

SPOTM Returns home to Aeden with another explosive night alongside friends ACTITUDE & UNISON to celebrate music and communities coming together for a sexy and sweaty session!

We're thrilled to be hosting our long time friends ACTITUDE who've been killing it this summer at FUSION Festival alongside DJ SPOHRT and his new family UNISON which is anchored in the union of creatives, providing a bridge for collectives from different cities and a dance floor for various circles. 

For this edition we've curated one Techno Floor and one Trance Floor in a bi-atmospherical club experience and a winter garden to accommodate your relaxation needs. 

Our Lineup consists of new and prominent figures of the Berlin scene such as Marina George: curator of Tresor New Faces, BBetriebswirt who's a Mitmischen resident and more rising talents

Follow us on Instagram & Soundcloud for Dj contests, GL raffles & stay ahead of the curve for the next events, more surprises will be announced ;)

lineup: ALWAYS SECRET
information:
EN // DE

⬤ ABOUT PARADISE GARAGE ⬤
We believe that great musical traditions should never die. Our Paradise Garage party series is a tribute to the legendary New Yorker Paradise Garage club that was the place where House music and Disco bloomed between 1976 and the time of its closure in 1987.

Our Paradise Garage remains 100% loyal to the musical tradition of the New Yorker club and his legendary resident Larry Levan. You will not hear Techno, or any of the common modern interpretations of House music and Disco at the party.

Our Paradise Garage is also defined as a sex-positive party. It requires a dress code (read below), and is a safe space for kinky communities and LGTBQ, escorted by a professional and devoted awareness team.

The dress code is meant to emphasize the border between the everyday and the space we create. We wish to encourage our guests to safely express themselves through fashion and their individual choices of clothes and accessories.


⬤ WHAT TO EXPECT ⬤
⊛ A musical homage to Paradise Garage: classic House and old-school Disco.
⊛ No streetwear! Come colorful, kinky and creative.
⊛ Secret DJ lineup.
⊛ Performances and walking acts.
⊛ Hedonistic space for kinksters.
⊛ 2 dance floors and several play rooms.
⊛ Awareness team.

⬤ MUST READ ⬤
⊛ The Paradise Garage has a strict no-photo policy. We have a designated photobooth with our photographer, where photos can be taken of those who wish for it.
⊛ The Paradise Garage is a safe space for any ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation. Any sign of racism, antisemitism, sexism or homophobia will not be tolerated.
⊛ In addition, you are to respect the personal space of any fellow dancer. In case you feel that you have been treated wrongly, or that your space has been violated, please notify our awareness team or our staff.
⊛ DRESS-CODE: * Swimsuits * Costumes * Leather * Latex * Naked * Super Heroes * Lingerie * Colorful Festival Style.
NO CASUAL STREET WEAR SUCH AS JEANS IS ALLOWED.


⬤⬤


⬤ ÜBER PARADISE GARAGE ⬤
Wir glauben, dass große musikalische Traditionen niemals sterben sollten. Unsere Paradise Garage-Partyreihe ist eine Hommage an den legendären New Yorker Club Paradise Garage, in dem zwischen 1976 und seiner Schließung 1987 die House- und Disco-Musik blühte.

Unsere Paradise Garage bleibt der musikalischen Tradition des New Yorker Clubs und seines legendären Residents Larry Levan zu 100% treu. Du wirst auf der Party weder Techno noch eine der gängigen modernen Interpretationen von House und Disco hören.

Unsere Paradise Garage ist auch als sex-positive Party definiert. Sie erfordert einen Dresscode (siehe unten) und ist ein sicherer Ort für kinky Communities und LGTBQ, der von einem professionellen und engagierten Awareness-Team begleitet wird.

Der Dresscode soll die Grenze zwischen dem Alltag und dem Raum, den wir schaffen, betonen. Wir möchten unsere Gäste dazu ermutigen, sich sicher durch Mode und ihre individuelle Wahl von Kleidung und Accessoires auszudrücken.


⬤ WAS DICH ERWARTET ⬤
⊛ Eine musikalische Hommage an Paradise Garage: klassischer House und Disco der alten Schule.
⊛ Keine Straßenkleidung! Komm bunt, kinky und kreativ.
⊛ Geheimes DJ Lineup.
⊛ Performances und Walking Acts.
⊛ Hedonistischer Raum für Kinksters.
⊛ 2 Tanzflächen und mehrere Spielräume.
⊛ Awareness-Team.

⬤ MUST READ ⬤
⊛ Bei der Paradise Garage gilt ein striktes Fotoverbot. Wir haben einen Photobooth mit unserer Fotografin, wo Fotos von denjenigen gemacht werden können, die es wünschen.
⊛ Die Paradise Garage ist ein sicherer Ort für jede Ethnie, jedes Geschlecht und jede sexuelle Orientierung. Jegliche Anzeichen von Rassismus, Antisemitismus, Sexismus oder Homophobie werden nicht toleriert.
⊛ Darüber hinaus musst du den persönlichen Raum eines jeden Mittänzers respektieren. Solltest du das Gefühl haben, dass du ungerecht behandelt oder dein Freiraum verletzt wurde, melde dies bitte unserem Awareness-Team oder unseren Mitarbeitern.
⊛ DRESS-CODE: * Badeanzüge * Kostüme * Leder * Latex * Nackt * Superhelden * Dessous * Bunter Festival-Stil.
KEINE LEGERE STRASSENKLEIDUNG WIE JEANS IST ERLAUBT.

lineup: TBA
information:
That first night, that first sight, that first kiss and the first time in the darkroom... so many things have happened since then and still have the same feeling when looking back to that moment. Such an incredible emotion to remember the first time. It has been 5 years since we first opened our doors, since the first beats flooded the dancefloor, since the first time we met, since we saw you dancing for the first time. 

We want to celebrate with you 5 years of techno, darkness, dance, sweat, love and friendship. For that we have prepared a very special event orchestrated by our DJ residents and some old and new friends to have an unforgettable night, the last one together this season.

We are back to share an orgiastic celebration with you all on a new dark location where we will learn together to play hide and seek, to sweat together and dance in a collaborative manner. Different areas to relax, dance, sweat, drink and talk to each other, meet new people and greet old known ones. Come and enjoy the techno and pleasure, where individuals reconstruct into a mass of bodies which dances, moves and sweats as one on the dancefloor: skin to skin, feeling together, feeling the hard beat, the pounding on their ears and the lights hiding and showing precious human creatures on ecstasy. 
How nice to be all together once again, celebrating another night of hedonism, free sexual expression and joy.

Please remember the Community Guidelines: at our events you are expected to embrace them.

NO: Racism, Sexism, LGTBIQ+phobia, Hate, Violence, Agephobia, Bodyshaming or Fascism.

YES: Kindness, Peace, Equality, Love and Hedonism.

We have an awareness team on site to help you. If you feel someone at the event does not follow our community guidelines, please speak to them or to any of our staff members. If you feel unwell or you see someone not feeling well, please let our awareness team or staff know. If you need help with any other thing, please let us know, we are there to help you and ensure you are having a good time.

Early Bird tickets: Entry until Midnight just 15Euro, 17.50 Euro after Midnight
Regular tickets: Entry until Midnight 17.50 Euro, 20 Euro after Midnight

Join us early to get the full flavor of the XTROB experience

lineup: Barry Can't Swim
information:
Barry Can't Swim

Astra | 18.10.2024

Einlass: 19:00 | Beginn: 20:00

Der schottische Musikproduzent, DJ und Live-Act Barry Can’t Swim kommt im Oktober für sein einziges Deutschlandkonzert nach Berlin in das Astra Kulturhaus!

Als einer der aufregendsten Künstler:innen der elektronischen Musik machte Barry Can't Swim zunächst mit einer Reihe von Veröffentlichungen im Jahr 2020 (u.a. bei Shall Not Fade) auf sich aufmerksam, bevor er 2022 beim Ninja Tune-Sublabel Technicolour für seine sensationelle EP, „More Content“ (die bis heute über 20 Millionen Streams erreicht hat) unterschrieb. Im Jahr 2023 erschien Barrys Debütalbum, „When Will We Land?“, das bei seiner Veröffentlichung auf Platz 12 der britischen Albumcharts und Platz 1 in den britischen Dance-Albumcharts einstieg und sein bisher umfangreichstes und vielfältigstes Projekt darstellt. Das 11-Track-Album, das von BBC Radio 1 zum Dance-Album des Jahres gewählt wurde, bewegte sich zwischen Deep House und Jazz und wurde von Mixmag, DJ Mag, The Times, Evening Standard, NME, Billboard, Clash und vielen anderen gelobt. Barry wurde außerdem bei den DJ Mag Awards als „Breakthrough Producer“ ausgezeichnet und bei den BRIT Awards 2024 in der Kategorie „Dance Act“ gegen Becky Hill, Calvin Harris, Fred Again... und Romy nominiert.

Bereits im März spielte Barry Can’t Swim eine restlos ausverkaufte Live-Show im Berliner Säälchen. Im Herbst geht der schottische Live-Act nun erneut auf Tour und macht dabei auch Halt in Berlin!

lineup: Panorama Bar:, Garrett David (live), DJ Pipe, Dyed Soundorom, Gene On Earth, Huerta, Liquid Earth, Mari.te, Mike Servito
information:
Limousine Dream kommen zu ihrer zweiten Party in die Panorama Bar, mit vielen first timers, einem Back2Back-Set von Labelbesitzer Gene On Earth und Dyed Soundorom sowie einem Live-Set des Chicagoer House Heads Garrett David. Letzterer zog als Teenager in die Windy City, wo er zum Einkäufer des legendären Plattenladens Gramaphone Records und Resident-DJ in der Smartbar wurde. Seine Musik, die er mittlerweile hauptsächlich auf seinem Label Global Swing veröffentlicht, ist treibender Chi-House mit europäischem After-Hour-Twist. Die in Caracas geborene DJ Mari.te lebt seit 2018 in Spanien, wo sie ihr Label und die gleichnamige Clubnacht Tresydos betreibt und für ihr breites Spektrum an House-infizierter Underground-Dance-Musik bekannt ist. Unter seinem Alias Liquid Earth produziert der kalifornische Wahlberliner Taylor Freels sonnendurchflutete Housetracks mit tiefen Basslines und knackigen Melodien.

Limousine Dream are back with their second party at Panorama Bar, with plenty of first-timers, a back-to-back set from label owner Gene On Earth and Dyed Soundorom, and a live set by Chicago house head Garrett David. The latter moved to the Windy City as a teen, where he became a buyer for legendary record store Gramaphone Records and resident DJ at Smartbar. His music, which he now mainly releases on his Global Swing label, is driving Chi-house with a European after-hours twist. Born in Caracas, DJ Mari.te has been living in Spain since 2018, where she runs Tresydos, her label and club night of the same name, and is known for her wide range of house-infused underground dance music. Under his alias Liquid Earth, Californian Berliner Taylor Freels crafts sun-drenched house tracks defined by deep bass and sharp melodies.

lineup: Puce Mary + @Tot Onyx
information:
silent green presents:

Puce Mary is the solo moniker of Danish-born artist Frederikke Hoffmeier. 
With a long career in experimental electronic music - Puce Mary has a reputation for intense live performances that span from gripping renditions of cinematic composition to the full-on fury of off-the-cuff harsh noise. Oft-identified with the now-generation of industrial noise, the project’s recent 
endeavours explores the field of sound more broadly than before, unfurling a complex sonic and literary narrative of tension and release. Tot Onyx is the solo project of Tommi Tokyo, who is also known as part of the experimental performance duo Group A, which was active until 2020. The sound artist and performer works a lot with metal objects and her body and, in keeping with Group A tradition, likes to break all expectations.

event_name: Trip the Light presents: DJ Sotofett (all night)
lineup: DJ Sotofett (all night)
information:
We return to our adoptive home, Zur Klappe, and have none other than DJ Sotofett joining us for our first all night set.

DJ Sotofett operates the booth with the authority of a selector who is firmly in control of proceedings: never flustered, with a masterful command of energy and flow. 

His selections span the past five decades of soundsystem music, with a particular focus on soulful; groove heavy House, Techno and Electro, while his extended sets incorporate Jazz, Funk, Hip-Hop and Dub. Playing prominently with vinyl, his mixing is seamless and playful: full of neat chops and daring transitions. 

For going on 20 years, DJ Sotofett has been releasing a steady stream of records through revered labels such as Tresor and Honest Jon’s, as well as his own labels Wania and Sex Tags Mania / Amfibia. He has been throwing regular label parties at OHM and Tresor since 2014, while he also recently launched the dub focused party, Resonance of Dub. 

Having already been lucky enough to witness a DJ Sotofett all nighter in the flesh, you can take our word that this is going to be proper! 



The ethos of Trip the Light is based on creating a night with no frills, that is completely music-centric, focused on diversity, inclusivity and intimacy. Our music interests are broad and ever evolving but are rooted in UK soundsystem music. 

We will not tolerate discrimination of any kind. Please be kind to each other. See you on the dance floor x

information:
FRI, 18.10.2024 | INFECTED w/ TREI (NZ), SOULTRAIN
Drum & Bass at VOID Hall, Berlin

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬● Tickets ●▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Presale: 12 € - Abendkasse/Box-office: 15 €
Only 10€ until midnight!

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬● Info ●▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Drum & Bass music is an integral part of the electronic music scene, and it has been gaining popularity over the years. Drum & Bass events are a great way to experience the unique and powerful energy of this genre.
The atmosphere at these events is unlike any other. The basslines thump through the air, creating a heavy, yet exciting atmosphere. Everybody is dancing enthusiastically, and it’s easy to get lost in the moment. The energy of the crowd is palpable, and it’s infectious.
The lineup at Infected Drum & Bass events is carefully curated to create a unique and memorable experience. DJs spin the hottest tracks of the moment, often mixing in some timeless classic tunes.
A Drum & Bass event is a great place to meet like-minded people and make long-lasting friendships. Everyone is there to enjoy the music and have a good time, and it’s easy to make connections with fellow music lovers.
If you’re looking for an unforgettable night out, a Drum & Bass event is the perfect option. The music, atmosphere, and people make for a party that you won’t soon forget. So come join in the fun and make some amazing memories.

18+ Event - Doors: 23:00 h

information:
Aquatic Travellers Vol. 5 x Sandwich

For the fifth instalment of the ‚Aquatic Travellers‘ series, the clued-in curator bb:fm put together a tailor-made two-floor diving team. Refine your fins for the first collaboration of the newly founded Sandwich crew — consisting of Lucas, Patrick & Violetta— and the Sonntagsinstitut squad! 

On the upper floor, the signature electro sound of the ‚Travellers‘ series rules the dance floor with an all-flinta lineup. Apart from the broken beat cognoscenta and host bb:fm, Potsdam’s most elusive electro head and Galaxunity label founder Galaxaura and the Montreal-born DJ and prolific producer Data Plan will grill your gills. 

On the "KottiView floor", the Sandwich crew will navigate through the warmer spheres of the 4/4 spectrum and some left turns all night long.

lineup: Pysh Franz Matthews SEIUN
information:
HIFI/LOFI are bringing the heat back at Crack Bellmer on October 18th! This time, we bring you a stellar lineup to the table : PYSH, SEIUN, and Franz Matthews will all embark you in a sonic journey going from groovy and cosmic Indie Dance, to the realms of Melodic Techno, Dark Disco, with extra hints of hi-powered Italo.

PYSH
=====
Pysh, is a Polish DJ and music producer living in Berlin. His performances have permanently recorded in the lineups of the largest Polish music clubs and festivals, sharing the stage with leading artists of the world electronic scene, such as Eelke Kleijn, Robag Wruhme, Guy J or Kollektiv Turmstrasse.

In addition to balancing between the house, indie and melodic genres in his productions, sets and live acts, Pysh interweaves ethnic and folk sounds, which are a kind of hallmark of his work, which regularly travels all around the world under the aegis of such labels like Ritter Butzke, Jeahmon, Click, or Einmusik.

SEIUN
=====
French DJ and producer based in Berlin / Paris, SEIUN's music vibrates in a mixture of groovy bass, chuggy retro synths, touches of acid sonorities and vintage percussion, forming a powerfully bassy and eclectic combo that identifies itself as indie dance / EBM / italo disco. She perceives music as a universal way to connect with oneself and others, in a trance and a journey built on the moment to let go and focus on the present.

Recently becoming a member of the Parisian collective apero notturno, she has already conquered many places such as Sisyphos, Katerblau, Renate, Kitkat, as well as Mexico, South Africa, Turkey, the Netherlands and many others. Also a producer, her latest releases are on the Club Mackan and Nein labels.


FRANZ MATTHEWS
================
Now grounded in Berlin, the franco-german music producer, DJ & Live Act likes to blend worlds together. Either wandering through cosmic, spiritual, or other mental realms, mixed with sonic influences gathered from his travels around the world, Matthews always keeps faithful to one thing : trying to make people dance, while adding something meaningful out of their experience.

His studio work also always embodies a strong sense of ethos, commitment, and attention to detail. A winning combination that’s seen him release music on imprints such as Eskimo Recordings, AEON, ROAM, Heimlich, as well as his own label HIFI/LOFI Records, while collaborating and getting remixed by the likes of Aera, Chaim, Local Suicide, The Organism…

==================

lineup: Kassiopaula Rabauken Loddaleben Nannibu Herr Zinnober Zwischenwasser
information:
DEU: 

It’s after-party time 

Die Erinnerungen an den Windwiesentanz verblassen nicht so schnell… – tanzende Füße, strahlende Gesichter und eine Atmosphäre, die uns alle in den Bann gezogen hat. 

Wer dabei war, weiß: Dieser Vibe ist einzigartig. 

Und genau da wollen wir mit euch anknüpfen! Am **18.10.** kehren wir zurück auf die Tanzfläche, um die Magie wieder aufleben zu lassen. Im **Beate Uwe Berlin** laden wir euch ein, die Erinnerungen an durchtanzte Nächte und unvergessliche Momente weiterzuspinnen. Ab **23:00** gibt's Downtempo und Deephouse, der die Seele streichelt und Discohouse Grooves, die euch direkt zurück in die ekstatische Stimmung vom Festival katapultieren. But as usual: Warm & Cosy 

Lasst uns den Windwiesentanz in den Club tragen und zusammen eine neue Geschichte schreiben! 

Be there & be dancing 

Du willst dich einbringen mit deiner (visuellen) Kunst, Performance, Aktion, bei der Deko oder etwas anderem? Dann melde dich via Telegram bei @decorator43

ENG:
It's after-party time 

The memories of this years Windwiesentanz don't fade quickly... - dancing feet, beaming faces and an atmosphere that captivated all of us. 

Anyone who was there knows that this vibe is unique.

And that's exactly where we want to pick up with you! On **18th of october** we're returning to the dance floor to bring the magic back to life. At **Beate Uwe Berlin** we invite you to relive memories of dancing the night away and unforgettable moments. From **23:00** there will be downtempo and deep house that caresses the soul and disco house grooves that will catapult you straight back into the ecstatic mood of the festival. But as usual: warm & cozy

Let's bring Windwiesentanz to the club and write a new story together! 

Be there & be dancing 

Do you want to get involved with your (visual) art, performance, action, decoration or something else? Then get in touch via Telegram with @decorator43

event_name: Pinky Promise: The Garden of Tarot
lineup: Martha van Straaten , Hassandra, Philippo, Marwan Hawash, MonoAbe, Rochelle Baz , Steffoo, Ap Solis, , 6 themed rooms to explore featuring 2 Dance Floors // Cabaret Shows // Intimate Workshops // Multiple Play Spaces // Secret Dens // Interactive Performances // Tarot Reading // Multi Handed Massage Parlour + So Much More!
information:
Step into the Garden of Tarot, where seduction & mysticism collide. Enter our world where the High Priestess teases out your hidden desires, the Lovers ignite your deepest passions, Justice demands you to surrender to pleasure, and the Wheel of Fortune spins you into rapturous ecstasy. 

Spread over 6 spaces, our sensual sanctuary invites you to embody the raw, erotic energy of the cards. Whether you're drawn to the allure of the unknown or the thrill of temptation, every corner offers a new intimate adventure.

Come alone or with lovers—our garden is a safe space for exploring fantasies, flirting with fate, and forging unforgettable connections. Let the cards lead you into a night of pure, unbridled pleasure.


***WORKSHOP PROGRAMME***

- Booty Therapy (hosted by Maïmouna Coulibaly)

- Magical Life of Bodies (hosted by Micha Stella)

- Calling the Cat Within (hosted by Hameed & Arturo)


***PERFORMERS***
Rhys Pieces
Mandhla
Fluxxious
Tania Giovo
Alfie morgz

+
Live Painting by Christian Rug
Tarot Readings
Multi Handed Massage Parlour
Playful Connection Games

***TICKETS & ENTRY***
To make sure everyone can enter our paradise as quickly as possible, we have created a tiered ticket system based on entry time.

Tickets will be available at the door from 12:30am.

We do not offer refunds however if the event sells out and you are no longer able to attend, you can list your ticket on the RA Resale platform.

---DRESS CODE---
You may only enter our paradise if you are in costume. We operate a strict door policy which is NO EFFORT - NO ENTRY.

Whether you see yourself as the High Priestess, Masked Seer or perhaps the Temptress, we look forward to seeing all of your bold & edgy elegance come out in true fabulous form!

Think: Flowing Robes, Silky Fabrics, Ornate Headpieces, Crystal jewels, Leather straps, Shimmering lingerie, Botanical Patterns, Bold Makeup & Devilish Props.

Remember, 'The Garden of Tarot' invites you to embrace your most imaginative self, breaking boundaries and celebrating the intersection of queerness, sensuality, and a future unburdened by limitations. Let your costume be a reflection of the boundless fabulous decedent universe within you.

Check out our costume moodboard on our website.

*** NO PHOTOS ALLOWED ***
There will be an in house photographer present on the night who will seek consent before taking any photos or filming you. No other photography will be allowed on the night.

Allow yourself to remain present, engaged and playful!

*** SAFER SPACES POLICY ***
Pinky Promise is a space for everyone to feel welcome. We have a zero tolerance policy for harassment, unwanted touch, homophobic, transphobic, racist, sexist, ableist, or ageist behaviour. ALWAYS ask for consent before touching or engaging with someone. 

State your boundaries. If someone makes you uncomfortable, for ANY reason, you should let them know.

Our trained Awareness team will be available all night throughout the venue, looking after the welfare of all attendees to ensure that everyone feels safe and cared for. Feel free to speak to any of our team wearing a bright pink hi vis if you wish to express any concerns or feel uncomfortable or unsafe at any point during the night. We will believe you and we will help.

***ACCESSIBILITY***
The venue has multiple sets of stairs to enter each floor (3 floors in total). There will be some strobe and moving lights along with smoke machines and loud music.

Please read our rules & FAQ on our website before coming to our event

Find us in our digital realm:
Telegram - t.me/pinkypromiseworld
Instagram - @pinkypromise.world

lineup: Bassvictim live, Jas Lin 林思穎 & hearthealer live, Nexcyia live, Softmatter live,  , Blood of Aza, Emma DJ, Evita Manji, Lutto Lento , Makossiri , object blue , Or:la , XD Erica
information:
A term coined by Erik Davis in the late-90s, “TechGnosis” is the idea that modern technology is as much a spiritual and mystical force as the human beliefs and practices with which it intersects. 3hd’s “Technosis” club night at RSO modifies the mentioned portmanteau of “technology” and “gnosis” (i.e. the esoteric knowledge of divine truth) and applies it to its opening takeover of electronic music that speaks to the soul.

Rave transcendence will come in the form of object blue’s liminal wanderings between the club and experimental realms, Emma dj’s hard, gritty and indefinable sounds, and Softmatter’s bass-heavy avant-pop with a dark edge that has long served as a refuge from the struggles and adversity of authoritarianism. There’ll be an explosive live performance from underground cult duo Bassvictim whose particular brand of youthful hedonism comes in a unique form of grunge-y industrial dance they call “basspunk,” as well as performances and DJ sets by XD Erica, Binghi, and Or:la. Also taking part are Evita Manji, MAKOSSIRI, and Lutto Lento, along with Blood of Aza’s gift for purveying extremes that deftly ricochet between dissonant noise and delicate atmospherics and a live set by sound artist and experimental ambient musician NEXCYIA. Based on his recent Exodus album, the performance combines immersive sound design and textural soundscapes to create an otherworldly reflection of his family’s journey from Texas to Los Angeles in the 1970s. The centerpiece of the night comes from Jas Lin 林思穎 and Hearthealer, who premiere their “NEMATOCYST” interactive performance in Berlin in an effort to excavate a potent energetic force of aliveness for their audience to savor. Named after the stinging cells of jellyfish, the collaboration between the respective performance artist/choreographer and writer/producer/DJ is a ritualistic ceremony for facilitating a habitat of spacious freedom and summoning possibility through a collective altered state. 

Introduced into the common lexicon by Davis in his famed TechGnosis: Myth, Magic, and Mysticism in the Age of Information, the 1998 book’s titular notion proposes a cultural phenomenon where technology is not seen as antithetical to spirituality, but as a tool that can enhance and facilitate spiritual practices. Creamcake’s 3hd 2024: “Technosis” event imagines the potential for such a rave new world.

lineup: LYZZA (Berlin), foreigner (L.A.), Shannen SP (London), AUCO (Infinite Quest / Berlin) , Nico Adomako (Einhundert), KANUCIA (Einhundert)
information:
Einhundert is returning to Trauma Bar with some very special guests.

Einhundert @ Trauma Bar und Kino
Saturday 19 October / 23:59 - till late.

LYZZA [DJ SET] 
... is a producer and vocalist known for challenging the boundaries and carving a space in Electronic Music. Since her 2017 EP ‘Powerplay’, she has demonstrated her artistic potency, with collaborations ranging from Showstudio and Mugler to producing for billboard-nominated songstress and activist Emel Mathlouthi. 
Widely hailed as one of electronic music’s most promising young avant-pop producers,. LYZZA has collaborated with a host of impressive names such as Amnesia Scanner, Nicolas Jaar, Shygirl, the late SOPHIE, and Mykki Blanco- whom she toured with for several years. In 2024 Her first short film 'MOSQUITO: The Movie' has been included into The Criterion Collection and her EP“Substate” , saw her working with Emptyset’s James Ginzberg, about which Papermag writes; “LYZZA doesn’t just want to change the game, she wants to change the entire system that runs it.”

FOREIGNER (T&T - L.A.)
Born in Trinidad & Tobago, raised in Caracas & Brooklyn, and educated in DC, Adam “Foreigner” Cooper is a multi-disciplinary storyteller best known as a Creative Strategy Director, DJ, designer and Experiential Producer. Adam is currently based in Los Angeles, California USA. 
While Foreigner is best known for his DJing and events, The Foreigner Company has established itself as the go-to creative development company for Cinematic AfroDiasporic ExperiencesTM through Event Production + Filmmaking + Brand Strategy + Qualitative Research and Graphic Design.

SHANNEN SP (E.B.N.X. / LONDON)
... is a London based DJ. Her DJ sets and curation in both music and the arts explore the spectrum of the global underground, platformed through her event series and label E.B.N.X.

AUCO (INFINITE QUEST / BERLIN)
Berlin-based DJ and Infinite Quest co-founder, AUCO, is known for their obsessive exploration of the craft of DJing.
Their signature style combines daring and complex blends with a gritty sound palette, which originally encompassed new gen and deconstructed club tracks, but has since grown to incorporate newly-evolved genres as Gqom, Jersey club, as well as old-school Jungle, Garage, and Ragga. Protean as ever, their selection pays tribute to their South London roots while also activating a nexus between the robust histories and global milieus of underground clubbing culture.

20€

HOMODROP and GOLOSA  are joining forces for the first time!

information:
Fire is a fierce, untamable force—wild and unpredictable, always shifting and teasing, never playing by the rules. It’s the heat that pulses through the crowd, igniting passions and sparking connections with every beat. 

FUEGO doesn’t just burn; it seduces, drawing you into its ever-changing dance of heat and desire. 

Do you hear? It’s tempting you to come closer, to feel its fierce heat—let go, let it consume you.

//

El fuego es una fuerza feroz y indomable—salvaje e impredecible, siempre cambiando y provocando, sin seguir las reglas. Es el calor que late en la multitud, encendiendo pasiones y creando conexiones con cada beat.

FUEGO no solo quema; seduce, atrayéndote a su danza cambiante de calor y deseo.

¿Lo sentís? Te está tentando a acercarte, a sentir su calor intenso—soltate, dejá que te consuma.

______________

FUEGO is where the beat gets juicy, the bodies move close, and the night burns hot. 

Born from the energy of Berlin’s hard techno and fueled by the fiery spirit of Latin core, this event invites you to lose yourself in the music, let go, unleash yourself, and feel the burn of a night that’s pure FUEGO.

information:
Der House Gospel Choir ist eine in London ansässige Gesangsgruppe, die 2014 erstmals beim Glastonbury Festival auftrat. Gegründet wurde der Chor von der Sängerin Natalie Maddix, um die Musikstile House und Gospel zusammenzubringen – ein Ansatz, den auch viele US-amerikanische Produzent*innen und Sänger*innen im New York der 90er Jahre verfolgten, die ihre Wurzeln in den afroamerikanischen Kirchen hatten und uns neben anderen die größten House-Hits dieser Zeit bescherten. Einigen dieser Songs werden wir sicher auch beim Auftritt von Harrsn with House Gospel Choir begegnen, die uns - natürlich am Sonntag - in abgespeckter Clubbesetzung inklusive DJ zur heiligen Tanzmesse in die Säule einladen. In der Panorama Bar hat Massimiliano Pagliara ein paar musikalische Freunde um sich geschart, darunter die australische DJ und Produzentin Eluize, die gerade mit Curious Bliss eine sommerlich-acidgetränkte House-EP auf seinem Label Funnuvojere veröffent­licht hat. Gemeinsam mit Chris Cruse und Luigi Di Venere spielt er als Couple Looking For Bananas diese Klubnacht ein langes Closing-Set.

The House Gospel Choir is a London-based vocal group that first performed at the Glastonbury Festival in 2014. It was founded by singer Natalie Maddix with the aim of bringing together the musical styles of house and gospel – an approach pursued by many US producers and singers in New York in the 90s, whose roots in African-American churches paved the way for some of the biggest house hits of the decade. We're sure to hear a few of these songs during the performance (on Sunday, of course) by Harrsn with House Gospel Choir, leading a holy dance mass in the Säule with a slimmed-down club line-up and DJ. At Panorama Bar, Massimiliano Pagliara will be surrounded by a few musical mates, including Australian DJ/producer Eluize, who just released Curious Bliss, a summery, acid-soaked house EP on his label Funnuvojere. Along with Chris Cruse and Luigi Di Venere, he'll be playing a long closing set as Couple Looking For Bananas.

information: Step into the sonic realms of Astral Lab, RUTA, and Speedgasm converging in a fierce side-by-side, two-floor takeover. The venue will vibrate with electric, psychedelic energy as Matriark conducts the Trance Floor while Lily Haz, Viiaan and Paulawar will join the RUTA crew on the bass floor. Expect a journey through bass and trance, where two worlds collide in a raw celebration of underground sound.

information:
We live in terrifying times. Dispatches of wars, disasters, and crises circulate with unceasing regularity and ease, while an overwhelming feeling of powerlessness underscores an ever more incomprehensible world at odds with its own logic. The impossible has become possible. Reality is stranger than fiction. The tenth edition of Creamcake’s 3hd, with its title “The Shadows That Linger,” probes this uncanny realm where the ordinary becomes strange in an “always-already” defined by digital technology, nostalgia, and deterritorialization. Wading deep into this hauntological space between the familiar and the unfamiliar from October 19 to November 3, the festival will examine the spiritual and the ghostly, the ambiguous and the uncertain, alongside those historical, political, cultural, and social relics and reverberations that continue to affect us all.

The interdisciplinary program aims to open up to the political potential of discomfort. In experiencing and engaging with the alien and the otherworldly, “The Shadows That Linger" will spend the present working through the specters of the past in an attempt to transform dread into a drive for a better future. A decade since its first edition, the concerns raised in 3hd 2015’s “The Labor of Sound in a World of Debt” seem almost trite compared to the sheer scale and impact of today’s cultural flux, social disparity, and environmental degradation, and the mass violence, destruction, and suffering that continues to unfold globally. Perhaps it’s worth reflecting on this seemingly simpler past as part of a circuitous chain of events leading to the present, while remembering that chains can be broken and shadows do fade.

information:
You are invited to brighten your fall season with us, let go and forget about your adult self. Life might be full of responsibilities, but at Act Like Adults, we’re all about keeping the fun alive. Even as we return back to darker seasons, we believe in holding onto that carefree light spirit. That’s why we want to invite you to Lokschuppen, creating a space where you can let loose and forget about the demands of life outside of dance floors and exciting music and experiences with your loved ones. Join us for a night of pure enjoyment with an amazing lineup that will make you lose yourself in the music. Let go, dance, and live your best life with us—no responsibilities, just pure fun.

AWARENESS:
At our events, we maintain a no tolerance policy against all forms of discrimination, including racism, sexism, homophobia transphobia, body shaming, or any disrespectful behaviour. Consent is of highest importance before approaching or touching anyone. Our commitment is to foster a secure and inclusive environment for everyone, and any actions conflicting with this principle will not be tolerated.

If you encounter any concerns or disruptions during our event, please feel free to approach a member of the awareness team or security or bar personnel.

In consideration of the privacy and comfort of all participants, we kindly ask for not taking photos or videos inside the event. To uphold this, stickers will be provided and placed on all cameras.

We are very grateful for everyone cooperating with these guidelines.


ONLINE PRESALE:
We would like to inform you that buying a presale ticket online does not guarantee entry to the club. The venue reserves the right to refuse entry, in which case the ticket will be refunded automatically.
 
Please note that due to security measures at the entrance, there may be an increased wait time, as well as for ticket holders. We kindly ask that you consider this when planning your arrival and respect the process. Thank you.


We look forward to seeing you!

lineup: Tian Karl , Yulo X , Punzmann , Arno Cao
information:
Berlin-based electronica artist, DJ and producer Yulo X is about to drop his debut album "EUPHORIA ENDS" on October 11th, 2024. It’s showcasing an eclectic electronica sound that beautifully marries his former roots in wave and dream pop with contemporary electronic production. To celebrate the album release (and his 40th birthday!) he invited his close producer and dj family to a great daytime event.

Get ready for an electrifying day of sonic exploration!

Straight from the heart of London's pulsating music scene, Tian Karl is set to unleash a treasure trove of UK house and garage gems that will make your feet move. In a rare and not-to-be-missed DJ set, Vienna's own musical composer and artist Punzmann will demonstrate the incredible versatility of electronic music. And of course brace yourself for Yulo X's eclectic journey through the realms of house, bass music and techno. He will not only serve up a mind-bending set but also treat you to fresh tracks from his latest album. 
Rounding out this stellar lineup is Berlin's Arno Cao with melodic, groove-oriented house that's guaranteed to keep you moving.

Since it's a daytime event and a small venue, there will be limited capacities. 

+++ Admission is free, but registration is required for entry since it's a private event +++
You can RVSP for the event via the link below.

VOID Berlin presents: Sober Curiosity Night – Drum & Bass Edition

[English below]
Am 19. Oktober laden wir euch zu einem besonderen Erlebnis in der VOID Hall ein: Unser erstes Sober Curiosity Event. Gemeinsam mit unseren Künstlern und dem gesamten Team wollen wir eine Nacht erleben, die komplett ohne Alkohol und Drogen auskommt. Euch erwartet feinster Drum & Bass Sound, während wir euch mit alkoholfreien Cocktails und Longdrinks versorgen.

Erlebt eine Clubnacht, bei der der Fokus auf der Musik, der Community und dem unvergesslichen Vibe liegt – ganz ohne den Einfluss von Substanzen. Taucht ein in eine neue Art des Feierns, die Raum für Achtsamkeit und bewussten Genuss schafft.

Wir freuen uns auf euch und eine besondere Nacht voller Energie – ganz ohne Rausch, aber mit 100 % Vibe!

English:
On October 19th we invite you to a special experience at VOID Hall: Our first Sober Curiosity Event. Together with our artists and the entire team, we want to experience a night that is completely free of alcohol and drugs. The finest Drum & Bass sound awaits you, while we provide you with non-alcoholic cocktails and long drinks.

Experience a club night where the focus is on the music, the community and the unforgettable vibe - without the influence of substances. Immerse yourself in a new way of celebrating that creates space for mindfulness and conscious enjoyment.

We look forward to seeing you and a special night full of energy - without intoxication, but with 100% vibe!

18+ Event - Doors: 22:00 h

lineup: Dynamo Dreesen, Jay L, Andy Mac
information:
Acido and Deep Street combine for a special event featuring the heads of both labels flinging down hot plates all night, upstairs at Paloma.

Mister Dreesen should need no introduction to Berliners, and while Jay & Andy have both played separately in the city, this will be the first time they bring their wide-ranging, back-to-back energy and DJ passion to Berlin. 

These veterans of the Bristol scene, with respective releases on labels such as Trilogy Tapes, Punch Drunk, Idle Hands, Diving Bird, Don’t Be Afraid and brstl are hauling their heaviest trax for one night only!

Drawing upon years of dedicated collecting, jamming, deejaying and exploring music from across the spectrum - don't miss this rare chance to catch them do their thing upstairs at Paloma alongside the mighty Dynamo Dreesen for a heavy night of musical movement, it's gunna be… something!

lineup: mx.pinky, Miri Malek b2b Dakn داكنْ, Akïi b2b FISK , NaN, Turboculosis , snaeb x Jay Mayhew (live), abstraqt (live), Sabina Moe x Harmoni x Slow Moon (live), Visuals by svfficient
information:
The interdisciplinary arts platform, Dwam, takes over 90mil for a night of live performances, ambient DJ sets, live AV, and bass-heavy music in the basement. All proceeds from this event will be donated to direct aid initiatives in Gaza.

We open the night at 21 hrs with dance performances from Sabina Moe and Jay Mayhew in collaboration with live experimental music from snaeb, abstraqt, Harmoni & Slow Moon. At midnight, the basement opens and the project space turns into the ambient lounge. The basement will host bass-heavy sets from mx.pinky, Miri Malek b2b Dakn داكنْ, and Akïi b2b Fisk.  In the lounge, NaN and Turboculosis are on the decks with ambient/experimental vibes and live AV by svfficient.

Food will be available to purchase until midnight.

Early doors: 21:00 - 22:00
Dance Performances & Live Acts: 22:00 - 23:30
DJ sets across two floors: 0:00 - late

Suggested entry 15€ + 5€ membership card for new members. All profits from door sales will be donated to direct aid initiatives supporting people affected by the ongoing genocide in Gaza.

Awareness: Expectations on the guidelines of our space will be given to all attendees to help ensure respect, kindness and safe dancing. Dwam and 90mil do not tolerate any form of discriminatory, aggressive or disrespectful behaviour during, before or after the party. If you or someone you see is in need of care, please reach our staff and they will help you immediately. 

Accessibility: 90mil is located on the ground floor and has a ramp for easy access into the building, as well as an accessible toilet. Unfortunately the basement is not wheelchair-accessible. For individuals requiring assistance due to a disability, we offer a complimentary additional ticket for their accompanying person. We kindly ask that attendees test themselves for COVID before attending in solidarity with immuno-compromised people.

lineup: Camilla Tarantino, painzain, Martin K, Trig Crew
information: Trig is a new collective focused on building memorable experiences with the people they love. The collective was born out of community, from a desire to share emotions arising from the most fitting and pure sounds rooted in techno, house and electronic music, by creating rhythms characterised by percussive, hypnotic and visceral grooves that translate on the dance floor into a collective trance state. Trig’s vision is to entertain and connect people from different backgrounds, promoting freedom of expression, both individually and collectively. Aiming to become not just a party but in a carefree and safe communal environment. Trig is a Berlin-based collective.

△ △ △ English below! △ △ △


Intimität braucht Raum und Zeit zum Teilen – wenn wir Sonntags unsere Teppiche im Beate Uwe ausbreiten, dann kreieren wir den Raum und die Zeit, zusammen das Erlebte noch einmal in Zärtlichkeit auszutauschen. Die schnelllebige Nacht birgt viele Erinnerungen – auf weichen Füßen wollen wir diese noch einmal in unsere Mitte bringen.

Beate Barfuß: Ruheraum.
---------------------------------

Line Up:

JØlle.	

Kleintierschaukel (LIVE)	

Zoe Reijue, iorie & Betelgeise

△ Nur Abendkasse.

△ Das Beate Uwe ist Barrierefrei und ein Nichtraucherlokal.

△ Jeder Mensch ist bei Beate Uwe willkommen und soll sich wohl und sicher fühlen! Das heißt: jegliche Art von Rassismus, Sexissmus, Antisemitismus, Queer-phobie, Ableismus oder sonstige Formen von Diskriminierung werden absolut nicht toleriert.

Intimacy needs space and time to share – when we spread out our carpets at Beate Uwe on Sundays, we create the space and time to gently exchange our experiences together once again. The fast-paced night holds many memories – on soft feet, we want to bring them back into our midst once more.

Beate Barefoot: room to relax.

JØlle.	

Kleintierschaukel (LIVE)	

Zoe Reijue, iorie & Betelgeise

△ All are welcome at Beate Uwe and every person should feel safe and comfortable! That means: We have absolutely zero tolerance for racism, sexism, antisemitism, queer-phobia, ableism, or any other form of discrimination.

△ Have you lost or forgotten something? Just come to the entry during our events and ask or send an e-mail to lostandfound@beate-uwe.de.

information:
»Multi Faith Prayer Room« – Konzertsaal-Kompositionen für die Clubbing Generation

Was wie der Name einer Anwaltskanzlei klingt, löst weltweit in Clubs, Konzerthäusern und auf Festivals nicht-justiziable Schwebezustände aus. Brandt Brauer Frick erinnern an so ziemlich alle schweißtreibenden Musikstile und sind nach 15 Jahren Entwicklung zwischen Dance-Seligkeit und ausgewachsener Orchestererfahrung nun wieder da gelandet, wo alles begann. Dabei folgen die drei bekennenden Anzugträger mit gediegen musikakademischem Background ihrem Ansatz, den Techno durch klassische Instrumente sprechen zu lassen, auch bei diesem Sophisticated Rave am Schnittpunkt von Electronic, Synth-Pop, Future R’n’B, Techno und Minimal ganz konsequent.

event_name: STOLEN (China) - post-punk dark wave. The Allegorist - deep, immersive sonic tales
lineup: STOLEN The Allegorist
information:
One of the leading indie rock bands of China with a first solo concert in Berlin!
STOLEN were formed by vocalist Liang Yi, guitarist Fangde, bassist Jun, drummer Yufeng, and keyboardist Duan Xuan while studying at the Sichuan Conservatory of Music in 2009. In 2012 Formol, a French VJ, joined the band.
In 2017 they met Mark Reeder, who was on a tour in China with his film B-Movie and was performing at the Morning House Festival in Chengdu. Mark was really impressed by STOLEN’s brilliant live performance, and after the gig, they decided to go into the studio together to record a demo. In January 2018, the band traveled to Berlin to record their second album, ‘Fragment’ which was again produced by Mark Reeder and Micha Adam. The band wanted to soak in the atmosphere of the city and especially its Techno-club-scene and inject their impressions into their music. It was during the production of this album that Mark decided to reactivate his label MFS, especially for the release of Fragment in Europe. It was a challenging objective. Fragment was released in China in September 2018, and in Europe in early 2019 on MFS.
Mark introduced STOLEN’s music to New Order’s Bernard Sumner who was very impressed, and not only by their music but also by their spirit and ambition. The band was invited as a guest for NEW ORDER on their European tour in 2019.
STOLEN has the wild and sexy nature of traditional rock music, while blending the sanity and restraint of electronic music. Their high-energy sound integrated techno, dark-wave, and post-punk influences, is both introspective, exploratory and irresistibly danceable.
Remolding the rock band configuration into a hyper-synchronized dance engine, with a highly explosive audio and handcrafted-visual live performance, STOLEN has a strong recognition and a high degree of aesthetic unity in sound, vision and scene, is undoubtedly one of the leader of indie rock scene in China.

Support our local The Allegorist
Anna Jordan works primarily as a sound artist, crafting deep, immersive, dark and intricate sonic tales. She is a sound artist, composer, electronic music producer, performer, singer, remixer and visual artist, with a background of economics and fine arts.
Her art project The Allegorist is a visionary, enigmatic, transmedia and boundary-pushing artist known for crafting deep, immersive sonic tales. Embracing a wide array of influences, weaving together the mysteries, art and spirituality, the art project defies categorisation, resonating with those who seek the unconventional.

event_name: Love-Songs + Saeko Killy: 'Passive Progressive' Release Party
lineup: Love-Songs, Saeko Killy , Lo Kindre, Thomas Lea Clarke
information:
Phase Group presents a night of live music by Love-Songs and Saeko Killy to celebrate the release of the new Love-Songs album ‘Passive Progressive’ on the 20th October, at Tennis Bar in Berlin.

Love-Songs are the trio consisting of Thomas Korf (electronics + vocals) Sebastian Kokus (Bass) and Manuel Chitka (Percussion) who make cosmic, kraut-inspired electro-acoustic music. Many will be familiar with their previous output on wonderful labels like Kame House and Bureau B.

'Passive Progressive' lands in the form of 8 enthralling tracks that take us through dreamlike and psychedelic echoing territories, where Korf’s modulating electronics and effected vocals ripple over the grooving rhythm section of percussion and bass supplied by Kokus and Chitka. We’ve no doubt that the sound that Love-Songs have crafted with This new album will be enthusiastically received by all sonic voyagers and fans of the label, and we’re over the moon to welcome them to the Phase Group family.

+

Saeko Killy

Joining Love-Songs is the Berlin-based electronic producer Saeko Killy who will be presenting her unique live show of leftfield clubsounds, combining elements of dub, post-punk and kraut with electronic beats.

+

Lo Kindre + Thomas Lea Clarke (DJ Set)

Completing the lineup, Phase Group founders Thomas and Daniel will be playing music from their record collections to set the mood guide the sound of the evening.

Doors - 20:00
Tickets - €10+

lineup: Twen, + aftershow DJ
information:
Special Sunday show at 8MM Bar:

Twen is a lo-fi, ethereal indie punk band born out of the Boston Punk scene, formed in 2017 by vocalist Jane Fitzsimmons and guitarist Ian Jones. Both were playing in bands or putting on shows in the area's fertile DIY house show community, and they soon got together to write songs that were part slightly psychedelic rock and part moody pop. Fitzsimmons' vocal style in the band's earliest days relied on emphatically sung but hard-to-discern lyrics, designed to draw the listener's attention away from prescribed narratives. After moving to Nashville, the duo released a cassette called Twen Live, consisting of five songs recorded at their first show. The band toured steadily throughout the next two years. Described by Vice i-D as "a DIY band about to make it big", in 2019 they signed on with indie label Frenchkiss Records for the release of their studio debut 'Awestruck'. In 2024 Twen will return to Europe with their new LP.

Doors: 19:00
Showtime: 20:30
Aftershow DJ TBA

lineup: Tneeya , Felukah , MEDUSSAR
information:
Felukah is heading out on her first-ever solo world tour “Qabl El Shams”, covering cities across Europe and the SWANA region! This isn’t just another concert… it’s a celebration, a party, and a one-of-a-kind experience. With a fresh new concept and vibe, Felukah is bringing her unique blend of culture, sound, and energy to every stage.

Doors open 20:00
Tickets at the door 25 EUR

About Felukah

Felukah is an Egyptian rapper, singer, poet, and activist who effortlessly blends her Arabic heritage with Western sounds. Dubbed the 'Arabfuturist songstress,' she’s leading a new wave of Arab women in music. Her revolutionary spirit has caught the attention of audiences across the Middle East and the West, landing her opportunities with Boiler Room TV, FIFA World Cup, Harvard University, and the Brooklyn Museum, among others.

True to her versatile nature, Felukah moves between genres and projects with ease, all while keeping her roots in radical love and her North African heritage. This tour is all about pushing boundaries, connecting people, and creating unforgettable memories.

lineup: Theo Croker (Okeh Rec./ Sony Masterworks/US) *live*, , Support: Brekky Boy (AU), , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Hypnotische Jazz-Kompositionen zwischen Tradition und Moderne.

Der Trompeter, Produzent und Komponist Theo Croker ist ein Geschichtenerzähler, der durch seine Trompete spricht – dabei Grenzen überwindet und sich durch Musik Gehör verschafft.

Mit den Alben “BLK2LIFE II A Future Past“ (2021), “Love Quantum“ (2022) und der EP “By The Way“ (2023) hat er einen wichtigen Teil der Herkunft, Gegenwart und Zukunft der Black Music Culture in den USA musikalisch aufgearbeitet. Theo Croker steht damit an der Spitze einer jungen Generation an Musiker*Innen der afro-amerikanischen Jazz-Szene, die das musikalische Erbe und die prägenden kulturellen Leistungen ihrer Vorgänger neu beleuchtet, deren Beitrag für die US-amerikanische Musikentwicklung historisch selbstbewusst aufarbeitet und traditionelle Genre-Grenzen hinter sich lässt.

Gospel, Blues, Jazz, Soul, Funk: Theo Croker hebt die musikhistorischen Gemeinsamkeiten all dieser Genres hervor und verwandelt sie in einen neuen, zeitgemäßen Sound. Auf einer Metaebene sind diese Strömungen für ihn in der positiven Gestaltungskraft der Liebe verbunden, die es ermöglicht, gegen alle Widerstände neue Erlebniswelten und Realitäten zu schaffen: „Love Quantum ist auch eine Hommage an all die verschiedenen Ebenen der Liebe, die es geben kann - Liebe zu einem Freund, Liebe zu einem Partner, Liebe zu einem Elternteil, Liebe zu sich selbst und Liebe zum Leben. Es geht darum, wie mächtig diese Energie für uns als Menschen ist.“

Eröffnet wird der Abend von Brekky Boy. Das Electro-Psychedelic-Jazz-Trio aus Sydney spielt am liebsten in Jazz-Bars und auf Berggipfeln. Mit Einflüssen von Künstler*innen wie Tigran Hamasyan, GoGo Penguin, Robert Glasper und Phronesis hat das Ensemble einen lebendigen, originellen Sound entwickelt, der Elemente aus Jazz, Rock, Minimal und Folk enthält. Mit ihren mitreißenden Live-Shows gehören Brekky Boy zu den aufregendsten jungen Acts der australischen Jazz- und Instrumentalszene. Ihren ursprünglichen Traum, in der World Surf League anzutreten, haben die am Strand von Sydney lebenden Musiker aufgegeben, dafür wurden sie für den Montreux Jazz Award nominiert, haben Bands wie Snarky Puppy supportet und auf zahlreichen internationalen Jazzfestivals gespielt. Das Trio ist bis heute völlig unabhängig geblieben und hat 2023 seine vierte EP 'Seita' veröffentlicht.

“Lyrical melodies, hard-hitting polyrhythms, EST/Tigran-style progressive grooves and no shortage of Aussie humour…” - Jazzwise

Photo: Obidigbo Nzeribe

________________________________________


Theo Croker is a storyteller who speaks through his trumpet. A creative who refuses boundaries, the GRAMMY Award-nominated artist, composer, producer, thought leader, and influencer projects his voice through the music.

With the albums "BLK2LIFE II A Future Past" (2021), "Love Quantum" (2022) and the EP "By The Way" (2023) he has musically reappraised an important part of the origin, present and future of black music culture in the USA. Theo Croker is at the forefront of a young generation of African-American jazz musicians who are shedding new light on the musical legacy and formative cultural achievements of their predecessors, confidently reassessing their contribution to the development of US music and leaving traditional genre boundaries behind.

Gospel, blues, jazz, soul, funk: Theo Croker emphasises the musical-historical similarities of all these genres and transforms them into a new, contemporary sound. On a meta level, he connects these trends with the positive creative power of love, which makes it possible to create new worlds of experience and realities against all odds: "Love Quantum is also a tribute to all the different levels of love that can exist - love for a friend, love for a partner, love for a parent, love for yourself and love for life. It's about how powerful this energy is for us as human beings.”

The evening will be opened by Brekky Boy. The electro-psychedelic jazz trio from Sydney prefers to play in jazz bars and on mountain peaks. With influences from artists such as Tigran Hamasyan, GoGo Penguin, Robert Glasper and Phronesis, the ensemble has developed a vibrant, original sound that incorporates elements of jazz, rock, minimal and folk. Brekky Boy are one of the most exciting young acts on the Australian jazz and instrumental scene. Having given up their original dream of competing in the World Surf League, the Sydney beach-based musicians have been nominated for the Montreux Jazz Award, supported bands such as Snarky Puppy and played at numerous international jazz festivals. The trio has remained completely independent to this day and released their fourth EP ‘Seita’ in 2023.

“Lyrical melodies, hard-hitting polyrhythms, EST/Tigran-style progressive
grooves and no shortage of Aussie humour…” - Jazzwise

Photos: Obidigbo Nzeribe

address: Im U-Bhf. Schlesisches Tor; 10997 Berlin; Germany
lineup: The Body & Dis Fig , Support: otay:onii
information:
The Body and Dis Fig find kinship in reimagining what it means to make »heavy music.« Their debut Orchards of a Futile Heaven is the perfect synthesis of two forces, twisting melodicism and intoxicating rhythms, layering a dense miasma of distortion with intense beats and a soaring voice clawing its way towards absolution.

The multidisciplinary artist and performer otay:onii infuses her productions with a shapeshifting voice, leaping from oddball pop melodies to shrieking caprice as she explores themes of anxiety and selfhood over swirling drones, distorted harmony, noise, and carnivalesque ceremonial forms. With the revenant might of a lunar spectre, her hull-breached vibes twist and scurry like the by-blows of a dead god’s dreams, corkscrewing down into the mind’s cringing eye.

lineup: Open Decks for Vinyl DJs
information:
VINYL ONLY! 

Jeden Dienstag ab 18:00 Uhr. Seit inzwischen mehr als 10 Jahren ist der Dienstag mit "Open Decks & Tischtennis" im Humboldthain Club eine feste Instanz für Nordberliner Bewegungsjunkies. 

Ob die Platten zum Auflegen, die Kellen fürs Tischtennis oder die Ballerinas für den Floor – jeden Dienstag könnt ihr euer Spielzeug mitbringen und vom Wochenende entschlacken. 
Ob Techno, Drum and Bass, Disco oder Mamas Schlagersammlung – jeder Stil ist willkommen und wird vom Publikum abgefeiert. 

Daher bietet der "Open Decks Abend" vielen jungen DJs eine nach wie vor einzigartige Plattform zur Darbietung ihrer Künste und zum Austausch untereinander. 

Zwei Tischtennisplatten, genug Kellen für alle, ein Kickertisch, satter Sound aus den Boxen und nicht zuletzt leckeres Bier vom Fass, tragen dazu bei, dass eine stetig wachsende Zahl an gut gelaunten Menschen den Dienstag im Humboldthain Club zu ihrer Homebase erklärt hat. 

FAQ Frage: Wie läuft das mit dem Auflegen? 
Antwort: Zu Beginn jeder Veranstaltung liegt an der Mainbar eine Liste mit den DJ-Slots für den Abend aus. 

Jeder Slot geht eine halbe Stunde und jeder DJ darf nur einen (seinen) Namen in die Liste eintragen. 
Pro Abend gibt es 20 Slots! 
Es empfiehlt sich also, nicht all zu spät zu kommen, sonst ist die Liste voll.
