lineup: Jasmine Myra (Gondwana Records/UK) *live*, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Jasmine Myra: Euphorische Instrumentalmusik

Nach einer sensationellen Show im letzten Jahr, kommt die britische Saxophonistin Jasmine Myra im Oktober wieder bei uns vorbei und bringt auch gleich ein neues Album mit. Wunderschön arrangiert, verbindet “Rising“ Jasmine Myras musikalische Einflüsse zwischen Kenny Wheeler, Bonobo, Olafur Arnalds und Shabaka Hutchings zu einem stimmigen Ganzen.  Ihre spirituelle Instrumentalmusik hat einen euphorischen und erhebenden Klang und weist dabei eine ganz besondere Qualität auf - schwelgerisch, melodisch und glückselig, ohne in Sentimentalität abzugleiten.

Die Saxophonistin, Komponistin und Bandleaderin Jasmine Myra stammt aus Leeds und lebt heute in London. Seit 2022 ist sie bei Gondwana Records unter Vertrag und arbeitet eng mit Labelbesitzer und Produzent Matthew Halsall zusammen, dessen Gespür für Talente bereits die Musik von GoGo Penguin, Mammal Hands und Hania Rani in die Welt getragen hat. Im Sommer 2022 veröffentlichte sie ihr hochgelobtes Debütalbum Horizons", das von der Kritik begeistert aufgenommen wurde. Mit Clubshows und Festivalauftritten in ganz Großbritannien und auf dem europäischen Festland nahm ihre Karriere rasant Fahrt auf.

“Rising“ knüpft nahtlos an die Qualität des Vorgängers an und ist ein wichtiges Statement für den britischen Jazz. Aufgenommen hat sie das Album erneut mit dem Gitarristen Ben Haskins, dem Schlagzeuger George Hall, dem Pianisten Jasper Green, der Harfenistin Alice Roberts und dem Bassisten Sam Quintana, die gemeinsam die subtilen Texturen von Myras Musik gekonnt unterstreichen und mit einer kollektiven Sensibilität und Dynamik spielen, die die Musik wirklich auf eine strahlende Reise schickt. Don’t miss!

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

präsentiert von hhv

Photo: Emerged Agency

_________________________________________


After a sensational show last year, British saxophonist Jasmine Myra returns in October with a new album.

Jasmine Myra is a saxophonist, composer and bandleader from Leeds, now based in London. Her original instrumental music has a euphoric and uplifting sound, influenced by artists as diverse as Bonobo, Olafur Arnalds and Kenny Wheeler, whose music shares an emotive quality that can also be heard in Jasmine's own compositions. In early 2022, she signed to Gondwana Records and worked with label owner and producer Matthew Halsall (whose keen ear for talent has helped bring the music of GoGo Penguin, Mammal Hands and Hania Rani to the wider world) to deliver her critically acclaimed debut album 'Horizons' in summer 2022.

Following the release of 'Horizons', Jasmine's musical career and profile skyrocketed over the next year and a half. Brilliant reviews worldwide, massive radio airplay and top streaming playlists led to major tours and festival appearances across the UK and mainland Europe.

Elevating, uplifting and beautifully arranged: Jasmine Myra's second album 'Rising' builds on the success of her groundbreaking debut to deliver a major statement from one of the UK's rising jazz stars. Produced by Matthew Halsall and mixed by Greg Freeman, 'Rising' is a confident and vibrant follow-up that connects the musical dots between Myra's influences Kenny Wheeler, Bonobo and Shabaka Hutchings to create something unique, beautiful and profound.

‘Rising’ features the same core of musicians as ‘Horizons’, with guitarist Ben Haskins, drummer George Hall pianist Jasper Green, harpist Alice Roberts and bassist Sam Quintana who collectively bring a deft understating of the subtle textures of Myra’s music and perform with a collective empathy and drive that really pushes the music on a radiant journey.

lineup: Säule: , Agata (PL), Volruptus, Whrikk
information:
Mit einer stimmigen Mischung aus Techno, IDM und Breakcore kombiniert der niederländische DJ/Produzent Whrikk komplexe Drum-Programmierung und melodische Elemente und findet so die perfekte Balance zwischen tanzbaren Grooves und elektronischem Chaos. Neben seinem DJ-Set gibt es an diesem Abend in der Säule auch ein Live-Set von Volruptus: Das letzte Album Moxie des aus Reykjavik stammenden Künstlers erschien letztes Jahr über Herrensauna und bietet widerspenstige Drums, erratische Arpeggios und glitchige Bässe. Eröffnet wird der Abend von Agata, die kürzlich Tracks auf NO BORDERS und loveisthetruth veröffentlicht hat.

With a cohesive blend of techno, IDM and breakcore, DJ/producer Whrikk from the Netherlands combines complex drum programming and melodic elements, finding the perfect balance between danceable grooves and electronic mayhem. Besides his DJ set, this Säule night welcomes a live set by Volruptus: the Reykjavík native's latest album Moxie arrived last year via Herrensauna, offering unruly drums, erratic arpeggios and glitchy bass. Opening the night will be Agata, who has recently released tracks on NO BORDERS and loveisthetruth.

information:

Based in New York, she blends genres effortlessly, captivating audiences with her infectious energy and eclectic taste. Drawing from a wide range of influences, Samantha creates unique atmospheres with rich textures and groovy beats. Kristina Sheli is a versatile Georgian singer-songwriter and DJ based in Berlin, celebrated for her broad range across genres like house, electronica, and hip-hop. With over a decade of live performances both in Berlin and internationally, she has collaborated with renowned producers such as The Beatminerz, Martin Badder, and Ruede Hagelstein. Ab 20.00 Uhr begrüßen wir Euch und um ca. 21.15 Uhr startet das Programm. Bitte achtet darauf pünktlich zu sein, da wir während der Hypnose niemanden mehr reinlassen können!

Erotik-Hypnotiseur „ViVe“ zeigt Euch in seiner Show zuerst was mit erotischer Hypnose möglich ist. Danach kann jeder selbst erleben, wie erotische Hypnose sich anfühlt und sich direkt von ViVe hypnotisieren lassen!

Als Höhepunkt des Abends wird er Euch, mittels Hypnose, tief in euer eigenes Lustzentrum hineinführen: So tief, dass nichts anderes mehr als Eure Lust existiert.

Danach werdet Ihr voll und ganz von eurem Verlangen und Eurer Lust kontrolliert — bis ihr Sex braucht, wie die Luft zum Atmen.   Und was dann geschieht… liegt ganz allein bei Euch!

Zielgruppe: Ideal für Paare und Singles, die sich gern einmal hypnotisieren lassen wollen, um sich danach ihrer Lust hinzugeben.

Ein wichtiger Hinweis zur Hypnose:

Es geschehen nur Dinge, die Du selbst auch willst. Es wird niemand „vorgeführt“ und du kannst auch nur Zuschauer sein. Dabei gilt: Das Erlebnis ist nur so gut, soweit du dich darauf einlässt. Du selbst hast jederzeit die Kontrolle. Auch darüber, diese abzugeben und es in deinem Geist explodieren zu lassen!

Bitte beachtet:

Wir werden versuchen auf ein ausgewogenes Verhältnis von Paaren, Frauen und Single-Männern zu achten. Auch wenn „hemmungslose Lust“ im Vordergrund der Party steht, so ist dies keine HÜ oder Gang Bang Party. Durch Hypnose wird niemand „willenlos“ und wer andere belästigt, weil er glaubt durch Hypnose „schnell zum Schuss“ zu kommen, wird sehr schnell und konsequent die Party verlassen müssen.

ACHTUNG: KEINE EINLASSGARANTIE – Wir sorgen für ein ausgewogenes Verhältnis zwischen Männern und Frauen und das letzte Wort hat der Türsteher vom Insomnia!

*Alle Softdrinks, Bier, Wein und Sekt sind im Preis inklusive!

P﻿reise:

Single Frauen - 39 EUR

S﻿ingle Männer - 99 EUR

P﻿aare - 69 EUR

Nach dem Euch Vive um 21.00 Uhr in einer kurzen Show – unter Einsatz seiner mitgebrachten „Spielzeuge“ – gezeigt hat, was mit erotischer Hypnose alles möglich ist, seid Ihr an der Reihe!

In einer darauf folgenden Gruppen-Trance lässt VIVE zuerst alle in tiefe Hypnose sinken. Während dieser Trance gibt ViVe dann unterschiedliche Suggestionen. Dabei kann jeder für sich selbst entscheiden, welche Suggestionen der- oder diejenige während der Hypnose für sich akzeptieren möchte.

Folgende hypnotischen „Höhepunkte“ hat ViVe für Dich auf der Party vorbereitet:

Exklusive „Insomnia Trance“:

Das Insomnia ist eine andere Welt. Und in dieser Trance werdet ihr den Alltag hinter Euch lassen. Aller Stress, alle Sorgen, alles was Euch blockiert, bleibt draußen. Und Ihr seid frei, Eure Fantasien zu leben und werdet Euch sinnlich, selbstbewusst und sexy fühlen. Wenn Ihr wollt, könnt Ihr diesen Trigger bei Euch behalten und die Effekte danach jedes Mal fühlen, sobald Ihr das Insomnia betretet.

Erregungs-Trigger:

Stellt Euch vor, jeder (dem Ihr es erlaubt!) braucht nur ein Wort zu sagen, und Ihr werdet sofort geil werden. Nur ein Wort in Euer Ohr geflüstert und Euer Körper reagiert mit purer Lust. Dieser Trigger wird nur bei Personen funktionieren, von denen Ihr wollt, dass sie ihn benutzen können und er wird nach dem Verlassen des Insomnia seine Wirkung verlieren.

Erhöhte Wahrnehmung:

Ihr habt bestimmt davon gehört, wie ein Zahnarzt mit Hypnose den Schmerz nehmen kann. Wir machen das Gegenteil. Stellt Euch vor, all Eure erogenen Zonen werden empfindlicher und sinnlicher. Jede Berührung wird intensiver. Und Eure Haut wird sich nach Berührung sehnen.

Hypnotischer Orgasmus:

Du willst kommen? Ohne, dass Du Dich dabei anfassen musst? Dann lass Dich auf einen hypnotischen Orgasmus ein und erlebe einen Höhepunkt wie noch nie zuvor.

Verloren in der Lust:

Sozusagen der „Höhepunkt“ nach dem „Höhepunkt“ des Abends. Ihr werdet Euch auf eine Reise tief in die Lust begeben — so tief, dass nichts anderes mehr zählt. Zu einem Ort an dem Ihr voll und ganz von Eurem Verlangen und Eurer Lust kontrolliert werdet. Bis Ihr Sex braucht, wie die Luft zum Atmen.

Und was nach dieser Hypnose geschieht… liegt dann ganz allein an Euch! Die gut ausgestatteten Spielräume des Insomnia stehen Euch zur Verfügung!

███████  ABOUT US  ████████████
... ... ...

Curious to know what really defines us?

-- COMMUNITY
We have a sexy, open-minded, and close-knit community that extends far beyond the usual forms of social media. Pre and after-parties are usually part of the overall experience.

-- CLUBS & VENUES
Clubs/Venues are regularly changed, shaping the long nights to be specially tailored to the location and differing in our specials and lineup.

-- ARTISTS & SPECIALS
We invite special artists & performers to our parties or create space for new extravagant ideas in our world. Keep an eye out for specials on our flyers or in social media. We make a point to always prepare something unique.

-- EXCLUSIVITY
The audience depends on the event; we make our selection on-site, sometimes online, and check the dress code at the door. You can be sure that we have developed a sense of who brings the right mindset.

-- MEANING
It's not just about sex - it's about a feeling, a relaxed mindset that we prefer. We come to celebrate, to connect, and to find out what our Libido(h) wants to do with us. Those who come only for the F-word should stay outside.

-- PRIVACY
No-photo policy, not even by photographers.


And what else?

-- SAFETY & CONSENT
Of course, we also take care of your safety. An awareness team is deployed for every event, security is present, and our rules are highlighted. You can find them on our website as well.

-- ACCESSIBILITY & INCLUSIVITY
A platform for newcomers and a meeting point for the scene. We want to ensure that the right characters have access to our world. So don't hesitate to ask questions and give feedback, whether in person at the door, in the club, or online. If you're uncertain about the dress code, we can gladly provide recommendations.

information:
Tehran Contemporary Sounds is proud to announce the fifth edition of the TCS festival to be happening 29th of October to 3rd of November 2024 in Bethanien Studio 1 and Kino Central.
TCS is a Berlin-based hub, for Iranian musicians, sonic and visual artists and collectives living abroad as well as in Iran, with the aim to bring together the different voices and forces of the big spectrum of the Iranian contemporary, experimental art and music scene, widely spread across the globe.
TCS is dedicated to, creating a platform for showcasing the unique talents of the Iranian artists and musicians; creating a cross-border collaboration hub; facilitating an artistic and interdisciplinary dialogue;

In the five days of the festival we’ll have, a number 15 av performances, in Kunstquartier Bethanien Studio 1 and two days of film screenings curated by Experimental Film Society at Kino Central.

TCS is turning Five!!! 

Please follow our social media pages and website for exact opening and admission times!

information:
We are excited to invite you to our next event at LARK on the 1st November

a night where music, art, and community come together with the purest intention. This is more than just a night out, it’s a family gathering, a space where we celebrate culture and connection. For 9 hours, we’ll share an intimate journey guided by 3 incredible artists, each taking the stage for 3 hours, letting their music speak directly to your soul. The lineup will remain a surprise, because here, it’s not about who’s playing 

it’s about the music itself, the energy we create together, and the values we uphold.

This is a place of respect, where we come together as a community that values authenticity, openness, and love for the culture. We believe that music is not only for dancing, but a powerful force for change, and a reflection of who we are. As a special treat, a guest visual artist will be presenting their work, adding another layer of artistry to the night.

We can’t wait to welcome you all, our extended family, to share this experience with us. Let’s create something beautiful, together. See you at LARK

HALLOWEEN SPECIAL - CASTLE RAVE BERLIN - ZITADELLE SPANDAU in ZITA CLUB

2 FLOORS - 8 ACTS - HALLOWEEN DEKO - RAVE IN EINER ECHTEN FESTUNG

Enen RAVE in einer echten alten BURG zu Halloween und das in BERLIN? Könnt Ihr haben!



DAS EVENT GEHT VON Start: 22:00h - Ende 07:00h
Eventbrite lässt es nicht zu dies länger einzutragen!


Nach unserem erffolgreichen ersten Castle Rave im September dachten wir uns Halloween wäre perfekt für einen zweiten! Hier haben wir dann auch nohc einen zweiten Floor für Euch. Und es wird Halloween Deko geben!

Die Zitadelle Spandau ist eine der bedeutenden und besterhaltenen Festungen der Hochrenaissance in Europa. Sie befindet sich nordöstlich der Spandauer Altstadt am gegenüberliegenden Havelufer im Berliner Ortsteil Haselhorst und ist eine bekannte Sehenswürdigkeit des Berliner Bezirks Spandau.

Kern der Anlage ist eine mittelalterliche Burg, von der noch Bergfried und Palas erhalten sind. Um sie herum wurde in den Jahren 1559–1594 ein Festungsbauwerk nach dem damals aktuellen Stand der Technik angelegt.



WIR FREUEN UNS MIIT EUCH AUF EINEN MEGA HALLOWEEN RAVE!

lineup: Julius Rodriguez (Verve/US) *live*, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Der in New York geborene und in Los Angeles lebende Multiinstrumentalist, Komponist, Bandleader und Produzent Julius Rodriguez sprengt alle Grenzen und präsentiert einen einzigartigen Sound, der nur ihm gehört. Auf seinem aktuellen Album “Evergreen“ jongliert er mit Elementen aus Jazz, Gospel, Hip-Hop, Klassik und Electronica. Keyboardsounds, Vocoder und digitale Drums treffen auf reiche Melodie- und Harmonieparts, das Ganze klingt hochmodern, ist ebenso eingängig wie komplex und geht sofort ins Ohr. Beschränkte er sich auf dem Vorgänger “Let Sound Tell All“ noch weitgehend auf seine Hauptinstrumente Klavier und Schlagzeug, so spielt er hier neben diversen Keyboards und Percussion auch Bass, Gitarre und Klarinette.

Auf die Frage nach den Genres hat er eine klare und schöne Antwort: "Ich hoffe, ihr hört das hier und vergesst die ganze Sache mit den Genrebezeichnungen", sagt er. "Das ist einfach Musik, zu der man tanzen, fühlen und denken kann. Evergreen geht durch eine ganze Reihe von Genres, aber das ist die Welt, die ich sehe und höre. Das ist das Gefühl, das ich hervorrufe. Ich habe ein Statement abgegeben und gesagt: Das Genre bin nur ich". Kurzum: Julius Rodriguez verkörpert den wahren Geist des Jazz, indem er ihn völlig befreit in die Zukunft führt.

Wer im Alter von 25 Jahren bereits eine derart ausgereifte Musikalität an den Tag legt, muss sich wohl das Prädikat Wunderkind gefallen lassen. Rodriguez ist ein Multitalent: Klavier und Harmonielehre zu beherrschen, helfe ihm beim Schlagzeugspielen, das wiederum die rhythmische Dimension des Klaviers besser erfasse, sagt er. Sein Werdegang in Stichworten: mit zwölf an der Manhattan School of Music, mit vierzehn erste Auftritte, dann ans legendäre Julliard. Beim Betty Carter Workshop wurde er unter anderem von Jason Moran unterrichtet. Inzwischen hat er mit Wynton Marsalis, Roy Hargrove oder Meshell Ndegeocello gearbeitet und war Mitglied des Onyx Collective.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

präsentiert von hhv

Photo: atibaphoto

_____________________________________


No matter where, Julius Rodriguez, the New York-born and Los Angeles-based multi-instrumentalist, composer, and producer electrifies any lane. By doing so, he also transcends perceived boundaries between genres and styles, redefining the music to mirror his own fluid creative inclinations and delivering a sound that's solely his alone.
Following widespread applause from The New York Times, Vanity Fair, The FADER, and more, collaborations with everyone from Wynton Marsalis to A$AP Rocky, and tens of millions of streams, he grows in as many directions as possible on his second full-length offering, EVERGREEN [Verve Records].

"An 'EVERGREEN' is a plant whose foliage remains functional for all seasons. That's similar to how I like to be; I want to be myself no matter the genre I'm playing or what's going on around me. There are a lot of styles on this record, but it's recognizably my voice."
By breaking boundaries with EVERGREEN, Julius has lived up to the true spirit of jazz by ushering it towards the future freely. "I hope you hear this and forget about the whole genre labeling thing," he leaves off. "This is just music you can dance to, feel to, and think to. It's not about categorizing; it's about enjoying something for what it is. EVERGREEN goes through a whole bunch of genres, but this is the world I'm seeing and hearing. This is the feeling I'm invoking. I made a statement and said, 'The genre is just me'."

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

Presented by hhv

lineup: King Kong Kicks
information:
WE LOVE:
The Killers // The Wombats // Metronomy // Two Door Cinema Club // Blur // Pixies // New Order // Bloc Party // The Kooks // Maximo Park // Franz Ferdinand // Tocotronic // Oasis // Arctic Monkeys // The Ting Tings // Arcade Fire // Phoenix // Shout Out Louds // Foals // Bonaparte // Editors // Vampire Weekend // Tomte // Florence + the Maschine // Mumford & Sons
-----------------------------------------------------
The Early Days ist eine Zeitreise in das goldene Jahrzehnt des Indie als die großen Bands um Arctic Monkey, Bloc Party & The Killers Hitalben am laufenden Band produzierten und damit Musikgeschichte schrieben. Das waren noch Zeiten... The Early Days eben. Natürlich dürfen zwischen den ganzen Ausrast- und Mitsingsongs nicht die Wegbereiter wie The Smiths, Oasis und Queen fehlen. Also let's dance to Joy Division and celebrate the irony.

The Early Days is a journey back in time to the golden decade of indie, when the big bands like Arctic Monkey, Bloc Party & The Killers churned out hit albums and wrote music history. Those were the days... The Early Days. Of course, among all the freakout- and singalong songs, pioneers like The Smiths, Oasis and Queen shouldn't be missing. So let's dance to Joy Division and celebrate the irony.
Britpop, Indie, Post-Punk, New Wave & Beyond 1980-2010
Indie-Party Like It's 200X
THE EARLY DAYS

Fr. 01.11.24 // 23:59 // Lido Berlin-Kreuzberg

lineup: Bassem Saad & Sanja Grozdanic, Casey MQ, MIRA 新伝統 , Sorour Darabi with Ange Halliwell, Pablo Altar, Shaly Lopez, The Fertile Crescent, XTC in the XIV, Yawning Portal , Yi Li
information:
The scientific concept of parallax refers to the apparent shift in the position of an object when viewed from different vantage points. Metaphorically, it can represent a psychological, philosophical, or artistic change in the understanding of a situation, idea, or truth, depending on one’s perspective. The title of 3hd’s “Underworld” concert and performance event at Silent Green Kulturquartier’s Betonhalle suggests such multiplicity, with its subterranean prefix representing just one of many possible worlds and interpretations.

As its own modification to the repurposed Wedding crematorium complex, the below-ground concrete hall hosts a monumental night of music and live performance, ritual and ceremony, that delves into the infinite possibilities, potentialities, and planes of existence influencing our every day. Casey MQ explores the fluid and unreliable nature of memory through introspective piano and vocal arrangements, and Yawning Portal’s highly deconstructed and improvised live set creates an ambient devotional of "music to levitate to." Playing material from their forthcoming album, The Fertile Crescent’s Oxhy and Susu Laroche merge folk anthems and mystic drone metal to explore the sublime space of communal ritual and emotional exchange. MIRA新伝統’s performance of sentient geography and ceremonial resistance to commodification challenges societal norms through their cosmic narratives blending experimental fiction, shamanic culture, and AI-generated visuals.

Sorour Darabi’s “FROM THE THROAT TO THE DAWN” centerpiece embraces transformation, identity, and contemporary myth through performance and dance. Created in collaboration with Pablo Altar and Ange Halliwell, the performance reinterprets "night" through the lens of One Thousand and One Nights’s central Scheherazade character. Bassem Saad & Sanja Grozdanić’s script-based performance, “Permanent Trespass (Beirut of the Balkans and the American Century)” contends with the possibility and mutability of mourning through protracted catastrophe as the frame of who or what is being mourned appears to shift and unsettle, giving form to the double exposure of past and present occurring at moments of historic transition. Meanwhile, vocal ensemble XTC IN THE XIV applies live electronics to early polyphonic choral arrangements, using time-stretched and pitch-shifted samples to probe the uncanny and cross-temporal relationships in music, while Yi Li’s “Eternal Death” video installation recreates and reorganizes abstract sensory experiences in physical and digital spaces. Shaly López’s scenography generates atmospheric compositions that challenge perception by staging non-physical dimensions, such as dreams and meditative states through sound, light, and scent.

The existence of an underworld assumes an overworld, and many more worlds that reflect each other in an infinite mirror of duplicate glass surfaces that go on forever. This effect of light bouncing back and forth, at equal yet opposite angles, creates the illusion of limitless space and reveals deeper insights into the boundless possibilities of parallax.

information:
Get ready to dive into the electrifying world of SMALL GREAT HOUSE as we return to our home base, OXI, on November 2nd.

After an unforgettable summer season, we're back stronger than ever, bringing you the ultimate November event. Prepare to be swept into a realm where music takes control, as we take over OXI’s sprawling venue in the heart of Berlin. With three indoor floors—including a vinyl-only room—this promises to be an extraordinary journey through the essence of house music.
Expect a stellar lineup of artists who will curate an immersive sonic experience, perfectly amplified by OXI’s cutting-edge sound system. 
Whether you're into house, disco, or anything in between, this night will captivate everyone who lives for the pulse of the beat.

In this occasion we are going to celebrate as well our new vinyl release SGT009 "Small Great Tunes" featuring the Small Great Things. artists. 

This isn’t just a night out—it’s an unforgettable experience waiting to unfold. Save the date for November 2nd and get ready to lose yourself in the rhythm.

Event Details: Indoor: 23:00 – 10:00 (next day)

Special Features:
3 Indoor Floors
Vinyl-only Room
Spacious Chillout Area


IMPORTANT: Reduced tickets (entry before 12 AM) are available online only. These tickets are valid until 12 AM—arrive later, and you'll be charged the difference for a full-price ticket.

OXI features a large outdoor garden and three indoor dance floors. You can find all our vinyl releases, as well as our new release and merch, during the event at OXI! See you there, house music lovers! We strive to provide a safe and worry-free space. Please respect everyone’s identity, act with consent and care. Discriminatory behavior of any kind will not be tolerated. Please respect our no photo/video policy.

information:
Zürich Meets Berlin: Kerala Dust (DJ set), Valentino Vivace, Pina Palau, Barbicop

After 2022, the international concert series "Zürich Meets..." returns to Berlin this fall and stops at Club ÆDEN on Lohmühleninsel. On Saturday, November 2, 2024, a varied program awaits you on two stages: three concerts and a DJ set - in the spirit of the event title, presented by artists from the small Swiss metropolis.

Edmund Kenny, a native of Zurich and frontman of the Berlin electro-pop band Kerala Dust, will be headlining the DJ set. The evening will be complemented by shows by Italo disco newcomer Valentino Vivace, indie songwriter Pina Palau and the experimental pop sounds of Berliner-by-choice Barbicop.

The evening is brought to you by the City of Zurich, Orange Peel Agency, pøj pøj and Rausgegangen.

lineup: tba
information:
Born from an unrenovated apartment building in Friedrichshain, across the river from Treptower Park, Renate has three main dance floors and many smaller rooms to explore. Every shade and subgenre of electronic music has its place here, from fast, groovy techno to uplifting house music, from chugging EBM to frenetic breakbeat stompers.

☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐

The non-smoking regulations apply in the club. Smoking is only permitted in the garden.

Tickets are available at the door. RA ticket does not guarantee entry; purchased tickets will be refunded in that case. Box office 22€ (incl. 2€ wardrobe).

Please note we are fully cashless, we ONLY accept CARD and BITCOIN payments at the club.

Renate should be a safe space for any ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation. Any sign of racism, sexism or homophobia will not be tolerated.
In case you feel that you have been treated wrongly, or that your space has been violated, please notify our awareness team or our staff.

information:
Zürich Meets Berlin: Kerala Dust (DJ Set), Valentino Vivace, Pina Palau, Barbicop

Nach 2022 kehrt die internationale Konzertreihe «Zürich Meets…» in diesem Herbst nach Berlin zurück und macht im Club ÆDEN auf der Lohmühleninsel Halt. Am Samstag, den 2. November 2024 erwartet dich auf zwei Bühnen ein abwechslungsreiches Programm: Drei Konzerte und ein DJ-Set – ganz im Sinne des Veranstaltungstitels, präsentiert von Künstler*innen aus der kleinen Schweizer Metropole.

 

Als Headliner konnte Edmund Kenny, gebürtiger Zürcher und Frontmann der Berliner Electro-Pop-Band Kerala Dust, für ein DJ-Set gewonnen werden. Ergänzt wird der Abend durch Shows des Italo-Disco-Newcomers Valentino Vivace, der Indie-Songwriterin Pina Palau sowie der experimentellen Pop-Klänge der Wahlberlinerin Barbicop.

Präsentiert wird dir der Abend von der Stadt Zürich, Orange Peel Agency, pøj pøj und Rausgegangen.

Fritz Kalkbrenner presents his new album Third Place at Metropol Berlin on November 2, 2024, turning the venue into a vibrant epicenter of pure good vibes. 

With his unmistakable voice and a fusion of deep house, melodic techno and breakbeats, he delivers a show that strikes right at the heart of club culture. New tracks like "Into the Night" and "Playing Games" create euphoric highs as the space pulses with electrifying grooves. 

It's set to be an unforgettable night, touching not just every sense but the very soul of the crowd – pure energy that lights up the night!

information:
Berlin based Drum & Bass label Stoic Music is back with another night full of the best deep and liquid D&B.

We welcome you again to Panke Club in the northern part of the city to party with us until the sun rises.

For our last edition this year we welcome Kowstla from Montpellier, France who was one of our first ever releases (sixth!) and Relict from Leipzig, who's released his first ever full EP with us in February this year! This one has been our best received release to date too!

The line-up will be complemented by labelstay and Berlin based producer Initia and the two founders of the label Anton Quasi and Skulder & Mully.


Expect the full power of deep, rolling and minimal Drum & Bass. Strictly underground and as always: 10€ at the door - no presale, no bullshit.

event_name: Kiezsalon with Judith Hamann & Sofia Jernberg and Ben Glas
lineup: Judith Hamann, Sofia Jernberg, Ben Glas
information:
For our final Kiezsalon of the year, we head to the Akademie der Künste in Tiergarten for some musical edification. Making their first collaborative appearance in Berlin are vocalist extraordinaire Sofia Jernberg and cellist Judith Hamann, presenting their commissioned work from MADEIRADiG last year. They will be joined by Berlin-based composer and psychoacoustic researcher Ben Glas.

Born in Ethiopia and raised in Vietnam, Stockholm-based Sofia Jernberg is an exceptional singer and composer. With a background in jazz, she focuses on unconventional techniques and sounds such as non-verbal vocalisation, split tones and toneless singing. Music theatre and contemporary opera also play an important role in Jernberg’s artistic oeuvre. 
In 2023, she made her debuts with the Collegium Novum Zurich, Ensemble Resonanz and the Lucerne Festival Contemporary Orchestra.

Originally from Melbourne, Judith Hamann is a cellist meanwhile based in Berlin whose process-based creative practice encompasses electroacoustic music, site-specific generative work and microtonal systems. The Wire posited that Judith “destroys the fiction of the musician who lives and works outside conventional parameters and puts in its place a series of compositions that are fundamentally humane.”

Ben Glas is an experimental composer who moved from Portland to pursue Sonic Studies at the Berlin University of the Arts. Through ephemeral compositions, he questions preconceived notions of passive hearing versus active listening. His works focus on the realms of subjective perception and cognition via the use of acoustics, psychoacoustics and space as tools for sonic composition.

Founded over three centuries ago, the Akademie der Künste is one of Europe’s oldest cultural institutes. Designed by architect Werner Düttmann, Hanseatenweg is a generous, yet modest ensemble of three different buildings encompassed by courtyards and gardens, a proper site to ring out the year before we take our winter break.

lineup: Avantdale Bowling Club
information:
Tom Scott is one of the most compelling figures to emerge from the New Zealand music scene over the last seventeen years. He returns to Europe this October with his Avantdale Bowling Club project, following sold out shows in 2023.

Over the course of two albums, Avantdale Bowling Club (2018) and Trees (2022), Tom has worked with musicians and producers in New Zealand to craft a vivid intermingling of jazz, soul, hip-hop and electronica. Written from a working class perspective at the bottom of the globe, Scott’s lyrics explore the day-to-day realities of life lived on the margins of society. 

Sad and celebratory in equal measure, Avantdale Bowling Club has been lauded by NPR, Refuge Worldwide and Radio New Zealand. The debut release won the coveted Album of the Year and best Hip-Hop artist at the Aotearoa Music Awards followed by Independent Music NZ’s Taite Music Prize for best album release. At the end of 2022 the follow-up Trees debuted at number 1 on the NZ album charts.  

Raised on jazz, soul, funk and rap, Scott has honed his skills as a rapper, songwriter and bandleader through membership in several cult groups (@Peace, Average Rap Band). He first emerged in 2007 with Home Brew, a band that has recently returned to the touring circuit and the top of the NZ charts with an unexpected second album, Run It Back. Scott’s other projects, and his burgeoning Years Gone By label, ensure that he continues to influence and push boundaries across genres.

In May 2023 he made his UK debut, selling out two shows at London’s Ninety One Living Room and playing at The Great Escape festival in Brighton, before returning in November for a sold-out show at Islington Assembly Hall as part of London Jazz Festival.

event_name: Funk Assault: The Last Dance – Watergate's Final Chapter
lineup: Funk Assault (Chlär and Alarico)
information:
As the lights dim on Watergate’s legendary dancefloor, we invite you to join us for one final night to celebrate the incredible journey we’ve shared. To make sure this farewell is unforgettable, we’re extending the event into an open-end celebration. The music won’t stop, and neither will the energy. Over the years, this space has been more than just a venue – it has been the heartbeat of a community, a place where music, creativity, and unity thrived. Together, we’ve built something iconic: these 10h+ sets have grown into an unforgettable series of events, each moment shaped by your energy, passion, and love for the music.

We are deeply grateful to every dancer, crew, team member who has been part of this journey. Without you, this wouldn’t have been possible. This last dance is not just a goodbye, but a tribute to the memories we’ve created together – a celebration of the friendships, beats, and shared experiences that will live on long after the final track fades.

Join us as we honor Watergate’s legacy one last time, with no time limits – just a night of endless gratitude and celebration for everything we’ve built together.

lineup: Laraaji + Patrick Shiroishi
information:
silent green presents

Based in New York City, Laraaji began playing music on the streets in the 1970s, improvising trance-inducing jams on a modified autoharp processed through various electronic effects. Influential British musician and record producer Brian Eno saw him playing one night in Washington Square Park and invited him to record an album of ambient music at his studio. Laraaji went on to release a prolific series of albums for a wide variety of labels, many of which he recorded himself at home and sold as cassettes during his street performances. In recent years his profile has enjoyed a renaissance via a series of new and reissued recordings on the All Saints label, as well as worldwide performances, laughter meditation workshops and deep listening sessions.

Patrick Shiroishi is a Japanese-American multi-instrumentalist and composer based in Los Angeles who is perhaps best known for his extensive and incredibly intense work with the saxophone. Over the last decade he has established himself as one of the premier improvising musicians in Los Angeles, playing solo and in numerous collaborative projects. Shiroishi may well be considered a foundational player in the city’s vast musical expanse.

lineup: Resavoir (International Anthem/US) *live, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Resavoir - das ist moderner Soul-Jazz mit entspannten Beats, Fusion-Jazz und Alternative Hip-Hop, verwoben mit elektronischen Texturen und zusammen mehr als die Summe dieser Teile. Woran das liegt? Resavoir ist ein kollaboratives Projekt um den in Chicago geborenen Produzenten Will Miller. Der klassisch ausgebildete Trompeter und Komponist ist Mitglied der Indie-Band Whitney und hat unter anderem mit Mac Miller, Lil Wayne, A$AP Rocky und SZA zusammengearbeitet. Inspiriert von Indie-Rock und Hip-Hop hat er die daraus entstandenen Mischformen mit seiner eigenen Sensibilität versehen und einen charakteristischen, beat-orientierten, üppigen und cineastischen Soul-Jazz-Sound entwickelt.

Mit Resavoir tritt Miller in die Rolle des Bandleaders und hat für die Aufnahmen zu den beiden Alben "Resavoir I" und "Resavoir II" jeweils ein Dutzend Instrumentalist*innen aus der Jazz- und Improv-Szene Chicagos um sich versammelt. Miller lässt seine Trompete durch MIDI-Keyboards laufen, experimentiert mit Samplern, Drumcomputern und Synthesizern und entwickelt dabei einen Sound, der ihm eine nahtlose Zusammenarbeit ermöglicht.

Die Musik ist größtenteils instrumental, getragen von Pop-Appeal und Melodien, die so eingängig sind, dass man das Gefühl hat, sie wären schon immer um einen herum gewesen, dabei aber komplex, ausbalanciert und nie verkopft. Subtil strahlende Symphonien, die uns den Glauben zurückgeben können, dass die Welt doch irgendwie in Ordnung ist.

address: 70 Am Wriezener Bahnhof; Friedrichshain; 10243 Berlin; Germany
lineup: Cindy Pooch, O'o
information:
InFiné once again takes over Berlin's legendary Berghain club for another evening! This time, the focus is on voice and sound experimentation: let yourself be mesmerized by the mysticism of singer Cindy Pooch and the onirism of pop-electro duo O'o for a Club InFiné that brings to you the finest of experimental chanson.


Cindy Pooch


Singer-songwriter from Cameroon, Cindy Pooch has been writing and exploring a wide range of music for several years: trip hop, soul, maloya... Until now, she had been a performer for others, before releasing her critically acclaimed 1st solo album “In Nomine Corpus” in 2023. Today, her artistic experiments are mainly motivated by the desire to use voice, words and sound sensations as tools to trigger or accompany healing processes.


O'o


The duo O'o is made up of two strange birds: Victoria Suter and Mathieu Daubigné blend experimental pop, electronica and song. A singular, offbeat blend that evokes the lyrical accents of Kate Bush, the dreaminess of Björk and the groove of Little Dragon. Their music stands out for its vocal creativity and polished production. After releasing their 1st album “Touche” in 2022, O'o are back with a second album, “Songs of Wishes and Bones”, a collection of stories between light and shadow, the 1st chapter of which is set for release in October 2024.

lineup: Jaffar Hussain Randhawa
information:
silent green presents: 

Jaffar Hussain Randhawa is coming to Europe for the first time at the invitation of Pakistani Grammy winner Arooj Aftab and the Dutch Le Guess Who? festival.
Guldasta, meaning bouquet, is the debut solo release of Pakistan's most senior and accomplished Clarinet maestro, Ustad Jaffar Hussain Randhawa. It was recorded live, on the rooftop of his house in Shahdara, on a foggy winter afternoon, as he sat with his favourite accompanists under the Alam. He titled the album Guldasta because he imagines at as a bouqet of flowers, mixing up various raags and styles, each flower with its own distinct fragrance.

Ein experimentelles Rockprojekt mit der Aggressivität und Einfachheit des Punk. Blanco Teta ist mehr als nur eine Musikgruppe – es ist eine kreative und visuelle Erfahrung, die einen direkten Dialog mit dem Publikum herstellt. Unbarmherzige, verzerrte Klanglandschaften, kantige Darbietungen, ein transfeministisches Konzept mit avantgardistischem Ansatz. lineup: freekind. (HR/SI) *live, , Support: Novine
information:
Sei frei. Sei freundlich. Das ist die Philosophie von freekind..  Ihre Mischung aus Neo-Soul, Jazz und Rap, zusammen mit ihren positiven Vibes und einem wundervoll lässigen Flow, sorgt regelmäßig für eindrucksvolle und gleichzeitig nachdenkliche Live-Shows. Ihr Set-Up aus Drums, Keys und Vocals mutet minimalistisch an, ihr Sound ist alles andere als das. Alle, die im letzten Jahr das Konzert im Gretchen erlebt haben, wissen das.

Die kroatische Pianistin und Sängerin Sara Ester Gredelj und die slowenische Schlagzeugerin Nina Korošak-Serčič begannen ihre Zusammenarbeit im Jahr 2019 mit der Veröffentlichung ihrer ersten Single „I'm gonna live“. Im Jahr 2020 veröffentlichten sie ihre erste EP mit dem Titel „not good enough“. 2023 ist mit "Since Always And Forever" ihr Debüt Album erschienen. Lässig groovende, präzise und jazzig verschleppte Beats treiben die Tracks voran, getragen von so pointierten wie gefühlvollen Klavier- und Synthesizer-Sounds und gefühlvoll vorgetragener Lyrik.

freekind. machen Musik mit Botschaft, subtil und aus dem Flow heraus. So ist ihre Single “Good News“ eine Liebeserklärung an das Leben jenseits der schlechten Nachrichten und enthält die Aufforderung, sich auf Liebe und Hoffnung zu beziehen. Oft finden wir beides in unseren täglichen Begegnungen. Schön, das sie auf ihrer “Good News Tour“ wieder zu uns kommen. Also: Seid frei, seid freundlich und kommt zum Konzert, es gibt gute Nachrichten.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

Photo: Jan Filip Jordan Franges

_______________________________________


The soulful group is composed of Croatian pianist and vocalist Sara Ester Gredelj and Slovenian drummer Nina Korošak-Serčič. Their songs carry a strong message of love and hope, complemented by R&B and Jazz grooves.

The music scene got acquainted with the duo in 2020 with their EP “not good enough”. Their first full-length album “Since Always And Forever,” released under the label Butter92 and distributed by Légère Recordings, features 12 songs, including singles like Visualize, Happiness, Good Vibrations, Bright Light, and Carry You.

The album channels the essence of the golden age of hip-hop but in a fresh and innovative way, incorporating elements of pop, neo-soul, and jazz. The result is a distinctive sound that pays homage to its roots while pushing boundaries and creating its own path. It is a testament to freekind.’s ability to blend genres and create a sound that is both nostalgic and progressive.

 The ongoing joke is that their live performances are a sort of group therapy with the songs sharing something that’s inside all of us, in a way that evokes understanding and empathy. With the groove, it is the perfect combination. Music that moves you and MOVES you, if you know what I mean.

event_name: 𝗞𝗮𝗹𝗶 𝗠𝗮𝗹𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝘼𝙡𝙡 𝙇𝙞𝙛𝙚 𝙇𝙤𝙣𝙜
lineup: Kali Malone feat. Stephen O'Malley, Macadam Ensemble, Elena Kakaliagou, Johannes Lauer, Magnus Schriefl, Rike Huy, Weston Olencki
information:
Following a performance at CTM 2024, Kali Malone returns for two dates to present a full live concert version of her album 𝘈𝘭𝘭 𝘓𝘪𝘧𝘦 𝘓𝘰𝘯𝘨 for pipe organ, choir, and brass quintet. The music of 𝘈𝘭𝘭 𝘓𝘪𝘧𝘦 𝘓𝘰𝘯𝘨 simmers in an ever-shifting tension between repetition and variation. The pieces for brass, organ, and voice provide nearly continuous timbral fluctuation even as thematic material reiterates, their internal framework of fractal pattern permutations has the paradoxical effect of creating anticipated keystone moments of dramatic reverie and lulling the listener into believing in an illusory endlessness.

Sounding the massive organ in Berlin’s iconic Kaiser-Wilhelm-Gedächtniskirche with additional organ accompaniment by Stephen O’Malley, Malone will be joined by Macadam Ensemble vocal quartet, and a five-piece microtonal brass ensemble consisting of Elena Kakaliagou, Johannes Lauer, Magnus Schriefl, Rike Huy, and Weston Olencki.

lineup: Open Decks for Vinyl DJs
information:
VINYL ONLY! 

Jeden Dienstag ab 18:00 Uhr. Seit inzwischen mehr als 10 Jahren ist der Dienstag mit "Open Decks & Tischtennis" im Humboldthain Club eine feste Instanz für Nordberliner Bewegungsjunkies. 

Ob die Platten zum Auflegen, die Kellen fürs Tischtennis oder die Ballerinas für den Floor – jeden Dienstag könnt ihr euer Spielzeug mitbringen und vom Wochenende entschlacken. 
Ob Techno, Drum and Bass, Disco oder Mamas Schlagersammlung – jeder Stil ist willkommen und wird vom Publikum abgefeiert. 

Daher bietet der "Open Decks Abend" vielen jungen DJs eine nach wie vor einzigartige Plattform zur Darbietung ihrer Künste und zum Austausch untereinander. 

Zwei Tischtennisplatten, genug Kellen für alle, ein Kickertisch, satter Sound aus den Boxen und nicht zuletzt leckeres Bier vom Fass, tragen dazu bei, dass eine stetig wachsende Zahl an gut gelaunten Menschen den Dienstag im Humboldthain Club zu ihrer Homebase erklärt hat. 

FAQ Frage: Wie läuft das mit dem Auflegen? 
Antwort: Zu Beginn jeder Veranstaltung liegt an der Mainbar eine Liste mit den DJ-Slots für den Abend aus. 

Jeder Slot geht eine halbe Stunde und jeder DJ darf nur einen (seinen) Namen in die Liste eintragen. 
Pro Abend gibt es 20 Slots! 
Es empfiehlt sich also, nicht all zu spät zu kommen, sonst ist die Liste voll.

lineup: Nov 6th - Rashad Becker, Audrey Chen & Hugo Esquinca, Mariam Rezaei. DJs Oren Ambarchi & crys cole , Nov 7th - Nima Aghiani, Mat Pogo, Nina Garcia, Ilpo Väisänen, DJ Jessica Ekomane , Installations throughout the festival by Louis Cameron, Jasmine Guffond & ilan katin, Lottie Sebes
information:
The two-day festival eavesdrop presents contemporary electronic music and sound art from more than a dozen outstanding Berlin-based and international artists. Taking place at silent green’s Betonhalle, the festival’s 3rd edition uniquely brings together a group of adventurous composer/performers and installation artists that share a common practice in electronic sound composition whilst spanning a diversity of inter-related contemporary tendencies. Electronic is understood in its broadest and most curious sense to include turntablism, DIY analogue electronics, AI voice synthesis, generative sound installation, electric guitar manipulations, analogue synthesisers and the human machine relations apparent in processed, extended vocal techniques.  

'To eavesdrop' is a mode of listening intently and eavesdrop invites listeners to consider, from multiple perspectives, new social and technical developments in international music and sound cultures.

lineup: TECHNO MITTWOCH: TUNNEL/TURBINE , TECHSIA , Darren Black, Martin K, Samuel Cy , more..
information:
Get ready for another intense midweek session for Berlin's most dangerous day of the week to rave - WEDNESDAY Lose yourself at AVA Club in the heart of Berlin - underneath the Train Tracks of Warschauer Str S-Bahn Station. This is where your weekend starts or ends on Wednesday! Join us for Mittwoch every week to feel the rolling bass lines and deep kick drums of techno, hard techno, and trance punching through the speakers all night. And since there’s no drama at the door, everyone can experience our best and most sensual night without compromise. Just close your eyes, forget your name, forget the world: It’s Mittwoch. WARNING: Partying on a Wednesday may be hazardous to your health, studies or work...but fuck it,   

Come in your best techno outfit or whatever you feel most comfortable. The most important thing is that you are ready to experience the night and surrender to the music. Techno Wednesday is a celebration of TECHNO culture that pushes the boundaries of what is possible. It is an invitation to immerse yourself in a world where time stands still and music reigns. Get your tickets now and be part of this electrifying night! Leave everyday life behind you and immerse yourself in the world of techno. See you on the dance floor!   

No Sexism, No Racism, No Homophobia.  

AWARENESS TEAM AVA is sensitive to the needs of the people who participate in the events: the " AVA Awareness Team" will give you information and assistance whenever you need it;

Entry prohibited for minors under 18 years of age.

lineup: Skemer LIVE , support TBA
information:
Skemer is the cooperation between singer Kim Peers and guitarist Mathieu Vandekerckhove formed in 2019. They soon discovered that their individual strengths complemented each other perfectly. Two very different worlds collide and lead to minimalist dark wave deconstructions that are equal parts brutal and erotic.

This duality is reflected in the name Skemer, which next to its obvious English meaning of 'intriguer' also stands for ‘dusk’ in Mathieu’s native tongue West-Flemish. The band recorded their debut album just months after meeting and this sense of urgency shines through in their effervescent live performances, where Peers seductive vocals coalesce with Vandekerckhove's austere beats to meld into a transcendent fury.

Debut album Benevolence is released on the 25th of October 2019 on Avant! Records. In 2022 a remix of the song “Sunseeker by Dana Montana was released on He.She.They Records.

Kim Peers has a background in the high end fashion world. She’s born and raised in fashion capital, Antwerp, where she started working in the 90’s with Inge Grognard and Ronald Stoops. She soon traveled the world for several high fashion magazines, runways and campaigns, such as Vogue, Prada, YSL and many more. To this day she’s still having fun with modeling in fashion. She also has a background in music. Under her own name her EP “Tell Me More” was released on DJ Hell ’s International Gigolos Records in 2004, with remixes by Mt Sims and David Carretta. The remix of David Carretta appeared on a compilation from Dave Clarke in 2005. In 2012 she started a no wave-punk band called Crimpers they released a 7” in 2012 on Dennis Tyfus’ Ultra Eczema records. Throughout the years she also enjoyed dj’ing. Meeting the Drag Me To Hell family felt like coming home and somewhere around 2018 Mati Drome, the founder of DMTH, invited her to become a resident dj at the Drag Me To Hell raves.

Mathieu Vandekerckhove is guitarist and a founding member of the post-metal band Amenra, Absent In Body and his personal project Syndrome. Amenra was formed in 1999 in the West Flanders city of Kortrijk. The band was founded by vocalist Colin H. van Eeckhout, lead guitarist Mathieu Vandekerckhove and bassist Kristof Mondy. The three had been in the hardcore punk band Spineless that split up in 1999 and wanted to create music with more "heart and soul”. Absent In Body originally formed in 2017 originally as the mutual vision of guitarist Vandekerckhove and Neurosis frontman Kelly, who, in conspiracy with Iggor Cavalera (ex-Sepultura, Cavalera Conspiracy, Petbrick,...) and Amenra’s Colin H. van Eeckhout, conjured a sprawling, episodic blend of post-metal and sludge. Atmosphere is key here, whether it's the tribal drums against a squall of controlled noise that open "The Acres/The Ache," the mountain-cleaving riffs or the reflective, minimalist passages which offer a melodic reprieve.

lineup: GNOD feat. MC Sissi, Sophie-T
information:
Crunch Tapes & Positive Transmitter present:

Thursday, 07.11 @ Neue Zukunft Berlin 
GNOD (UK) + MC Sissi
Support: Sophie-T

Over the past decade, Gnod has evolved into one of the most unpredictable and intriguing bands in the experimental music scene. Their sonic explorations have ranged from the cosmic pastoral landscapes reminiscent of their collaborations with White Hills to their more recent ventures into post-punk on albums like "Just Say No..." and the noise rock intensity of "Hexen Valley". Despite the diverse range of sounds, each release offers something extraordinary, keeping listeners eagerly anticipating what they'll do next. Gnod continues to push boundaries, delivering fresh, thought-provoking music that challenges conventional genre definitions.


Support:
Sophie-T (DE)

Sophie-T is a multidisciplinary poet from Weimar, Germany, whose creative work blends poetry and spoken word performance with visual art and paintings. Her art often bridges the worlds of literature and visual aesthetics, where sound and language interact with imagery and textures. By combining spoken word sounds with her paintings, Sophie-T creates immersive artistic experiences that engage both the auditory and visual senses. Her work typically explores themes deeply rooted in personal expression, emotional depth, and experimental narrative, offering a unique fusion of performance and visual arts.

⫸ English

⫸⫸ ABOUT FOUR PLAY ⫸⫸
Imagine a party in which you're not just moving your feet on the dance floor. Imagine a place full of color and fantasy, in which you are welcomed to take part in the action.
In 2016, the Four Play project was born in order to breach the all-too-serious walls of those days' Berlin kinky and fetish scenes, and to allow the young and the inexperienced to experiment with many aspects of the kinky lifestyle and their own sexuality.
In the mean, Four Play has become one of Berlin’s most beautiful sex-positive and kinky parties, offering not just an uncompromising musical lineup, but also an incredibly rich program of performances and workshops, all designed for our guests to interact and become an active part of the night.

⫸⫸ WHAT TO EXPECT ⫸⫸
▻ High-end Techno journey on the Main Floor, happy modern interpretations of House music in the Dragon Floor, and Downtempo to Soft-Tech in the basement.
▻ Around 80 Performances, walking acts and Workshops.
▻ A Kinky Marketplace to upgrade your outfits.
▻ Hedonistic safe space for kinksters and LGTBQ.
▻ A large, highly dedicated Awareness Team.

⫸⫸ MUST READ ⫸⫸
▻ NO PRESALE. Tickets only at the door.
▻ The Four Play has a strict no-photo and no phone policy. We have a designated photobooth with our photographer, where photos can be taken of those who wish for it.
▻ The Four Play is a safe space for any ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation. Any sign of racism, sexism, or homophobia will not be tolerated.
▻ You are to respect the personal space of any fellow dancer. In case you feel that you have been treated wrongly, or that your space has been violated, please notify our awareness team or our staff immediately.
▻ DRESS-CODE: * Sexy Swimsuits * Costumes * Leather * Latex * Naked * Super Heroes * Lingerie * Colorful Festival Style.
NO CASUAL STREET WEAR SUCH AS JEANS IS ALLOWED.

FAQ
1. Can single or groups of hetero men join the party?
- In general, women, and queers are rarely a threat to a sexpositive concept. Men are more carefully selected, and would have to be able to prove acquaintance with the guidelines of consent.
2. Are normal bathing or boxer shorts enough?
- No, they aren’t. With swimwear we mean sexy swimwear (yes men, better show us your Speedos).
3. Is the usual Kitkat or Four Play dress code enough?
- Yes, they are, however, we kindly ask you to make an effort and adapt to the Four Play colourful character.
4. Am I allowed to masturbate in front of people or playful couples?
- No, you’re not. Solo-Wankers are not welcomed at the Four Play and without explicit consent, are considered an harassment.
5. What do I do if I or someone around me feel uncomfortable or mistreated?
- Please report that to our Awareness Team immediately. You can either find them patrolling the club in shiny vests, or at the Awareness Station at the Pool Bar.

⫸

⫸

⫸⫸ ÜBER DIE FOUR PLAY ⫸⫸
Stellt euch eine Party vor, bei der ihr nicht nur eure Füße auf der Tanzfläche bewegt. Stellt euch einen Ort voller Farbe und Fantasie vor, an dem ihr eingeladen seid, am Programm teilzunehmen.
Im Jahr 2016 wurde das Projekt Four Play ins Leben gerufen, um die allzu ernsten Mauern der damaligen Berliner Kinky- und Fetischszene zu durchbrechen und jungen und unerfahrenen Menschen die Möglichkeit zu geben, mit vielen Aspekten des kinky Lebensstils und ihrer eigenen Sexualität zu experimentieren.

▻ High-End Techno-Reise auf dem Main Floor, fröhliche moderne Interpretationen von House-Musik im Dragon Floor und Downtempo bis Soft-Tech im Keller.

▻ KEIN VORVERKAUF. Tickets nur an der Tür.
▻ Bei der Four Play gilt ein striktes Foto- und Handyverbot. Wir haben einen Photobooth mit unserem Fotografen, wo Fotos von denjenigen gemacht werden können, die es wünschen.

KEINE LEGERE STRASSENKLEIDUNG WIE JEANS IST ERLAUBT.

FAQ
1. Können einzelne oder Gruppen von Hetero-Männern an der Party teilnehmen?
- Im Allgemeinen sind Frauen und Queers selten eine Bedrohung für ein sexpositives Konzept. Männer werden strenger ausgewählt und müssen nachweisen können, dass sie mit den Leitlinien des Konsens vertraut sind.
2. Sind normale Bade- oder Boxershorts genug?
- Nein, das sind sie nicht. Mit Bademode meinen wir sexy Bademode (ja, Männer, zeigt uns lieber eure Speedos).
3. Ist der übliche Kitkat oder Four Play Dresscode ausreichend?
- Ja, aber wir bitten dich, dich zu bemühen und dich an den farbenfrohen Charakter von Four Play anzupassen.
4. Darf ich vor Leuten oder spielenden Paaren masturbieren?
- Nein, das darfst du nicht. Solo-Wichser sind im Four Play nicht willkommen und werden ohne eindeutige Zustimmung als Belästigung angesehen.
5. Was tue ich, wenn ich oder jemand in meiner Umgebung sich unwohl fühlt oder misshandelt wird?
- Bitte melde das sofort unserem Awareness-Team. Du findest sie entweder in leuchtenden Westen im Club oder an der Awareness Station an der Pool Bar.

About the event: 
Green Room is an intimate club night that gives you a slice of UK club culture in the heart of Berlin. Originally founded as a series of off-location events around the city Green Room maintains a DIY ethos at the centre of its operation. Inspired by the legendary FWD nights at Plastic People, the event is focused on spotlighting new and notable grassroots talent, in addition to a formidable roster of residents. Expect dark percussive grooves and a healthy portion of sub-bass from Fitzroy’s custom Martin Audio / Function 1 hybrid rig.

information:
The Depeche Mode Dance & Play - Party
DM, 80s, EBM, Dark Wave, Electro & Goth Rock by DJs Marvin, Toby
Midnight Bondage Performance

DM Visualizations, Jacuzzi, Playgrounds, Cocktails & Fresh Fruits

This party has been unique for more than 15 years and has become an integral part of Berlin's nightlife.

Today we celebrate the best band ever in a unique way as always. Here, in addition to related music, the legendary records of Depeche Mode will not only be played, but will be JOYED in dance and passionate play!

'Stripped', 'Freelove', 'Sea of Sin', 'A Pain that I'm used to' and 'Strangelove, etc'... all tracks that inspire more than just wild dancing. If you read the lyrics of the band carefully, you will be confronted again and again with the themes of sexuality, pain, love, sensuality and also perversions. But also other genre-like beats are not missed out.

So in this night electro sounds of the last decades meet whip cracking and sensual love play, when SM meets DM, Gothic meets Fetish and Oldschool meets Newschool.

This time this unique cocktail will be underlined by a very special fetish performance.

Musically DJ Marvin (Queen of the Night, Dark Friday) & DJ Toby (Black:Celebration) will not only make Depeche Mode fans happy, but will conjure up electro, goth rock, dark wave & 80ies on the dance floor.

This event is rounded off by video visuals of Depeche Mode and the atmospheric vaults of the INSOMNIA Club - all open from 10pm, including a whirlpool, massage bench, the gallery for couples hungry for experience and various game rooms, such as the BDSM catacombs in the basement.

An awareness team is always on the move in the club, taking care of your safety and is always approachable.

address: Lychener Strasse 60; Prenzlauer Berg; 10437 Berlin; Germany
event_name: SOFIA BORGES / ILIA GOROVITZ / PEDRO MELO ALVES
lineup: Sofia Borges – drums, Ilia Gorovitz – drums , Pedro Melo Alves – drums
information:
An evening as part of the biegungen im ausland consisting of three solo sets, which is entirely dedicated to a highly versatile instrument: the drums. 

Sofia Borges expands the possibilities of her instrument with everyday objects that you find in every hardware or household goods store: metal pieces, kitchen items, toys. The sound range that can be heard in her solo sets is as flexible as her instrument. With her free, open playing, she treats tempo as a variable, as one category among many, with no claim to dominance. Electronic sounds complement Borges’ lively percussion style.

Ilia Gorovitz has had a decisive influence on Berlin's artistic underground in just a few years. As an organizer with a sure sense of taste, Gorovitz presents exciting international acts from the fields of sonic experiments, noise and improvisation. Each program he is responsible for is an uncompromising manifesto. As a musician, Gorovitz is involved in various projects, including the minimal noise rock duo Stumpf and the bands PΞB and my blood is confusing. In his solo sets, the drummer shows his preference for complex rhythms and different degrees of distortion.

Sometimes delicate, sometimes powerful, always absolutely focused, this is how Pedro Melo Alves appears on stage. In his virtuosic live concerts, he gives the sounds enough space to unfold. Alves switches easily from contemplative soundscapes to complex, dense figures on the drums. The Portuguese musician and composer crafts amazing music from skins, rims, cymbals and objects at the highest technical level. His sets are like journeys of discovery through the sonic diversity of his instrument.


Supported by Berlin Senate Department for Culture and Social Cohesion.

lineup: Paul Elstak, Westbam, Franky Jones, HARDSEQUENSER, Housemeister, MEMBERS OF MEMBERS , TIEFUNDTON , SURPRISE ACT
information:
Let's rave like it's 1994!

Am 9. November 2024 feiern wir in der Columbiahalle Berlin das ultimative Rave-Event des Jahres: 30 Years Raving Society – ein Abend, der das Lebensgefühl der goldenen Rave-Ära wieder aufleben lässt! Anlässlich des 30. Jubiläums des legendären Mayday-Mottos laden wir euch ein, die Zeit zurückzudrehen und noch einmal zu feiern wie bei einem echten Rave aus den 90ern.

Mit einem exklusiven Line-up steht eine Nacht voller Techno-, Rave- und Hardcore-Classics bevor, die unvergesslich sein wird. Dieses Line-up wirst du in dieser Konstellation nicht wieder erleben!
 

✪✪✪ L I N E U P ✪✪✪

✪ PAUL ELSTAK
✪ WESTBAM
✪ FRANKY JONES
✪ HARDSEQUENSER
✪ HOUSEMEISTER
✪ MEMBERS OF MEMBERS 
✪ TIEFUNDTON 
✪ SURPRISE ACT

✪ VISUALS BY: E (E-GRUPPE)

Erlebt die unverwechselbare Atmosphäre eines klassischen Raves. Wir lassen das Gefühl von damals auferstehen und schaffen für eine Nacht eine unvergessliche Zeitreise in die Ära, die uns alle geprägt hat.


✦✦✦ S P E C I A L S ✦✦✦

✦ riesige Lasershow
✦ gewaltige Videowände
✦ dichter Nebel & pulsierende Stroboskope 
✦ unvergessliches Lineup 
✦ imposante Eventhalle 


✦✦✦ I N F O S ✦✦✦

✦ Start 20.00 Uhr
✦ Columbiahalle Berlin
✦ Columbiadamm 13-21, 10965 Berlin


✦✦✦ T I C K E T S ✦✦✦

✦ Phase 1 ► 29,99 € (stark limitiert)
✦ Phase 2 ► 34,99 € 

✦ VIP Ticket ► 69.99 € 
► exklusiver Zugang zur Bühne
► exklusiver Zugang Zum Oberrang
► extra VIP-Eingang
► eigene VIP-Bar + Lounge
► eigener Tanzbereich auf der Bühne

Für alle, die die Rave-Kultur lieben, ist dies ein absolutes Muss. Wenn du den Spirit der 90er noch einmal fühlen und die unvergessliche Energie eines echten Raves spüren willst, dann sei dabei und mach diese Nacht zu einem Teil deiner Geschichte.

information:
Berlin, wir sind zurück! 
Tausendnamen goes Lokschuppen 2.0 & WE’RE HERE FOR IT!
Tragt euch das Datum in den Kalender ein, denn am 9.11. wird gemeinsam mit all unseren Friends in Berlin wieder die Hütte abgerissen! 
Freut euch neben unseren Tausendnamen OG’s auf ein paar unnormal krasse Acts, die ihr so noch nicht gesehen habt. Trance, Groove, Bounce, House und Harder Styles. Bei Tausendnamen & Friends ist für alle was dabei, hier geht keiner mit schlechter Laune nach Hause. 
Außerdem könnt ihr vor Ort unseren eigenen Merch erwerben, juhu!

Dresscode gibt’s bei uns nicht - come as you are, jede:r ist willkommen und wir haben einfach extrem Bock, mit euch zu feiern. 

Hinweis: Unsere Veranstaltungen sind ein SAFE SPACE. Feiert ausgelassen und wild, aber achtet darauf, auch anderen noch Raum zu lassen und ihre Grenzen zu respektieren! Frage nach, ob dein Gegenüber mit dir sprechen oder interagieren möchte.
Wenn du dich belästigt oder unwohl fühlst, melde dich bei uns. Wenn du siehst, dass eine andere Person Hilfe braucht: frage bei der betroffenen Person nach oder gib uns Bescheid. Wir dulden keinen Antisemitismus, Rassismus, Sexismus oder jede andere Form von Diskriminierung oder übergriffigem Verhalten. BE EXCELLENT TO EACH OTHER.

information:
Der Festsaal Kreuzberg wird am 09.11. & 10.11.2024 zum Tempel of Boom Bap. Kreuzberg hat wieder einen realen Hip Hop Club.


Die Block Party Berlin besetzt am Flutgraben gleich alle Areas und bringt Dir die ultimative Hip Hop Mische. Am Samstag erlebst Du die Elite der Deutschrap Liga – Haze trifft auf Morlockk Dilemma – für uns ein absolutes Dreamteam und schon lange überfällig auf einer Bühne. Aus Frankfurt präsentieren wir Alyssa, mit Attitude und Skillz überraschte Sie uns am Anfang des Jahres und so mussten wir sie einfach verpflichten. Denn neben Presslufthanna muss man sich schon behaupten können- Hanna hat uns einfach so sehr im letzten Jahr begeistert, wir mussten sie einfach wieder nach Berlin holen.


Neu auf unserer Block Party sind die Newcomer Slots: wir bieten die legendäre Bühne des Festsaal Kreuzberg für die nächste Generation: Tanone und Lucky Luke & Naixn haben uns der letzten Zeit so überzeugt, dass wir Euch die jungen Wilden gerne vorstellen wollen.Der Sonntag ist reserviert für die internationalen Acts – eigentlich dachten wir es wird sehr schwierig die letzten Jahre zu toppen. Aber nach unzäligen Anrufen und Mails haben wir tatsächlich unser Wunschlineup zusammenstellen können: Für die erste Berlin Show ever werden wir die legendären Living Legends Crew einfliegen lassen: The Grouch, Aesop, Bicasso Eligh, Luckyiam, Scarub und Sunspot Jonz spielen für uns ein exklusives Deutschland Konzert.

Legendär wird wohl nicht mehr ausreichen, um dieses Konzert zu beschreiben.Denn zudem bieten wir für Euch die Hip Hop Live Band der Stunde on Top: OMA aus England dominiert zur Zeit dieses Internet und feiern auf der ganzen Welt Erfolge. Den Abend einleiten werden aber auch keine Unbekannten. Auf der Insel einer der Hip Hop / Soul Publikumslieblinge. Ihre Shows stets ausverkauft haben wir hier eigentlich nur Main Acts am Fließband für Dich.

lineup: Eiko Ishibashi
information:
Multi-instrumentalist and composer Eiko Ishibashi and celebrated filmmaker Ryūsuke Hamaguchi have teamed up once again on new film performance Gift, following their successful collaboration on the Oscar-winning international feature film Drive My Car. 

Gift is both a live performance and film created in parallel to Hamaguchi’s recent feature film Evil Does Not Exist – with both works using the same footage and scenario, yet applying a different approach. While Evil Does Not Exist was created as a classic feature film for cinematic release and won the Silver Lion at last year’s Venice International Film Festival, the companion piece Gift was crafted as a separate silent film meant for live soundtrack performance by Ishibashi. 

Written and directed by Ryūsuke Hamaguchi, Gift is set in Mizubiki Village in Nagano, a town located on a plateau rich in nature not so far from Tokyo. Takumi and his daughter Hana, who have lived there for generations, lead a modest life, following the cycle of nature. Their small community is increasingly challenged by a steady flow of new arrivals. One day, a plan is hatched by an entertainment agency to build a glamping site near Takumi’s house. The discovery that they intend to discharge sewage into the village water source causes unrest in the village, disrupting the community’s calm way of life. 

A counterpart to Evil Does Not Exist, Gift offers an alternative perspective on disharmony and inevitable imbalances in man’s relationship to nature by using the same material and story, but creating a distinct, emotionally charged experience enhanced through Ishibashi’s live performance.

lineup: Magdalena Bay
information: Irgendwo im Äther unserer kollektiven sozialen Kosmos-Suppe schwebt die magische, meisterhafte Popmusik von Magdalena Bay, dem Duo aus Los Angeles, bestehend aus Mica Tenenbaum und Matthew Lewin. Auch wenn die beiden Kalifornien als ihr Terrain bezeichnen, ist ihr wahres Zuhause in den Wolken, von wo aus die beiden die einzigartigen und doch vertrauten Frequenzen von synthetischer Nostalgie, kitschiger Eingängigkeit und bombastisch verzerrten Neo-Hooks ausstrahlen, für die die Gruppe gefeiert wird. Magdalena Bay sendet sowohl in der Audio- als auch in der Videowelt und ist ein Wesen, das geschickt in diese Zeit passt, gefangen in einem Dunst des Bekannten und Gefühlten, während es Klanglandschaften, die mit dem Jetzt verwoben sind, in das Nächste schiebt.

Dress code: Gold - Glitter - Extravagant - Kinky - Fetish
Admission: €25 per person / students & social ticket* €15


Champagne & Naughtyness
Whether it's the 1920s or the 2020s, we lived and still live in turbulent times. INSOMNIA is a melting pot of dreams and hopes between crises, wars and conflicts.

We dance through the night on the volcano of desire, shrill, fast, radical, excessive, exalted and wicked. We transform heaviness into lightness, break the corsets of convention and immerse ourselves in a world of sparkling encounters and mischief.

Be brave. Be wild. Be irresistible.

Dress code:
Nothing normal. Don't dress up - reinvent yourself! It's time to unleash your true essence. Be sexy, extravagant, kinky - be a feast for the senses.

Create looks that whisper, scream and seduce. Let leather meet lace, shine meet darkness, fetish meet baroque and create an outfit that says more about you than words ever could.

Rules? Only those that honor freedom and respect. Always ask, dance wildly, play beautifully.

Respect and active consent come first. Ask politely if you want to talk, dance or play with someone, respect a 'no' the first time and thank them for it. Remember that a public game is not an automatic invitation to join in. Our awareness team, recognizable by the glowing crowns, will be out and about for you all night.

No "free-range" photographer! We have a permanent photo station in the clinic corner from 10pm to 1am for those who want to take photos.

On this night, you are the masterpieces, the sculptures that glow in the dark. Under the flickering light of the lasers and the rich sound of techno, each of you is a living work of art, unique and desirable.

Birds of paradise, the curious and greedy for the new, eccentric nightshade plants populate the bizarre amusement as phantasmagorias - "Schampus & Schabernack" offers space for everyone who wants to dance in the shadows and shine in the spotlight.


*Social or student ticket please with appropriate proof (student ID, social ticket BVG etc.) at the box office

promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: L I N (listen/D) *live*
information:
5 in 1. Drums, Synthesizer, Gitarre, Bass und Vocals.
LIN ist mehr als eine Solokünstler*in, LIN ist eine Soloband. Aus Fußschaltern, Kabeln, Loop-Station und ihren Instrumenten hat die Berlinerin ein Cockpit für Konzerte gebaut, mit dem sie einen beeindruckenden Sound kreiert. Genretechnisch irgendwo zwischen Elektro- und Popsphäre, vielschichtig, detailreich und intensiv. Die englischsprachigen Songs sind nicht nur tanzbar, sondern auch ausdrücklich politisch. In ihren Texten inszeniert die queere Künstler*in eine Welt, in der gesellschaftlich gemachte Normen aufgebrochen und neu gesetzt werden. "We need new norms" fordert LIN. Bei ihren Liveshows reißt sie das Publikum förmlich mit, wie der Impuls einer Kugelwelle, bei der sich die Energie in immer größeren Kreisen ausbreitet.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

Photo: CAPADOL

__________________________________________


Five in One. Drums, synthesizer, guitar, bass and vocals.
LIN is more than a solo artist, LIN is a solo band. From footswitches, cables, loop station and instruments she has built a cockpit for concerts, with which she creates a sound that navigates genre-wise between electro and pop spheres. Multi-layered, rich in detail and intense. The English-language songs are not only danceable, but also explicitly political. In her lyrics, the queer artist* stages a world in which socially made norms are broken and set anew. “We need new norms” demands LIN. At her live shows, she literally sweeps the audience along, like the momentum of a spherical wave in which the energy spreads in ever larger circles.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

lineup: Mabe Fratti & Military Genius
information:
silent green presents:

Mabe Fratti’s sensibility is the triumph of experimentation over technical dominion of an instrument. The experimentation of sound with feelings, with existence itself, with an open heart, letting herself to be transformed by what she lives and hears. This is what has led Mabe Fratti from Guatemala to Mexico City. From the creation of pop songs to free improvisation, from the academy to noise, from collaborations in ensembles and duos to the profound personal journey that is reflected in her solo works.
Military Genius (songwriter/producer Bryce Cloghesy) announced his new album, Scarred For Life, set to release on November 1st, 2024 via Unheard of Hope. Following his 2020 debut Deep Web, this album blends bass-heavy R&B, spaced dub, and jazz with a more traditional rock influence, focusing on lyricism. The lead single Darkest Hour, accompanied by a self-directed video shot near his new home in Joshua Tree, California, captures the feeling of being swept into the unknown. Cloghesy reflects on leaving the past behind and embracing the journey into an uncertain future.

lineup: Nadine Shah
information:
Since her debut album with the terrific title "Love Your Dum And Mad" in 2013, she has now published five strong albums. The most recent was the powerful, emotional, abysmal "Filthy Underneath" in February, which shows her lyrically and musically on top of her game. She even deals with topics such as her own experiences of sexual abuse, depression and suicidal thoughts in songs that should appeal to anyone who loves PJ Harvey, Nick Cave, Marianne Faithfull and Chelsea Wolfe. Shah, who has Norwegian and Pakistani roots and was raised in England, says: "I feel far less restricted than ever before when writing lyrics and making music. There's something extremely liberating about people knowing your most intimate story. I will never be able to be a secretive artist. It's too late for that. But maybe some of my story will speak to the listener."

The fact that she adds a "maybe" here can be read as a British understatement, because you can see just how much she does this at her intense concerts - and there will be a few of them in November. She will be performing live in four German cities from November 8th.
