lineup: Open Decks for Vinyl DJs
information:
VINYL ONLY! 

Jeden Dienstag ab 18:00 Uhr. Seit inzwischen mehr als 10 Jahren ist der Dienstag mit "Open Decks & Tischtennis" im Humboldthain Club eine feste Instanz für Nordberliner Bewegungsjunkies. 

Ob die Platten zum Auflegen, die Kellen fürs Tischtennis oder die Ballerinas für den Floor – jeden Dienstag könnt ihr euer Spielzeug mitbringen und vom Wochenende entschlacken. 
Ob Techno, Drum and Bass, Disco oder Mamas Schlagersammlung – jeder Stil ist willkommen und wird vom Publikum abgefeiert. 

Daher bietet der "Open Decks Abend" vielen jungen DJs eine nach wie vor einzigartige Plattform zur Darbietung ihrer Künste und zum Austausch untereinander. 

Zwei Tischtennisplatten, genug Kellen für alle, ein Kickertisch, satter Sound aus den Boxen und nicht zuletzt leckeres Bier vom Fass, tragen dazu bei, dass eine stetig wachsende Zahl an gut gelaunten Menschen den Dienstag im Humboldthain Club zu ihrer Homebase erklärt hat. 

FAQ Frage: Wie läuft das mit dem Auflegen? 
Antwort: Zu Beginn jeder Veranstaltung liegt an der Mainbar eine Liste mit den DJ-Slots für den Abend aus. 

Jeder Slot geht eine halbe Stunde und jeder DJ darf nur einen (seinen) Namen in die Liste eintragen. 
Pro Abend gibt es 20 Slots! 
Es empfiehlt sich also, nicht all zu spät zu kommen, sonst ist die Liste voll.

lineup: The Telescopes, angelic milk
information:
The Telescopes are an English noise, space rock, dream pop and psychedelic band formed in 1987 by artist, composer, and musician Stephen Lawrie, with band members David Fitzgerald and Joanna Doran joining later. The band's line-up is in constant flux; there can be anywhere between 1 and 20 members on a recording.

The Telescopes have influenced the shoegaze, space rock and neo-psychedelic movement including artists such as The Brian Jonestown Massacre, Black Rebel Motorcycle Club, Füxa, The Warlocks, Revolver, Whipping Boy, Vanishing Lines, Seefeel, Ecstasy of Saint Theresa, Frances Bean Cobain, Portishead, Mogwai and Radiohead.

In recognition of their ongoing influence on a new generation of artists, a tribute compilation titled Anticipating Nowhere, A Homage To The Telescopes was released in 2016 by The Blog That Celebrates Itself Records. The album featured 17 Telescopes tracks covered by various artists from the Flavor Crystals, Jaguwar and One Unique Signal.

The Telescopes have been described by the British music press as "more a revolution of the psyche than a revolution of the sidewalk"; a thread consistent throughout a body of work spanning over 30 years.

The band has released 16 studio albums across various music labels including but not limited to Creation Records and Tapete Records with their most recent album Growing Eyes Become String out now on Fuzz Club Records. A new album is currently being recorded for Tapete.

As a live band, they are considered to be unique even in their niche, with positive reviews from publications such as Isolation (UK), "The Telescopes are such an important band. Such an important concept. They walk where other bands fear to tread and refuse to compromise their art. This is what makes them so vital on record and unmissable on stage."


Supporting act:

angelic milk (DE)

Berlin-based band that has captivated audiences worldwide with their unique blend of dreamy bedroom pop and raw garage rock. Formed in St. Petersburg in 2014, the band quickly gained a devoted following, earning praise for their catchy tunes and evocative performances. Fronted by the charming anti-heroine Sarah Persephona, their music is characterized by electrifying melodies and nostalgic sound. The lyrics are telling tales of fatal romance, psychedelic experiences and old school rock’n’roll lifestyle, and the band’s live shows are a notoriously loud and chaotic spectacle with a twist of wild sex appeal.


Doors: 20:00
Show: 20:30

lineup: Demdike Stare (live), support by Gizem Öz
information:
Miles Whittaker and Sean Canty have been releasing music as Demdike Stare for a decade and a half, deftly refining their own strand of electronic music lying at the intersection of techno, dub, ambient, jungle and many others genres. 

Originally hailing from Manchester, the duo have taken their dark and drum-inflected sound to the furthest reaches of the electronic music scene, often transcending club culture and branching into experimental concerts and festivals.

For our next session of 180 min w/  we are super excited to welcome the pair to our historic Saal for a night of unbridled atmospheric experimentation as they perform a rare 3-hour live set accompanied by a spellbinding light show from Mike Erwin. If you’ve been following the series (which has already seen the likes of Rrose, .VRIL and Rødhäd) you know to expect the unexpected.

Supporting Demdike Stare on the night will be the supremely talented Gizem Öz. Renowned for her roles as a sound artist, contemporary artist, DJ and producer, her ambient sets create cohesive sonic narratives that continue to resonate long after the music ends.

information:
EVERY FUCKING THURSDAY, UNITY AT KITKAT CLUB

UNITY is a vibrant kinky community of free spirits who seek to connect with their souls and bodies in a respectful, sexy, and playful manner. We have created a space where you can bring your fantasies to life and anticipate high-quality lineups, ranging from uptempo trance/neotrance to berlin uptempo techno, providing a diverse musical experience for all. Rules

- no strict dresscode, but: „dress for kitkat club“ – be creative!
- by purchasing a ticket, you consent to our team taking photos at the event for promotional purposes. If you prefer not to be photographed, please inform our photographer.

- if you feel uncomfortable, don't hesitate to contact our awareness team or any staff member on duty (bouncer, bar staff, etc.). We will assist you promptly!
- a no-photo policy is in place for all guests. If you want a photo get in touch with our photographer. He or she will capture images for our social media channels.

lineup: Trentemøller
information:
Those who have seen Copenhagen based Anders Trentemøller live know about his fascinating ability to draw the audience completely into his world of sound which is misty, mysteriously grooving and empathetic. Danceable melancholy, you could say. Stylistically, Trentemøller interweaves electro with shoegaze, synth and dreampop, sometimes instrumental, sometimes with hand-picked guest singers. His most recent album, "Memoria", was released in 2022 and features new wave influences in songs such as "Dead Or Alive" and "No More Kissing In The Rain". This time around, more than half of the tracks on the record are purely instrumental. In an interview, Trentemøller said: "I'm still a big fan of instrumental music. It's such a beautiful way of expressing feelings. Straight to the heart without restrictions. And my music has that
cinematic approach that instrumental music also has."

His live concerts are particularly inspiring because Trentemøller not only relies on atmospheric lighting and visuals, but performs together with a band that will bring the nuances of his music with precision to the stage. On his new tour, which will also take him to Munich, Berlin and Cologne starting in mid-November, he will be joined by Disa Jakobs (vocals, guitar, synths), Silas Tinglef (drums, guitar), Brian Batz (guitar), Jacob Haubjerg (bass) and, of course, the mastermind behind it all: Anders Trentemøller on synths.

MILK & HONEY, the legendary club of social eroticism that has been a sensation in Prague for the last 15 years, is returning to Berlin for its second grand event after a successful debut that connected the Prague and Berlin scenes.

Brace yourselves for an unforgettable event connecting Prague and Berlin as a sizeable group of Czech guests, composed of charming and playful couples, converges on Berlin for this extraordinary occasion. The Prague scene is known for a "lot of action," not only in the playground but usually directly on the dancefloor. Therefore, expect a lot of happening directly in front of the DJ!
Milk & Honey events are also known for the solid sound produced by their talented female residents, who also come to Berlin.

This collective has been curating unique erotic experiences for couples and their refined companions since 2009. Don't miss the chance to be part of the excitement as Milk & Honey brings its allure to the vibrant heart of Berlin for the very first time!

Stay tuned for exclusive details on Telegram and be among the first to secure your spot during the presale!

promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: WNBL (Agogo Rec./D) *live*, Kota No Uta (D) *live*, DJ ALKARLINE (D)
information:
WNBL ist ein Kollektiv junger Musikschaffender aus Berlin und Potsdam, die Einflüsse aus elektronischer Musik, Jazz und Hiphop zu einer eigenen Mischung verbinden. Mit WNBL invites haben sie seit Beginn des Jahres eine Residency im Gretchen. Dabei gehört es zu ihrer sich ständig weiterentwickelnden Herangehensweise an Musik, dass sie regelmäßig Künstler*innen einladen, um musikalische Erfahrungsräume zu gestalten.

Kota No Uta ist eine in Berlin lebende Künstlerin, Produzentin und Singer-Songwriterin. Ihr Sound ist im Neo-Soul und psychedelischen Soul verwurzelt und reicht von afrikanischer Musik bis hin zu experimentellen und elektronischen Klängen. Als multikulturelle Geschichtenerzählerin schreibt Kota ihre Texte durch das Prisma von Metaphern und Mythologie, oft inspiriert durch tägliche Beobachtungen ihrer Umgebung. Ihr Markenzeichen ist die kraftvolle, dunkel gefärbte Stimme, die sie in ihren selbst produzierten Songs gerne mehrfach aufnimmt und übereinanderlegt. Kota No Uta setzt bewusst auf Kontraste und kreiert dadurch immer wieder überraschende Momente.

Im Jahr 2023 gewann Kota einen Female* Producer Prize von Sony Music Entertainment Germany und Music Woman.

WNBL selbst kommen wieder mit einer druckvollen Bläsersektion und einer Rhythmusgruppe, die aus zwei Schlagzeugern besteht. Alle Beteiligten sind musikalisch in der Berliner Clubkultur sozialisiert, alle hören Dub, Bass Music und Broken Beats. Möglicherweise ist das der Grund, warum sie ihre Jazz-Skills niemals raushängen lassen. Stattdessen nehmen sie den Jazz beim Wort und spielen beeindruckende Live-Sets mit cleveren Beats, Improvisationen und wunderbaren Arrangements.

DJ Alkarline, deren Name inspiriert ist von der Alakali-Mangan-Zelle, umgangssprachlich auch Alkaline oder Alkali-Mangan-Batterie bezeichnet, sorgt dafür, dass die Energiespeicher den ganzen Abend mit groovy Electronica aufgeladen bleiben.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

_________________________________


WNBL is a collective of nine young musicians based in Berlin and Potsdam, who bring an unique blend of influences from electronic music, jazz and hiphop with a matchless energy onto the stage. With “WNBL invites”, they have a residency at Gretchen. As part of their constantly evolving approach to music, they invite artists to create spaces for musical experiences.

Kota No Uta is a Berlin based artist, producer and singer-songwriter. Her experimental sound is rooted in neo-soul, psychedelic soul. A multicultural story teller, by nature, Kota writes her lyrics through the prism of metaphor and mythology, often inspired by daily observations of surroundings. In 2023 Kota won a Female* Producer Prize by Sony Music Entertainment Germany and Music Woman, meanwhile releasing collaborative singles with various producers.

WNBL themselves come with a powerful brass section and a rhythm section consisting of two drummers. All those involved are musically socialised in Berlin's club culture, they all listen to dub, bass music and broken beats. they take jazz at its word and play impressive live sets with ecstatic beats, exciting improvisation and wonderful arrangements.

DJ Alkarline, whose name is inspired by the alakali-manganese cell, also known colloquially as an alkaline or alkali-manganese battery, ensures that the energy stores remain charged throughout the evening with groovy electronica.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

lineup: Liliane Chlela + White Boy Scream
information:
silent green presents: 

Producer, DJ and performer Liliane Chlela is widely known in electronic and experimental scenes for her unique and audacious approach to sound, stirring audiences into pushing the limits of their auditory experiences ever further. Through her signature techniques, she explores the relationships between improvisation and the manipulation of sounds from wide-ranging musical genres. As White Boy Scream composer and sound artist Micaela Tobin integrates voice with electronics, oscillating between extreme textures of noise, drone, and opera. Her music includes elements of sonic ritual, ancient myth, and ancestral memory.

lineup: Le_haekien & Veith von Tsotzhousn
information:
German below. 

In their live performance, the sculptor Le_haekien and the sound artist Veith von Tsotzhousn work with the same sound material. This unfolds in space and makes movement visible. A fusion of sound and the medium of wood emerges—a relationship that absorbs, amplifies, and simultaneously alters different qualities of time to release them into the space. In this sonic and sculptural work, a dialogue arises, manifesting in a walkable sound space. The two artists invite the audience to linger in the multi-hour performance, observing the evolving space and immersing themselves in the ever-changing sound.

In ihrer Live Performance arbeiten der Bildhauer Le_haekien und der Soundkünstler Veith von Tsotzhousn mit demselben Klangmaterial. Dieses entfaltet sich im Raum und macht Bewegung sichtbar. Eine Fusion aus Klang und dem Medium Holz entsteht. Eine Beziehung, die verschiedene Zeitqualitäten aufnimmt, verstärkt und zugleich verändert, um diese in den Raum zu entlassen. In dieser klanglichen und skulpturalen Arbeit entsteht ein Dialog, der sich in einem begehbaren Klangraum manifestiert. Die beiden Künstler laden dazu ein, in der mehrstündigen Performance zu verweilen, die Entwicklung im Raum zu beobachten und sich dem sich stetig verändernden Klang hinzugeben.

lineup: Waikiki, Tom Teschner
information:
Sexpositive 30+ - Party with sounds from all decades, all-time classics & mash-ups
DJ Waikiki & Tom Teschner
Specials: Whirlpool, Couples Area, Awareness Team
Dress to impress! From elegant to extravagant!
Admission: Per person 25€ / Social Ticket* 15€
Guests under the age of 30 are also welcome!

Come and immerse yourself in a world full of nostalgia and sensual energy! The "Naughty Nostalgia" party at INSOMNIA Club invites you to an unforgettable night full of memories, passion and adventure.

Our DJs bring the most danceable classics of past decades back to the dance floor and give many a hit a new remix look with electronic beats that will get you dancing.
Adventurous couples, sophisticated singles, curious newcomers - this party is for everyone who wants to go on a voyage of discovery in a hedonistic parallel universe. Whether partying, dancing, flirting, shagging - everyone will find their corners and suitable opportunities & people here.

Our club offers a special couples' gallery where you can retreat with your partner and enjoy the intimate atmosphere. For those who want to explore even more, there are various playgrounds available to bring your fantasies to life.

The INSOMNIA Club Awareness Team is always present to ensure that all guests treat each other with respect and feel comfortable. We place great importance on a safe and sex-positive environment where you can express yourself freely.

So grab your wildest outfits, get carried away by retro beats and mash ups and experience a night full of sensual adventures and let yourself be enchanted by the unique atmosphere!

Rules of the evening:
Our awareness team will be out and about in the club and always available for you.
- No means no.
- Do you want to talk, dance or play with someone? Ask politely if you are interested and respect the answer.
- Give others their space when playing or being intimate with each other. Do you want to join in? Ask politely and respect their answer.
- Cell phones are not allowed! Leave them in the checkroom.
- Crossing boundaries will not be tolerated, ask once, a no is a no.
- Sexual or verbal harassment will not be tolerated under any circumstances.

*Please present your social ticket with appropriate proof (social ticket BVG etc.) at the box office.

lineup: Stella Rose, Quarters of Change
information:
silent green presents: 

Stella Rose introduced her debut album Eyes of Glass in 2023 on the heels of two well-received singles, Muddled Man and Angel (GR), establishing her as a poetic force and powerful singer. “Passionate and dissolute, Muddled Man recalls Nick Cave at his Biblical best” (Clash). Its opposing reflection, Angel with “warm, folksy croon swells into a room-filling climax” (Paper Magazine). Eyes of Glass, recorded in Los Angeles and produced by Yves Rothman, combines the poetic soul of Stella Rose’s lyrics with the serpentine sound she and Rothman have developed – feeling like a piece in conversation with its artistic predecessors.


Quarters of Change
Anchored by a mutual predisposition for unpredictability, Quarters of Change fuse together a signature hybrid of nineties-style alternative hooks, crunchy space rock soundscapes, and strutting seventies grooves. The New York City quartet of Ben Acker (guitar, bass, synthesiser), Attila Anrather (drums), Jasper Harris (guitar, bass, synthesiser) and Ben Roter (vocals, guitar) crafts a rich exhibition of emotion on their aptly titled 2023 second full-length offering, Portraits (300 Entertainment).


Saturday, November 16
Doors 7 pm / Start 8 pm

event_name: This is Techno Jazz: Aki Himanen & Aleksi Kinnunen (Live Concert), Gianluca Petrella (Dj Set)
lineup: Aki Himanen & Aleksi Kinnunen, Gianluca Petrella (DJ Set)
information:
Come dance with us in our show on Sunday, November 17 at Kantine Am Berghain, where we will have the pleasure of hosting a live concert by Finnish duo Aki Himanen and Aleksi Kinnunen and Italian Jazz legend Gianluca Petrella, this time behind the turntables.

Aki Himanen & Aleksi Kinnunen - Live (Trumpet, Electronica, Drums, Fx):

Trumpeter Aki Himanen and drummer Aleksi Kinnunen form an explosive duo that fuses Scandinavian jazz with the pulsating rhythms of techno music. They are constantly searching for new ways in which man and machine can create a real dialogue. Improvisation, spontaneity and musical communication are at the heart of their work.
The music is dark, intense and a poetic mix full of hypnotic mental images. It is reminiscent of Scandinavian landscapes where nature and technology gently merge. A suspenseful night drive somewhere between futuristic mountains where dawn is setting and darkness fades away in a slow and wonderful way.

Gianluca Petrella (DJ Set):

Gianluca Petrella is a jazz trombonist who has collaborated with internationally renowned musicians such as Enrico Rava, Carla Bley, and Steve Coleman. His career has included performances at major festivals and collaborations with prominent jazz figures.

Petrella is also very active in the field of electronic music. He has worked with artists like Ricardo Villalobos and Max Loderbauer on the Re: ECM project and with Moritz von Oswald. He has collaborated with electronic groups such as "9lazy9" and "Matmos" and has explored new musical territories with DJs Nicola Conte and Ralf.

For this very special performance, Gianluca will debut at Kantine Am Berghain selecting his vinyl collection of black music and deep house.

__________


Jazz-O-Tech is a label that draws on the rich heritage of two of music's most visionary and experimental genres: jazz and techno. Inspired by the creative and free-form nature of these two musical worlds, the label's artists mix tradition with modernity, improvisation with experimentation, and create a new sound known as techno-jazz.

promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: Svaneborg Kardyb (Gondwana Records/DK) *live*
information:
Svaneborg Kardyb sind Nikolaj Svaneborg – Wurlitzer, Juno, Klavier und Jonas Kardyb – Schlagzeug, Perkussion. Mit Einflüssen aus der dänischen Volksmusik und skandinavischem Jazz, darunter Nils Frahm, Esbjörn Svennson und Jan Johanssons Aufnahme “Jazz På Svenska“, ist ihre Musik eine exquisite und fröhliche Verschmelzung von schönen Melodien, zartem Minimalismus, eingängigen Grooves, subtilen elektronischen Vibes, nordischen Atmosphären und organischem Zusammenspiel –  alles getragen von der reinen Freude am gemeinsamen Spiel.

Ihre Musik ist auf den ersten Blick einfach gehalten, entwickelt und entfaltet sich aber beim Hören, mit viel Raum für Erkundung, Reflexion und Improvisation. Ihr Ziel ist es, Musik zu schaffen, die so ehrlich und intim wie möglich ist, “mit Melodien und Rhythmen, die so stark sind, dass wir nur noch die Überbringer sind”, wie sie sagen. Und ihre ausgezeichnete musikalische Chemie erlaubt es ihnen, sich wenig Gedanken über musikalische Einflüsse zu machen. Das verleiht ihrer Musik einen fesselnden Charme.

Svaneborg Kardyb stammen aus Aalborg in Jütland, im Norden Dänemarks, wo sie sich 2013 begegneten. Sechs Jahre später fingen sie an gemeinsam Musik zu machen. Wie ihre neuen Labelkollegen Vega Trails sind Svaneborg Kardyb ein Duo, ein Format, das ihnen viel Raum gibt, den sie besetzen – oder auch leer lassen können.

Svaneborg Kardyb haben bei den Danish Music Awards Jazz 2019 gleich zwei Preise gewonnen: New Artist of the Year und Composer of the Year. Bisher haben sie drei Studioalben veröffentlicht: Knob (2019), Haven (2020) und Over Tage (2022) sowie die Veröffentlichung der At Home (An NPR Tiny Desk Session) EP (2023). Die Tiny Desk Session schaffte den internationalen Durchbruch und seitdem ist die Band in 13 verschiedenen Ländern ausgiebig getourt. Glücklicherweise haben sie die Zeit gefunden, ihr viertes Album aufzunehmen, das im Herbst 2024 auf Gondwana Records erscheinen wird.

event_name: TAYLOR EIGSTI feat. Gretchen Parlato, Casey Abrams & Ben Wendel *live
promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: Taylor Eigsti feat. Gretchen Parlato, Casey Abrams & Ben Wendel (US) *live*, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Taylor Eigsti ist ein amerikanischer Pianist und Komponist. Als Komponist integriert er eine Vielzahl von Stilen und Einflüssen, seine Kompositionen reichen von einfühlsamen Balladen bis zu energetischen Fusion-Stücken, die alle ein tiefes Verständnis der Jazztradition zeigen. Sein Klavierspiel zeichnet sich durch eine beeindruckende Mischung aus technischer Brillanz, melodischer Sensibilität und kreativer Spontaneität aus. Taylor Eigsti ist in der Lage, musikalische Geschichten in Echtzeit zu erzählen und dabei innovative melodische und harmonische Wendungen zu entwickeln.

Anfang des Jahres erschien sein neuestes Album “Plot Armor“, ein abwechslungsreiches und reich instrumentiertes Album voller stilistischer Wendungen, aufgenommen mit absoluten Stars des amerikanischen Jazz, darunter der Saxophonist Ben Wendel und der Ausnahmegitarrist Julian Lage, die beide schon bei uns im Gretchen aufgetreten sind. Für seine Europatournee hat Taylor Eigsti ebenfalls ein Starensemble zusammengestellt, darunter die Sängerin Gretchen Parlato, sowie Casey Abrams und Ben Wendel, der auf diesem Weg auch wieder zu uns kommt. Klingt wie gemacht für unser Gretchen.

Taylor Eigstis Biografie liest sich wie die Geschichte eines Wunderkindes: Mit vier Jahren begann er Klavier zu spielen, mit acht Jahren hatte er seinen ersten öffentlichen Auftritt im Vorprogramm von David Benoit, mit vierzehn veröffentlichte er sein erstes Album. Seitdem feiert er Erfolge als Solokünstler und als Begleiter großer Pop- und Jazzkünstler*innen, von John Mayer und Sting bis zu Dave Brubeck, Esperanza Spalding und Joshua Redman. “Plot Armor“ erschien auf GroundUp Records, dem Label von Snarky Puppy-Frontmann Michael League. 

Photo: Elizaveta von Stuben

event_name: Oddkins (Felicity Mangan & Merche Blasco) + Luisa Pereira
lineup: Oddkins (Felicity Mangan & Merche Blasco) , Luisa Pereira
information:
silent green presents: 

Oddkins introduces a debut collaboration between Felicity Mangan and Merche Blasco alongside Luisa Pereira's customized Machine Learning powered tool. Through an electroacoustic performance with custom-made instruments, Mangan and Blasco will combine live processing of field recordings with biophonic hybrids generated through the aid of Pereira’s musical software, transporting the audience into imagined sonic realms inhabited by fruitful couplings among animals, plants, and technologies, inviting contemplation on the possibilities of symbiotic relationships in the face of environmental challenges.

lineup: La Yegros (AR) *live*
information:
La Yegros: Die Königin des Nu-Cumbia ist mit neuem Album zurück.

Die argentinische Sängerin La Yegros kommt aus Buenos Aires, dort klingen die Nächte nach Dancehall und elektronischen Bässen, ihre Eltern jedoch stammen aus Misiones, einer Provinz an der Grenze zu Brasilien und Paraguay, wo die Bälle mit den Klängen von Chamamé, Carnavalito und kolumbianischem Cumbia gefüllt sind. Diese Einflüsse sind von ihr auf mittlerweile drei Alben verschmolzen und zu einer speziellen Version von Nu-Cumbia entwickelt worden.

Jetzt ist es Zeit es für ein neues Repertoire. Ihr neues und inzwischen viertes Album “Haz“ hat La Yegros mit dem Team aufgenommen, das bereits für ihr erstes Album “Viene de Mí“ verantwortlich war: Produzent King Coya, ein Pionier der synthetischen Experimente in der traditionellen Musik und der Komponist Daniel Martín, der es versteht, Melodien zum Träumen und Hymnen zum Mitsingen zu erfinden.

Für La Yegros geht es nicht darum, immer das gleiche zu machen und vorgefundene Klänge zu reproduzieren. Sie erfindet ihre eigene Folklore, indem sie neue Rhythmen zusammenstellt und mit Fagott, Querflöte und Flamenco-Gitarre originelle Klänge integriert, während die urbanen Elemente die Tanzflächen mit Anklängen an Reggae und Funk auf den Kopf stellen. Dabei entwirft sie ihre Alben immer mit Blick auf die Live-Präsentation. Uns erwartet eine fantastische Mischung, in der akustische Instrumente auf Samples, Synthesizer und live gespielte Electronica treffen.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Photo: by Landry

____________________________________________


La Yegros returned to the stage in 2022 to celebrate an anniversary: the 10th anniversary of Viene de Mí, her hit from the album of the same name, released worldwide in 2013, which catapulted her to international fame. We discovered a singer as rooted in the traditions of her country as she is in the most contemporary trends. Her parents come from Misiones, a province bordering Brazil and Paraguay, where balls are filled with the sounds of Chamamé, Carnavalito and Colombian cumbia. But she herself is a native of Buenos Aires, whose nights are alive with the dancehall and electronic bass.

These influences have fused in two further successful albums, Magnetismo (2016) and Suelta (2019), followed by whirlwind tours during which La Yegros has been able to display her generous nature, inexhaustible energy, exuberant personality and infectious enthusiasm. La Yegros relaunched its dance machine in front of audiences as wild as ever, with a tried and tested repertoire that no dancer can resist. But it was also time for a new repertoire. To record their fourth album, La Yegros put her trust in a winning team, already responsible for Viene de Mí. On the one hand, producer King Coya (Gaby Kerpel), a pioneer of synthetic experimentation applied to traditional music. On the other, composer Daniel Martín, who knows how to come up with melodies to dream about and hymns to sing along to. Inseparable and complementary, the trio continue to concoct this fantastic mixture where acoustic instruments meet samples and the rolling of machines.

But La Yegros, crowned queen of Nu-Cumbia, has never rested on her laurels. Her new productions continue to draw on popular music, but they are breaking away from over-defined genres. La Yegros invents her own folklore by knitting together new rhythms and integratng original sounds (bassoon, transverse flute, flamenco guitar, etc.), while the urban elements promise to turn dancefloors upside down with echoes of reggae and funk.

La Yegros never conceives an album without imagining how it will perform live. And although her show is a benchmark for the venues and festivals, she went into residency to beef up her formula. In additon to her usual line-up of guitar, accordion and percussion, a musician handles synthesizers and machines to play all the electronic elements live – a risk-taker as much as a doubling of possibilities. In any case, you can count on the singer to assert her increasingly clear-cut character with each new project. And, above all, to never give up. La Yegros is back and her batteries are fully charged!

lineup: Shalosh (ACT Music) *live*
information:
Eingängige Melodien gepaart mit verblüffenden Improvisationen und ausgeprägtem Storytelling: Shalosh aus Tel Aviv gehören zu einer Generation von Jazzbands, die ein breites Publikum erreichen - im Jazz und darüber hinaus. Ihre Musik ist rau, akustisch und progressiv, kontrastiert fröhlich Stile und Genres und ist viel zu wendig, um sich kategorisieren zu lassen. In klassischer Jazztrio-Besetzung (Piano, Bass und Schlagzeug) gehen Shalosh ihren eigenen Weg und schaffen eine einzigartige und faszinierende Synthese aus so unterschiedlichen Einflüssen wie Jazz, Rock, Klassik, Electronica, afrikanischer und nahöstlicher Musik.

Im letzten Jahr ist “Tales of Utopia“ erschienen. Ein Album, das während der Covid-Pandemie entstand und sich inmitten chaotisch gewordener Zeitläufte einer friedlichen Utopie widmet. „Wir hatten die Zeit, uns mit unserer Herkunft zu beschäftigen. Wir lasen Geschichten aus der Bibel oder aus Tausendundeiner Nacht und vielen anderen Mythologien“, sagt Pianist Gadi. Und wieder sind es der eingängige Groove und die ausgeprägte Melodik, gepaart mit einem ausgeprägten Storytelling, die den typischen Shalosh-Sound definieren. Aufgenommen unter Live-Bedingungen, ohne Kopfhörer und Verstärker, ist hier eine ganz eigene, raue und eindringliche Dynamik entstanden.

Das Trio interagiert auf höchstem Niveau und kommt ohne instrumentale Schauläufe oder melodische Dominanz aus. Diese Ausgewogenheit erreichen sie durch einen einfachen Kniff: Das Ensemble wird nicht von einem Leader geführt, sondern alle drei sind gleichberechtigt beteiligt. So können sie ihre gemeinsame künstlerische Entwicklung genießen und Musik ohne Ego entwerfen. Shalosh schaffen virtuos den Spagat, sich selbst als Musiker und Künstler herauszufordern und gleichzeitig zugängliche und anspruchsvolle Musik für ein breites Publikum zu machen.

Die Geschichte von Shalosh begann in Jerusalem, wo Matan Assayag (Schlagzeug) und Gadi Stern (Klavier) die Band “Enoma Elish“ gründeten. Nach der Auflösung der Band setzten die beiden ihre musikalische Partnerschaft zwischen Israel und New York, wo Gadi damals lebte, fort. Anfang 2014 beschlossen sie, Shalosh zu gründen und engagierten den Bassisten David Michaeli. Seit der Veröffentlichung ihres Debütalbums „The Bell Garden“ im Jahr 2014 haben sie in der internationalen Musikszene tiefe Spuren hinterlassen.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

Photo: Zohar Ron

____________________________________


SHALOSH is an instrumental piano trio, that belongs to the current generation of cross genre jazz groups able to reach a wide spectrum of audiences, in the Jazz world as well as in other genres. Their music is raw, acoustic and progressive, crossing stylistic boundaries and defying definition.

Despite its classic jazz trio format (piano, bass and drums) and the band members’ deep roots in jazz and improvised music, SHALOSH’s music weaves its own path and creates a unique and fascinating synthesis out of such varied genres as Rock, Classical, Electronic, African, and Middle Eastern music.

SHALOSH has set itself the goal of creating music that is both accessible and sophisticated, performing with great alacrity the balancing act of challenging themselves as musicians and artists, while leaving the door open for as wide an audience as possible, striving to break the distance screen that intellectual music may create. Their music comes from an emotional and raw place, the band’s reaction to today’s cold urban jungle.

lineup: Gidge
information:
Gidge, das Duo bestehend aus Jonatan Nilsson und Ludvig Stolterman, hat seine Wurzeln in der schwedischen Stadt Umeå und kommt im November nach Berlin. Ihre elektronische Musik ist geprägt von Field-Recordings der Natur und eignet sich sowohl für die Tanzfläche als auch für eine entspannte Umgebung. Jeder einzelne Track von Gidge schafft seine eigene Atmosphäre und Emotion. Ihr Werk entwickelt sich auf natürliche Weise und baut sich oft aus einem ruhigen Break, der mit Vocal-Samples und neoklassischen Einflüssen verfeinert wird, zu kraftvollen Höhepunkten auf. 

 

Die Musik von Gidge, die für ihre Inspiration aus dem Wald, der Natur und dem Norden Schwedens bewundert wird, ist in der Tat von absolut internationalem Kaliber und wird von Menschen aus der ganzen Welt gehört. Gidge haben auf ihrer Clubtournee in London, Amsterdam, Paris und Stockholm ausverkauft und auf Festivals in Mexiko, Georgien, der Türkei und Thailand ihr Live-Set vor großem Publikum gespielt. Blogs wie Pigeons & Planes, A Closer Listen und Ransom Note schrieben über ihre Musik - Pitchfork-Mitarbeiter wählten Gidge zu ihren Lieblingskünstlern, die sie an verschneiten Tagen hören wollten - XLR8R-Leser wählten Gidge 2015 auf Platz 1 der „besten neuen elektronischen Acts" - Bandcamp hob „LNLNN" 2017 als „Album des Tages" hervor.  

 

Die Diskografie von Gidge umfasst das Album „Autumn Bells", den Kurzfilm „Lulin" (in Zusammenarbeit mit Lampray), das Minialbum „LNLNN" und die Debüt-EP „For Seoul". Am 6. November 2021 erschien ihr neuestes Album „New Light", das ebenfalls von der Kritik gelobt wurde.

information:
Welcome to LIBIDOH, a pulsating mix of...
... ... ...

Curious to know what really defines us?

-- COMMUNITY
We have a sexy, open-minded, and close-knit community that extends far beyond the usual forms of social media. Pre and after-parties are usually part of the overall experience.

-- CLUBS & VENUES
Clubs/Venues are regularly changed, shaping the long nights to be specially tailored to the location and differing in our specials and lineup.

-- ARTISTS & SPECIALS
We invite special artists & performers to our parties or create space for new extravagant ideas in our world. Keep an eye out for specials on our flyers or in social media. We make a point to always prepare something unique.

-- EXCLUSIVITY
The audience depends on the event; we make our selection on-site, sometimes online, and check the dress code at the door. You can be sure that we have developed a sense of who brings the right mindset.

-- MEANING
It's not just about sex - it's about a feeling, a relaxed mindset that we prefer. We come to celebrate, to connect, and to find out what our Libido(h) wants to do with us. Those who come only for the F-word should stay outside.

-- PRIVACY
No-photo policy, not even by photographers.


And what else?

-- SAFETY & CONSENT
Of course, we also take care of your safety. An awareness team is deployed for every event, security is present, and our rules are highlighted. You can find them on our website as well.

-- ACCESSIBILITY & INCLUSIVITY
A platform for newcomers and a meeting point for the scene. We want to ensure that the right characters have access to our world. So don't hesitate to ask questions and give feedback, whether in person at the door, in the club, or online. If you're uncertain about the dress code, we can gladly provide recommendations.

information: Born in Scotland, artist Clarissa Connelly relocated to Copenhagen as a child, where the cultural landscape has continued to fuel her creativity. For years, she has explored the sacred sites, mythology, and music of Nordic culture, finding enduring inspiration in Celtic traditions. For her latest album, The Voyager (2021), she wandered through the Scandinavian landscape, channeling melodies from ancient pre-Christian sites. // The soundscape of singer/songwriter and producer Fine is meant to evoke the feeling of a nighttime drive through the desert in a David Lynch film. Her angelic voice sounds like cherry-colored half-speed funk or what it would be like if Dolly Parton played alternative rock.

information:
WohnzimmerTechno = living room techno (English)  

And that’s exactly the vibe we are creating at our events. We want everyone to feel comfortable, welcome and supplied with the most amazing artists of the scene.  

There is a consistently rising hate between the different genres of electronic music which we want to stop because it has nothing to do with the ORIGIN OF TECHNO.  

We’re here to lift each other up and create a night that will stay in our minds forever.  

To guarantee this will be the night of your life we don’t just have a fantastic Techno, Hard Techno & DnB Line Up. 

 In Cooperation with D&F we planned a complete new and unique lighting concept ONLY FOR THIS NIGHT AT VOID HALL. The software has already been programmed and additional light system will be installed the day before. See teasers on our Insta. ITS GONNA BE MINDBLOWING!  

We’re really looking forward to creating this unique and loving atmosphere and can’t wait to see many new and familiar faces.  

For us it’s very important that everyone is accepted - so THERES ABSOLUTELY no place discrimination, homophobia, transphobia or any other unacceptable behavior. Our team with the WzT Shirts will be available at any time and can be consulted if someone is not feeling well or harassed.

lineup: Jessica Pavone – viola , , Matsuno/Parkins/Filippou/Black:, , Keisuke Matsuno – guitar, PureData, Andrea Parkins – accordion, amplified objects, processing, Evi Filippou – vibraphone, percussion, Jim Black – drums
information:
Violist and composer, Jessica Pavone, explores the tactile and sensory experience of music as a vibration-based medium. Over the past twenty years, she has been developing solo music based on the pitches of the open strings intended to accentuate the natural sympathetic resonances of her particularly loud viola. Although her primary training was in classical music, Jessica Pavone has dedicated her practice to exploring alternative avenues for creative musical expression and “has made a career of redefining the possibilities for her instrument” (Steve Smith, National Sawdust Log). Recently What Happens Has Become Now has been released, Jessica Pavone’s fifth solo viola album and her fourth for Relative Pitch Records.

Keisuke Matsuno is a guitarist who employs sound processing techniques, including live sampling, controlled feedback, and real-time manipulation. Born and raised in Berlin, he later relocated to Brooklyn, where he has spent a decade honing his craft. Keisuke Matsuno has been part of Jim Black's band for nearly 10 years, working on music ranging from John Zorn to Hildur Guðnadóttir, collaborated on improvisational sets with Andrea Parkins, and recently joined Evi Filippou's band. For this performance, the four join forces to deliver an explosive set that fuses their individual influences into a unique blend of glitch, cut-and-paste, noise, and ambient.

Supported by Berlin Senate Department for Culture and Social Cohesion.

information:
Rafiki Daytime Jam is back!

After a massive celebration at the Plötzensee beach, we're moving things to the iconic Prince Charles in the heart of Kreuzberg.

Continuing the sweet tradition, we’ll kick things off with a House Dance Masterclass before diving into the heart of the fun, with a pristine local and international line up (stay tuned).

Join the Berlin House Dance community, with cyphers, DJ sets and an all-around joyful experience in one of Berlin's most legendary clubs.

lineup: @Nymphia Wind
information:
As winter approaches and the lights turn up, one corner of Europe and the UK will keep its summer glow this November as the inaugural Banana Ball comes to town. Devised by ITDEVENTS in partnership with Nymphia Wind the winner of RuPaul’s Drag Race Season 16, mark your calendars now for an unforgettable celebration of artistry, authenticity and sheer talent of the sort rarely seen.

Nymphia Wind, whose name is inspired by the beloved Pokémon Sylveon, embodies beauty and whimsicality. The “Wind” in her name reflects her aspiration for freedom and her desire to be "invisible like the wind," showcasing the grace and power of individuality. Nymphia has captured the hearts of drag fans worldwide with her astounding performances, sharp fashion sense, vibrant costumes and her ability to grow and evolve, capturing our hearts like few before her.

In keeping with her Drag Race debut, tonight’s your chance to deck yourself out in Nymphia’s signature yellow, embracing the joyful spirit of the Banana Ball and adding a splash of sunshine as winter approaches. Nymphia says dressing in yellow symbolises positivity and connection, inviting everyone to shine their brightest.

The highlight of our Banana Ball will feature a dazzling live performances by Nymphia plus a bevy of local Queens and DJs to keep you and your crew Poppin all night, plus best dressed and runway competitions. 

Join us to celebrate Nymphia Wind's extraordinary journey and her remarkable impact on our drag community. At the least, trust us when we say she goes bananas!

promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: Àbáse (Analogue Foundation & Oshu Records/HU/D ) *live*
information:
À‎báse ist ein Bandprojekt unter der Leitung des Keyboarders und Produzenten Bognár Szabolcs. Das Wort „àbáse“ stammt aus der westafrikanischen Yoruba-Sprache und steht für Zusammenarbeit: für kollektive Anstrengungen, Kollaborationen und einen gemeinschaftlichen Vibe. Als Ideengeber dieses Projekts bringt Bognár Szabolcs Künstler*innen zusammen, um in kollaborativer Arbeit einen Sound entstehen zu lassen, der traditionelle westafrikanische und afro-brasilianische Musik mit Jazz, Hip-Hop und Clubkultur verbindet.

In diesem Jahr ist mit “Awakening“ das zweite Album von À‎báse erschienen. Das Album wurde in vier Tagen in den Berliner Brewery Studios mit einem Ensemble aus engen Mitarbeiter*innen aufgenommen und vereint Àbáses vielfältige musikalische Einflüsse und Bezugspunkte (klassischer Lagos Afrobeat, traditionelle ungarische Folklore, Yoruba-Rhythmen, House und Techno, Hip-Hop und vieles mehr.) mit der exquisiten modalen Improvisation, die durch Szabis Selbstbeobachtung angeregt wird.

Nachdem er bereits von BBC Radio 6 Music's Gilles Peterson, Soulection, Okayplayer, Worldwide FM, Stamp The Wax, Earmilk, Complex und KEXP unterstützt wurde, veröffentlichte Àbáse 2019 seine lang erwartete Debüt-EP „Invocation“ über HHV Records und Cosmic Compositions und Anfang 2021 die „Body Mind Spirit“ EP, eine gemeinsame elektronische Erkundung mit dem Schlagzeuger/Produzenten Ziggy Zeitgeist. Ende 2021 erschien das gefeierte Debütalbum „Laroyê“, das komplett während einer fünfmonatigen Reise nach Brasilien aufgenommen wurde und dem Projekt weltweite Anerkennung einbrachte.

Als ausgebildeter Keyboarder ist Bognár seit vielen Jahren in der vielseitigen Musikszene von Budapest aktiv. Er hat mehrere erfolgreiche Acts geleitet, darunter Solqlap Budapest und The Mabon Dawud Republic, ein vierzehnköpfiges Afrobeat-Orchester, das die Felabration Budapest veranstaltete und mit Künstlern wie Dele Sosimi und Pat Thomas auftrat. Nach Aufenthalten in Paris, Lyon, New York, Accra, Rio de Janeiro und Salvador lebt Bognár heute in Berlin, wo er neben seiner Solokarriere auch als Keyboarder für den nigerianischen Soulsänger Wayne Snow, das lokale Kollektiv Sonic Interventions und den australischen Jazz-Schlagzeuger Ziggy Zeitgeist's Zeitgeist Freedom Energy Exchange arbeitet. Sein Engagement in der internationalen Musikszene führte zu Studio- oder Bühnenkooperationen mit so unterschiedlichen Künstlern wie Immanuel Wilkins, Elzhi, Guilty Simpson, Phat Kat, Etuk Ubong, Moses Yoofee, Petter Eldh oder Patti Smith.

________

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

Artwork: @ Àbáse

_____________________________________


On a quest for cosmic grooves of unity, Àbáse is the imagination of Hungarian producer and keyboardist Szabolcs Bognár. Creating an exquisite blend of jazz, West African, Brazilian, hip-hop and electronic music, he set to release his second album ‘Awakening’ in collaboration with Analogue Foundation in summer 2024.

Created following a move to Berlin, marriage, new parenthood, and the inevitable interrogation of mortality that takes place when a loved one has transitioned, the album demonstrates a deep understanding of music’s ability to cross time and geographic boundaries, conveying a message of unity, dialogue and self-reflection.

Recorded in four days at Berlin's Brewery Studios with an ensemble of close collaborators, the album coalesces Àbáse’s varied musical influences and reference points (classic Lagos Afrobeat, traditional Hungarian folk, Yoruba rhythms, house and techno, hip-hop et al) with the exquisite modal improvisation spurred by Szabi’s introspection. His work as an artist has drawn widespread critical acclaim. Debut album ‘Laroyê, recorded entirely during a five- month trip to Brazil, found global praise from the likes of The Guardian, BBC Radio 6, Selection, KEXP and Complex. As a keyboard player, Szabi has collaborated with the likes of Wayne Snow, Dele Sosimi, Pat Thomas and Zeitgeist Freedom Energy Exchange.

_________

event_name: Sote presents Sound System Persepolis | Support: Behrooz Moosavi
lineup: Sote , Behrooz Moosavi
information:
A driving force behind Tehran’s vibrant electronic music scene and founder of the Zabte Sote label, Ata Ebtekar will present his latest LP 𝘚𝘰𝘶𝘯𝘥 𝘚𝘺𝘴𝘵𝘦𝘮 𝘗𝘦𝘳𝘴𝘦𝘱𝘰𝘭𝘪𝘴 , a unique take on synthetic hardcore that pushes the very limits of underground brain/body music. The harmonics, rhythmic textures and buffeting decay conjure the sense of a monumental sound rig playing at earth-shaking volume—capable of displacing huge volumes of atmosphere, yet with barely a kick or a snare in sight.

Ever-evolving, Behrooz Moosavi’s music lurks uneasily through the grimy pummel of rhythmic noise, woozy ambience and mind-warping loops. Inspired by Deleuze & Guattari's Anti-Oedipus and their Schizo-analysis of politics, culture and subjectivity, his upcoming Zabte Sote release 𝘖𝘯 𝘚𝘤𝘩𝘪𝘻𝘰𝘱𝘩𝘳𝘦𝘯𝘪𝘤 𝘌𝘢𝘳𝘴 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘈𝘮𝘯𝘦𝘴𝘪𝘤 𝘓𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘦𝘯𝘪𝘯𝘨 builds tape manipulations, loops, and other digital / analogue techniques in an attempt to dehistoricize and re-historicize the musical heritage that he has brought with him to Berlin.

lineup: The Flabbies (TR) *live*
information:
The Flabbies gehören zu den Vorreitern des instrumentalen Shoegaze und Post-Rock der Istanbuler Musikszene und entwerfen ätherische Klanglandschaften, getragen von ruhigen aber aufregenden Melodien. Ihre genreübergreifende Fusion aus Disco, Shoegaze und psychedelischen Klängen haben sie zuletzt auf ihrem zweiten Album “Alive“ (2022) zu einem neuen Höhepunkt geführt. Live haben sie die Fähigkeit, auf großen Bühnen intime Konzerte zu spielen und schaffen es genauso, auch kleinere Hallen in große Säle zu verwandeln. The Flabbies erschaffen in ihrer Performance die ideale Kombination aus Licht, Bild und frei streunenden Noten und entwickeln ihren dynamischen Sound mit jedem Auftritt weiter.

The Flabbies wurden 2015 von den Jugendfreunden Oğuz Kont und Sarp Dağlar Şahin gegründet und brachten ihre EP “2015“ heraus. Mit ihrem Debütalbum “Back in Town“ erlangten sie internationale Aufmerksamkeit. Von der Pandemie ließen sie sich nicht ausbremsen, sondern arbeiteten eben online zusammen, so entstand ihre Single “Under the Sun“. Mit Can Sürmen am Schlagzeug wurden The Flabbies 2022 zu einem Trio und schlugen mit “Jungle“ im April 2022 ein neues Kapitel auf, den Schwung nutzten sie, um “Alive“ aufzunehmen. Jetzt sind sie in ganz Europa unterwegs um ihre Melodien und Tagträume unter die Menschen zu bringen.

Für diese Veranstaltung bieten wir ermäßigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu ermöglichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verfügbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinschätzung: Wenn ihr könnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und überlasst die ermäßigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen müssen.

­­­­Photo: @The Flabbies

______________________________________________



Founded in 2015 by childhood friends Oğuz Kont and Sarp Dağlar Şahin, The Flabbies, emerged with their EP "2015." As Istanbul-based trailblazers of instrumental shoegaze and post-rock in Türkiye, they gained both local and international recognition with their debut album "Back in Town," leading to a feature in a 2018 FIAT commercial. Renowned for their serene melodies and ethereal soundscapes, they evolved into a trio in 2022 with the drummer Can Sürmen and released their second album, "ALIVE", a genre-bending fusion of disco, shoegaze, and psychedelic sounds. From intimate venues to big festival stages and with a new EP on the horizon before their European Tour, The Flabbies continue to explore and innovate, inviting listeners on an exciting journey through their evolving musical landscape.

lineup: Ryoji Ikeda, Pyur
information:
The grounding of aesthetic production in the emergent formal properties of fundamental mathematical elements has been a major theme in the development of contemporary art. In this tradition Japanese artist Ryoji Ikeda stands out as the preeminent exponent. Berlin Atonal, in collaboration with silent green, is proud to host the German iteration of Ikeda’s latest major audiovisual project ultratronics [live set]. The new performance is based on the universalist principles laid out in Ikeda’s latest album ultratronics which was his first release in over a decade when it came out in 2022 and contained material designed between 1989 and 1999, along with more recent compositions developed between 2013 and 2022.

ultratronics [live set] is the culmination of Ikeda’s career long obsession with data-driven research and the ways in which the perceiving subject experiences sonic and visual phenomena, particularly when they are driven to their extremes. His audiovisual shows are operations of a particular mathematico-symbolic structure which exist as temporal artifices constructed out of the universe of pure tones, sine waves, white noise and light.

Supporting the show is German artist Pyur, aka Sophie Schnell, whose electronic compositions focus on condensed, pulsating forms that are minimal in structure and expansive in emotional texture. Her work explores the raw interplay between inner turbulence and the chaotic beauty of the external world through meticulously layered and precise sound design, pushing the boundaries of frequency and dynamic range to create immersive, multidimensional sonic environments.

Warning: this show will contain loud-noises and strobing light effects and is not recommended for people that may be sensitive to these phenomena.

lineup: TECHNO MITTWOCH: TUNNEL/TURBINE , I Vision , Søm1, Viktor Kampf , Mauel x, Martikls
information:
Get ready for another intense midweek session for Berlin's most dangerous day of the week to rave - WEDNESDAY Lose yourself at AVA Club in the heart of Berlin - underneath the Train Tracks of Warschauer Str S-Bahn Station. This is where your weekend starts or ends on Wednesday! Join us for Mittwoch every week to feel the rolling bass lines and deep kick drums of techno, hard techno, and trance punching through the speakers all night long. And since there’s no drama at the door, everyone can experience our best and most sensual night without compromise. Just close your eyes, forget your name, forget the world: It’s Mittwoch. WARNING: Partying on a Wednesday may be hazardous to your health, studies or work...but fuck it,  

Komm in deinem besten Techno-Outfit oder einfach so, wie du dich am wohlsten fühlst. Das Wichtigste ist, dass du bereit bist, die Nacht zu erleben und dich der Musik hinzugeben. Der Techno Mittwoch ist eine Feier der TECHNO Kultur, die die Grenzen des Möglichen überschreitet. Es ist eine Einladung, in eine Welt einzutauchen, in der die Zeit stillsteht und die Musik regiert. Sichere dir jetzt deine Tickets und sei Teil dieser elektrisierenden Nacht! Lass den Alltag hinter dir und tauche ein in die Welt des Techno. Wir sehen uns auf der Tanzfläche!  

 YOLO! DONT FORGET: ARRIVE BEFORE MIDNIGHT, EACH TICKET HOLDER IS ELIGIBLE TO BRING ONE FREE GUEST!  

No Sexism, No Racism, No Homophobia.

event_name: Curses & Nuovo Testamento · Support: Franz Scala
lineup: Curses , Nuovo Testamento, Franz Scala
information:
CURSES:
Romantic post-punk and body music from Berlin. Luca Venezia on vocals and guitar, and Dame Bonnet on bass brings the  Curses ‘live’ to stage, threading the visceral connection between 1980’s inspired dark- melancholic pop to the DIY energy of early E.B.M. With 2 full length albums on Dischi Autunno, Curses has also released a limited edition LP on Paris fashion brand, Saint Laurent, and music in video campaigns for Dior, and Raf Simons/Calvin Klein. A new album is on the way, soaked in the signature Curses’ ghostly guitars and haunting vocals.

NUOVO TESTAMENTO:
Nuovo Testamento is the Los Angeles & Bologna-based trio lighting up the dance floor with their uniquely dark italo disco-flavored pop hits. Following the release of the coldwave cult favorite Exposure EP in 2019 on Avant! Records, their widely acclaimed full length New Earth exploded onto the dance floor. Including instant synthpop staple “the Searcher,” alongside Hi-NRG homage “Michelle Michelle” and goth-tinged hits like “Golden Boy,” New Earth is widely considered across genres to be one of 2021’s best underground albums of the year.

Support: Franz Scala

Weaving smoothly between Italian Dance, Psychedelic Disco and Proto House, Franz quickly turns the dance floor into a vignette-tainted retro nostalgia rave fueled only by his music.

lineup: @Floating Points
information: The new album from acclaimed British producer Sam Shepherd, Cascade, is a continuation of sorts. In late 2022, the composer – renowned for drifting between genres as freely as his stage name, Floating Points, implies – found himself in the Californian desert working on something new. Mere Mortals, his first ballet score, created with the San Francisco Ballet, was to be a collision of sound and dance exploring the ancient parable of Pandora through the prism of technology. “It was one of quite a few left turns I was taking around that time,” recalls Shepherd, who can say that again: Promises, his multiple end-of-year-list-topping previous record, released in 2021, had seen him swap his typical modular synth tapestries and intricate drum patterns for airy dreamscapes, crafted with late legendary saxophonist Pharoah Sanders and the London Symphony Orchestra. It was a collaboration so popular, a Mercury Prize nomination and sold-out show at the Hollywood Bowl in September 2023 followed. Between these projects and an upcoming anime score for Adult Swim, from the outside it might have seemed as though Shepherd was departing the dance floor for good. But as he wrote his ballet score by day, at night he found himself longing for the sweaty communion of the club; for the pulse-racing abandon of electronic music once more.

lineup: Juan Evangelista, Lewis Fautzi, MELATRONIX, The Brvtalist, , DJ Zurückbleiben Bitte, Marit, Multifuse
information:
▆  About the Expeditions
The Expeditions series was founded in spring 2018 with a clear vision of breaking out of the monotony that defines most pure Techno nights in Berlin. The concept is to create a clear musical distinction between the different parts of the night, while remaining loyal to the classical and traditional aspects of Techno: from Detroit groove to hypnotic and atmospheric storytelling. We emphasize energy and progression. We strive to create a clear beginning and a decisive end. We believe in Techno as a journey, designed for the dance floor, rather than for podcasts. Following this principle, we curate the second floor with classic, warm, chord-led interpretations of House music, that serve as a perfect contrast to the main floor program. Occasionally, you might even find a third floor hidden in the vast garden of :// about blank. Explore, that's what the Expeditions is about.

▆  What to expect
⦿ A Power Deck with well curated interpretations of pure Techno music. No minimalism, no sophisticated preaching. 
⦿ A Comfort Deck with a contrasting program, curated with the finest House music: classic Chicago House, Soulful and New York Garage, and Berlin contemporary touches.
⦿ DJs at eye level, musically educated audience and Berlin underground at its best. 

▆ FAQ
 ⦿ Is there a dress-code? - No, the Expeditions doesn't have a dress code, but we do encourage you to be creative when choosing an outfit for the party., and to leave your everyday behind.
⦿ Is taking photos inside the club allowed?
- No. The Expeditions, and :// about blank have a strict no-photo policy. We also strongly encourage you to check in your phone at the cloakroom and lose the feeling of time. This is, however, not mandatory.⦿ Is the Expeditions a safe space for minority groups?
- The Expeditions, and :// about blank in general, are a safe space for any ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation. Any sign of racism, sexism, antisemitism, or homophobia will not be tolerated. In addition, you are requested to familiarize yourself with the principles of consent, and to respect the personal space of any fellow guest. In case you feel that you have been treated wrongly, or that your space has been violated, please notify our staff at the entrance immediately.

lineup: Floating Points
information: The new album from acclaimed British producer Sam Shepherd, Cascade, is a continuation of sorts. In late 2022, the composer – renowned for drifting between genres as freely as his stage name, Floating Points, implies – found himself in the Californian desert working on something new. Mere Mortals, his first ballet score, created with the San Francisco Ballet, was to be a collision of sound and dance exploring the ancient parable of Pandora through the prism of technology. “It was one of quite a few left turns I was taking around that time,” recalls Shepherd, who can say that again: Promises, his multiple end-of-year-list-topping previous record, released in 2021, had seen him swap his typical modular synth tapestries and intricate drum patterns for airy dreamscapes, crafted with late legendary saxophonist Pharoah Sanders and the London Symphony Orchestra. It was a collaboration so popular, a Mercury Prize nomination and sold-out show at the Hollywood Bowl in September 2023 followed. Between these projects and an upcoming anime score for Adult Swim, from the outside it might have seemed as though Shepherd was departing the dance floor for good. But as he wrote his ballet score by day, at night he found himself longing for the sweaty communion of the club; for the pulse-racing abandon of electronic music once more.

information:
For 2024’s last electro excursion, the Sonntagsinstitut scuba squad has cast its nets for a particularly fine fish: London-based Philip Bolland, aka Sync24. With more than 20 years of meandering in the muddy depths of machine music and almost 50 releases published on his label Cultivated Electronics, this mariner has certainly dived deeper into the trench of exclusive electro than most other artists in the sea. 

His set will be framed by the subaqueous traveling team of the Sonntagsinstitut collective: Affective Sauna, aka Black Mirror Park, and bb:fm.

lineup: Marcin Pietruszewski, Maxime Denuc
information:
The AGGREGATE Festival is back with two days of hyperorgan music presenting works for computer-controlled organ and electronics on two of Berlin’s most beautiful organs. With Marcin Pietruszewski, Maxime Denuc, Arnold Dreyblatt and gamut inc.

The Berlin ensemble gamut inc (Marion Wörle and Maciej Śledziecki) presents the fourth edition of the AGGREGATE Festival at the Auenkirche and the Kaiser-Wilhelm-Gedächtniskirche Berlin on November 29 and 30. There will be new works for pipe organs by Marcin Pietruszewski (Auditory Distortion Synthesis for Organ and Computer-Generated Pluriphonic Sound) and Maxime Denuc (Nachthorn +) in the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and by gamut inc and Arnold Dreyblatt in the Auenkirche.

Together with outstanding composers from the fields of electronic, electro-acoustic and experimental music as well as new music, gamut inc will develop pioneering artistic strategies between acoustic and electronic music on internationally renowned organs as part of the AGGREGATE series. Thousands of notes and parameters are prepared, generated and manipulated using composition programs. The pipes are controlled by the computer, but the sound comes from the pipes as in traditional playing.

Maxime Denuc is an electronic music composer based in Brussels. For some years now, his solo work has focused on church organs. He will perform Nachthorn, an entirely acoustic dance music piece with the organ as sole actor. Oscillating between dub techno and harmonic locked grooves. Nachthorn proposes a hypnotic music piece whose lines sketch the outline of an imaginary warehouse. The record was critically acclaimed, notably by Boomkat which selected it in the ten record of the year 2022. It has also been chosen as the soundtrack for the Chanel Spring-Summer 2023 Haute-Couture show.

Marcin Pietruszewski is a composer and researcher, he is engaged in sound synthesis and composition with computers, exploring specific formal developments in the tradition of electroacoustic music and contemporary sound art, as well as extra-musical domains of auditory design, computational linguistics and psychoacoustics.

event_name: African Acid is the Future 10 Year Anniversary
lineup: GLOBUS STAGE, Fulu Mizik live concert
information:
Fulu Miziki, the up-and-coming ‚Afrofuturist‘ collective, who make their own instruments out of garbage, have astonished the world with their innovative sound of industrial soukous-inspired punk, electronic music!

Fulu Miziki roughly translates to “music from garbage” which is an accurate description of the thrillingly chaotic Eco-Friendly-Afro-Futuristic-Punk-Ensemble of artists who come straight from a future where humans have reconciled with mother earth and with themselves.

This multidisciplinary collective of artists is based in the heart of Africa, in the Congolese capital city Kinshasa. For several years now, it’s members have spent their time conceptualizing an orchestra made from objects found in the trash, constantly changing instruments, and always in search of new sounds. Making their own instruments, performance costumes, and masks is essential to the approach of Fulu Miziki’s musical core ideology.

Their unique sound supports a pan-African message of artistic liberation, peace and a severe look at the ecological situation of the Democratic Republic of Congo and the whole world. For Fulu everything can be recovered and re enchanted.


Stamp allows access to klubnacht afterwards.

lineup: Black Decelerant + modalities
information:
silent green presents: 

Black Decelerant, the duo of Khari Lucas, aka Contour, and Omari Jazz, explore spiritual jazz traditions through contemporary tone and texture, fostering sonic meditations on themes of Black being and nonbeing, life and mourning, expansion and limitation, and the individual and collective. Their self-titled debut album, and the collaboration’s core intention, inspires a space for listeners to find stillness and solace, while providing a basis for a movement beyond “the moment”.

modalities is a new collective entity comprised of Alias Error and Oscar Atanga. Setting themselves apart from the dominant club scenes in their current home city of Berlin, the duo provide sonic curation via hybrid DJ sets, live performance, music direction and bespoke composition with a focus on downtempo, ambient and experimental music. Having explored the intersections between music, contemporary art, film and fashion individually for the last few years, the two artists and good friends came together to focus on music and sound design.

lineup: Ben Böhmer
information:
Neuer Track, Neues Album, neue Live-Shows: Ben Böhmer kommt mit seinem neuen Album “Bloom“ im November im Rahmen seiner Tour „Bloom Live“ für drei Shows nach Berlin. Außerdem erscheint die erste richtungsweisende Singleauskopplung „Best Life“, die zusammen mit dem Berliner Duo JONAH aufgenommen wurde. 

 
Ben Böhmer sorgt auch in diesem Jahr dafür, dass alle den Atem anhalten. Nach einem kometenhaften Aufstieg ohne Gleichen besteht inzwischen kein Zweifel mehr daran, dass er sich als einer der wichtigsten zeitgenössischen Tastemaker in der elektronischen Tanzmusik etabliert hat. Unter Garantie wird das neue Album Bloom im September und die zugehörige Tournee den globalen Hype um ihn weiter entzünden und beflügeln.    

 

Tanzmusik, mit viel Groove, aber noch viel, viel mehr Gefühl. Ben Böhmer steht für tiefe, komplexe, vielstimmige Emotionen, umhüllt von Melodien und Rhythmen, die Massen weltweit gleichermaßen zu Tränen rühren und in ungehemmte Euphorie verfallen lassen.  

Sein Debütalbum „Breathing“ und der Nachfolger „Begin Again“ haben neue Standards gesetzt. Dazu war die eigene Welttournee restlos ausverkauft. Dementsprechend hoch sind die Erwartungen an den Nachfolger „Bloom“, der auf dem legendären Label Ninja Tune erscheinen wird, das schon Giganten wie Bonobo oder Bicep großgezogen hat.   

Die Geschwindigkeit und der Impact, mit dem Ben Böhmer die größten Bühnen dieser Welt gestürmt hat, lässt wenig Vergleiche. Doch der Künstler hat trotz all des Ruhms und Erfolgs nicht vergessen, wer er ist und von wo er kommt. Das neue Album „Bloom“ verkörpert sowohl Rückbesinnung als auch Aufbruch. Die neuen Tracks spiegeln die anfängliche Liebe für Experimentelles und Improvisation und dennoch eröffnen sie ein gänzliches Neues Kapitel in der Karriere des jungen Künstlers: Wir erhalten Einblick in eine innere Welt, die reifen und sich festigen konnte. Aus dem resultiert eine künstlerische Vision, die an Weitläufigkeit, Facettenreichtum und Entschlossenheit alles Bisherige in den Schatten stellt.   

 

Ein weiteres Zeugnis für das Genie des Ausnahmekünstlers ist die Zusammenarbeit mit einer ganzen Riege an namhaften Gästen auf der neuen Veröffentlichung, darunter Lykke Li oder Enfant Sauvage von The Blaze. Nach Shows als Headliner auf dem SONAR oder dem Lollapalooza wird im November die neue Tour starten. Diese besteht aus acht europäischen Shows, darunter drei Konzerten in Deutschland und eine Show im legendären Alexandra Palace in London.

21 Jahre Ostfunk Berlin – Das Jubiläum, das du nicht verpassen darfst!
Wir feiern 21 Jahre voller elektrisierender Beats und unvergesslicher Nächte!  Das muss natürlich gebührend zelebriert werden, und dafür haben wir etwas ganz Besonderes für euch vorbereitet. An diesem Abend prallen Techno und Psy in einem musikalischen Showdown aufeinander und versprechen eine Nacht, die ihresgleichen sucht.
Sei einer der ersten 100 Gäste und sichere dir einen Begrüßungs-Shot, um perfekt in die Party zu starten.

- Ein grandioses Line-up mit den heißesten Acts der Szene
- Eine spektakuläre Laser Show, die die Nacht in ein visuelles Highlight verwandelt
- Sound der Extraklasse mit unserer fetten 6.1 Anlage
Markiere dir den Termin, schnapp dir deine Freunde und sei dabei, wenn wir die 21 Jahre Ostfunk Berlin gebührend feiern. Das wird eine Nacht, die du so schnell nicht vergessen wirst!
Hier nochmal auf Englisch:
 21 Years of Ostfunk Berlin – The Anniversary You Can't Miss!
We’re celebrating 21 years of electrifying beats and unforgettable nights!  And, of course, such an occasion deserves to be celebrated in style, so we've prepared something truly special for you. On this night, Techno and Psy will clash in a musical showdown, promising a night like no other.
Be one of the first 100 guests and grab a welcome shot to kick off the party right. 
Look forward to:
- A fantastic line-up featuring the hottest acts in the scene
- A spectacular laser show that will turn the night into a visual highlight
- Top-notch sound with our massive 6.1 system
Save the date, gather your friends, and join us as we celebrate 21 years of Ostfunk Berlin** in style. This will be a night you won’t forget anytime soon!

event_name: King Kong Kicks • Indie Pop Party • Festsaal Kreuzberg • Berlin
lineup: King Kong Kicks
information:
King Kong Kicks bringt dir den kollektiven Abriss, sprengt Genregrenzen und kreiert seinen eigenen Hype um deinen Vibe - slightly verschwommen, wie die Pics aus deiner Einwegkamera und genauso unique. 
King Kong Kicks ist das Augenzwinkern in deiner Playlist und der Geschmackskompass, der im perfect timing auch mal durchdreht und nuts geht. 
Lass zusammen ausbrechen, einen energetischen Tripp erleben und Hand in Hand dem Wort Party eine ganz neue Bedeutung geben und kopflos, aber herzig das Leben feiern.

Sounds like: Ennio, Berq, Fred Again, Marlon Hoffstadt, Dilla, Giant Rooks, Edwin Rosen, Mando Diao, Mayberg, Kasi, Florence and the machine, Brutalismus 3000, Paulwetz, Royel Otis, Paula Carolina, Bibiza, Southstar, Ski Aggu, Arctic Monkeys, Blond....
—————————————————————————————
King Kong Kicks brings you the collective demolition, blasts genre boundaries, and creates its own hype around your vibe – slightly blurred, like the pictures from your disposable camera and just as unique. 
King Kong Kicks is the wink in your playlist and the compass of taste that goes a little crazy and nuts at perfect timing. 
Let’s break out together, experience an energetic trip, and hand in hand give a whole new meaning to the word party, celebrating life headlessly but hearty.

Sa. 30.11.24 // 23:00 // Festsaal Kreuzberg

Minimum age: 18

lineup: Arnold Dreyblatt, gamut inc
information:
The AGGREGATE Festival is back with two days of hyperorgan music presenting works for computer-controlled organ and electronics on two of Berlin’s most beautiful organs. With Marcin Pietruszewski, Maxime Denuc, Arnold Dreyblatt and gamut inc.

The Berlin ensemble gamut inc (Marion Wörle and Maciej Śledziecki) presents the fourth edition of the AGGREGATE Festival at the Auenkirche and the Kaiser-Wilhelm-Gedächtniskirche Berlin on November 29 and 30. There will be new works for pipe organs by Marcin Pietruszewski (Auditory Distortion Synthesis for Organ and Computer-Generated Pluriphonic Sound) and Maxime Denuc (Nachthorn +) in the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and by gamut inc and Arnold Dreyblatt in the Auenkirche.

Together with outstanding composers from the fields of electronic, electro-acoustic and experimental music as well as new music, gamut inc will develop pioneering artistic strategies between acoustic and electronic music on internationally renowned organs as part of the AGGREGATE series. Thousands of notes and parameters are prepared, generated and manipulated using composition programs. The pipes are controlled by the computer, but the sound comes from the pipes as in traditional playing.

Arnold Dreyblatt (b. New York City, 1953) is an American media artist and composer. He has been based in Berlin since 1984. Dreyblatt is the Vice-Director of the Visual Arts Section of the Akademie der Künste in Berlin. One of the second generation of New York minimal composers, Dreyblatt studied music with Pauline Oliveros, La Monte Young, and Alvin Lucier and media art with Woody and Steina Vasulka. He has invented a set of new and original instruments, performance techniques, and a system of tuning.
